3359.title: ClaviusAndBeyond350Classic(Nova)
3359.author: chris
3359.description: Do you remember the first Escape Velocity game? One of the best plugins was Clavius And Beyond from DYNA Systems. With EV Classic for Nova v.1.0.1 (can be found here) you can play Escape Velocity running through the Nova engine (EV Nova 1.1.0) on Mac OS. With the help of SpacePort from hypermike and some minor adjustments it is now possible to play ClaviusAndBeyond in this environment as a plugin. 3D-Originals 1.2.2 from A. Weik are included. Have fun. chris

1471.title: arpia
1471.author: Anonymous
1471.description: ARPIA2 is a massive EV Nova plug-in, featuring graphics by ATMOS and other eminent graphic designers of the community. ARPIA2 adds three major storylines woven in parallel: the Regular member, the Shadow Warrior and the Public Figure. In ARPIA2 you get to choose your path. But beware: one choice can change the future, and the future holds many surprises Do you have what it takes?   It has always been everyone's dream to fight off entire fleets by oneself, to become a big-time rich trader, to do covert ops and to know everyone, everywhere. Well, here's your chance. Clicking on the download link will redirect you to the ARPIA2 download page. Creator: Peter "Pace" Craddock, contact at www.arpia.be

1584.title: EV Classic for Nova
1584.author: Guy
1584.description: Ambrosia Software's original Escape Velocity finds new life on the EV Nova engine. This faithful reproduction of the first game in the EV series is designed to look and feel as much like the original as possible, giving that same classic gameplay experience.

3216.title: NeoPlanets Beta 2
3216.author: TheBluePlanet
3216.description:
NeoPlanets is a graphical update for Escape Velocity Nova, originally hatched in 2007.
Replaces the planet graphics, or spÃ¶bs, with new, larger, more visually appealing graphics.

This is a beta version and is thus not perfect, though it is a major graphical upgrade.

1891.title: PlugPackV18
1891.author: Anonymous
1891.description: Note: The PlugPack is a package of 10 seperate plug-ins so you are able to choose your favorite features by yourself. Read the documentation for more info! Features: Choose from 201 new balanced outfits (i. e. Bank Accounts, Starbridge D/E upgrades, Fake ID's, Inertial Damper/Remover, Crew Quarters, Officers, Weapon Construction Bay, Vell-os abilities, new weapon types, and a bunch of other exotic new technologies) to equip your ship and get three new types of ships (new graphics) to escort you as well as two new ships (new graphics) for own use, buy your own shipyard in the Spica system and produce ships which you are able to sell or use for your own desires, choose from 23 different starting characters and start playing the game your way, get to Las Vegas and become a member of the GRN to fly three different types of racing missions and push your income, get the experience of colored target pictures, be able to visit S7evyn at any time you want, get 17 different paint jobs at the Paint Station in the Zel system, be able to see detailed ingame information about any outfit available (armor ratings, damage, shield recharge, etc.), see the amazing new shield bubbles and use the newest version of the ShipVariants plug-in. For any suggestions, improvements, bugs you have found or spelling and/or grammar mistakes e-mail me to (see documentation for email address).

3356.title: WinNova Resolution Patcher
3356.author: Kikanaide
3356.description: A new resolution patcher for WinNova, allowing Windows users of EV Nova to run the game at any resolution of their choice rather than being stuck at 1024x768. This program works with the latest version of Nova and includes all the goodies from Guy's original patcher.

2202.title: EVNEW 1.0.4
2202.author: Anonymous
2202.description: EVNEW - Escape Velocity: Nova Editor for Windows, is the first, and right now the only, plug-in editor for Windows.  This is the Release version 1.0.4.  EVNEW can edit all 23 of the Nova-specific resources, plus cicn, PICT, rle8, rleD, snd, str, and str resources.  It has the capabilities of ResEdit, EnRLE, DeRLE, ConText, and ResStore all wrapped together in a neat little package.  Send all comments to me at Aprosenf@aol.com.

1590.title: EV Override for Nova
1590.author: Guy
1590.description: Ambrosia Software's EV Override finds new life on the EV Nova engine. This faithful reproduction of the second game in the EV series is designed to look and feel as much like the original as possible, giving that same classic gameplay experience.

1375.title: AddShips2.0
1375.author: Anonymous
1375.description: This is a guide for people who want to add a ship that they have modeled in a 3d app and want to add in to Nova.  This version is much more complete that the first one I wrote.  It includes several new steps and pictures and examples of each step.  I hope this helps out everyone who has ever wanted to put their ships in Nova but didn't know how.  Questions, Comments, or Suggestions email me at CeRD@mac.com.

2188.title: ConTextResStore
2188.author: Anonymous
2188.description: NovaTools: Import and export Nova resources from TEXT spreadsheet files.  This is part of the NovaTools collection from wOOtWare.  Go to http://homepage.mac.com/dr_ralph/ for more information.

1201.title: Cloak Guns
1201.author: Anonymous
1201.description:
Cloaked Guns

Have you ever tried to dominate a planets when your shields and armor arereally low and you just have to run away?
Well, this is it. The cloaked guns. No mass,no payment needed.
Now you can freely shoot other ships when they can't find you! Isn't that fun? This package include one beam and one gun that you can shoot while cloaking.
It also has a cloaking device free and no mass as well included.
Questions, comments at terry_fullysick@hotmail.com
THANKS!

1396.title: EVN Bible
1396.author: Anonymous
1396.description: The EVN Bible PDF is a reformatted version of the latest EVN Bible. It's fully indexed, so you can find all the resources in a quick way, but also all the properties and flags! The MS Word document can also be obtained. You can contact me on the EVN web board (ReinierK).

1405.title: EVNovaMapWithGates
1405.author: Anonymous
1405.description: This is an improvement on my previous map.  This one includes all the HyperGate routes. Saved as a compressed PDF. jonpugh@frostbitefalls.com

2219.title: MissionComputer332-X
2219.author: Anonymous
2219.description: By David Arthur. A scenario editor for the three Escape Velocity games, which provides graphical editors for many resource types, both standard and EV-specific, and RDL scripts for all others. Supports standard and .rez plug-in formats, and includes integrated Resource Copier, Target Generator, Plug-in Convertor, and Make RLE utilities. (Mac OS X PowerPC version 3.3.2)

1402.title: EVN Walkthroughs
1402.author: Anonymous
1402.description: Complete walkthroughs for EV Nova's mission strings in HTML form, telling you how to begin storylines, and how to continue from any point in the game. -------------------- As seen on EV-Nova.net.

3290.title: Qaanol's Plug-ins 1.1
3290.author: Qaanol
3290.description: Qaanol's Plug-ins fix several bugged weapons in EV Nova. They make multiple Ion Cannons, BRLs, and TBRLs stack damage, Hail Chainguns stack properly, and Vell-os abilities lost on eject able to be relearned. You can also browse the Imperial Archives to read about and see pictures of alien ships and outfits that would otherwise remain hidden in the data files. There are five different ways to fix the broken beams, so pick your favorite. Without a fix, 8 Ion Cannons are no better than 1.

1389.title: EV Nova Map
1389.author: Anonymous
1389.description: Here's a full map that I put together after completing the Vellos storyline. I'm finding it very useful when playing the other storylines and thought I should share.

2236.title: MissionComputerX-320
2236.author: Anonymous
2236.description: By David Arthur. A scenario editor for the three Escape Velocity games, which provides graphical editors for many resources and RDL scripts for all others. Supports standard and .rez plug-in formats, and includes integrated Resource Copier, Target Generator, Plug-in Generator, and Make RLE utilities. (Mac OS X PowerPC version 3.2)

1386.title: Cheat Philosophy
1386.author: Anonymous
1386.description: The philosophy of cheat plugin design. Explains what a cheat plugin should and should not do, very simply. Applicable to a good many standard plugins as well. Written by Consul Bob.

3406.title: Thunderforge/A-Cruiser Crash Fix (windows)
3406.author: Tom
3406.description:
When trying to buy the T-forge or A-cruiser the game could crash.
This plugin or replacement file fixes the issue so there wont be any more crashing.

NOTE: ALWAYS MAKE A BACKUP BEFORE INSTALLING

1377.title: Arpia Walkthrough.rtf
1377.author: Anonymous
1377.description:
Here is, as promised to some, the walkthrough for the Arpian storyline found in the "Arpia, tale of an agency" plug-in, also available on the ambrosiasw website.
If there are problems with this document, or if you cannot read it, send me a mail at: pacehaldora@hotmail.com
Made by Pace [haldora]
© 2004 M.D.U.

1381.title: BitsCommoditiesDscs
1381.author: Anonymous
1381.description: This is a list of all the mission bits, commodities, and the vatious dëscs used by the default EV/Nova scenario.  Mostly made by Jeff Niles...  I tried to make it definitive, but if you find an error or you have a suggestion, please email me at jniles1@mac.com.

1416.title: NovaReferencePlus
1416.author: Anonymous
1416.description:
This is the EVEN MORE ULTIMATE resource for anyone making plugins or who just wants to find out the deal on some aspect of the game. This is an Excel spreadsheet that contains ALL the resources in EVN and all of thier data (with the exception of desc, str, sound, and graphics). Want to know exactly the specs of some ship or outfit? Making a plug and need to look up something quickly? Instead of opening up the datafiles and hunting for it, you can just look it up in this spreadsheet. Note that actually understanding the data often requires the EVN bible. Contact Azratax with questions or comments (Azratax@aznt.com AIM: Azratax).
This new version converts most resource ID's to names, parses modvals, and so on. Total uncompressed size is a whopping 13mb.

2237.title: MissionComputerX-333
2237.author: Anonymous
2237.description: By David Arthur. A scenario editor for the three Escape Velocity games, which provides graphical editors for many resource types, both standard and EV-specific, and RDL scripts for all others. Supports standard and .rez plug-in formats, and includes integrated Resource Copier, Target Generator, Plug-in Convertor, and Make RLE utilities. (Mac OS X PowerPC version 3.3.3)

2252.title: Plugin Archiver 2
2252.author: Anonymous
2252.description: v2.1. Plugin Archiver is an archiving program designed for the explicit purpose of archiving EV Nova plug-ins in the most cross-platform compatible way. Suitable for all types of plug-ins, including single files or total conversions, it's the program every Mac developer should use. Requires Mac OS 10.3 or higher. Made by Guy.

1415.title: Nova Bible.sit
1415.author: Anonymous
1415.description: This is a fully bookmarked PDF version of the Nova Bible. There's nothing changed, really, but it makes life a whole lot easier when you're looking for an obscure resource in the midst of everything else. Plus, it looks a lot better than BBEdit's plain text look. Converted by Cafall. Email to: alethiometer@earthlink.net

2250.title: PilotConverter2.sit
2250.author: Anonymous
2250.description: Pilot Converter reads pilot files from the original Escape Velocity or Escape Velocity: Override and converts the data to Escape Velocity: Nova pilot files. Now you don't need to make a new pilot if you want to keep playing in the original EV universes using one of the EVC (Escape Velocity Classic) or EVO plugins made for use with Nova.

2213.title: MacPluginConvertor200
2213.author: Anonymous
2213.description: By David Arthur. This application allows Macintosh users to convert between the standard plug-in format and the .rez type used by EV Nova's Windows version. Includes both Mac OS X and Classic versions.

2268.title: SwitchCON installer for Windows 2000 and XP
2268.author: Anonymous
2268.description: SwitchCON is a small utility to make switching between Nova and total conversions easier.  As well as being able to switch to Classic, Override, Nova, Polycon EV, Starfleet Adventures, Sephil Saga and up to 6 user-defined TCs at the press of a button, SwitchCON can also manage unique pilots and plug-ins for each conversion, making your totally converted Nova experience that much more enjoyable.  This is the self-installer for Microsoft Windows 2000 and Windows XP.  By Charles "CiM" Tosh.  Installer by Storm99999.

1286.title: Planetary Domination Rewards
1286.author: Anonymous
1286.description: This plug-in is designed to give added incentive for planetary domination: once dominated, the full range of technology (both ships and outfits) that planet has to offer will be available, regardless of which storyline you have completed. Also included is a "Cleaner" plug-in, which will remove any new ncbs, invisible outfits, and deactivate new missions if you choose to uninstall. See Read Me for full details. These are .rez files created with EVNEW, Mac users will need to convert them! Comments? Questions? Bugs? Send an email to slouch@stonerrock.net.

2221.title: MissionComputer401
2221.author: Anonymous
2221.description: By David Arthur. MissionComputer is a comprehensive editor for the Escape Velocity games. Version 4 adds ship and weapon editors, and the ability to edit several resources at once - 4.0.1 fixes a bug in the Copy command and makes minor usability improvements. Requires Mac OS 10.3 or higher on Intel or PowerPC.

2192.title: EV Bible
2192.author: Anonymous
2192.description: This is version 1.0 of EV Bible.  EV Bible is a program for plugin developers that organizes and stores the EV bibles for both EV Override (which pertains to EV orginal as well) and EVN.  This application was coded by Alan Smith (cheers) and UI was designed by Robert Friedland (me).  This application has been tested and is very stable.  Runs on OSX 10.3.9 and OSX 10.4 Tiger.  It may work on earlier OSX versions and is PowerPC only.  Version 2.0 will have many more features and updates are still to come.  Check this website: http://www.youtellme.meadowsweetfarm.com/index.htm for updates, news, and a full description with screenshots on this application.  Questions, comments, suggestions?  Send me an e-mail at trinix@sbcglobal.net.  Thanks.

1933.title: Qaanols Plug-ins
1933.author: Anonymous
1933.description: Qaanol's Plug-ins fix several bugged weapons in EV Nova 1.0.10. They make multiple Ion Cannons, BRLs, and TBRLs stack damage, Vell-os weapons form only 1 beam at a time, Hail Chainguns stack properly, and psychic abilities lost on eject able to be relearned. You can also browse the Imperial Archives to read about and see pictures of alien ships and outfits that would otherwise remain hidden in the data files. There are five different ways to fix the broken beams, so pick your favorite. Without a fix, 8 Ion Cannons are no better than 1. Made by Qaanol, email address in readme.

2201.title: EVNEW
2201.author: Anonymous
2201.description: EVNEW - Escape Velocity: Nova Editor for Windows, is the first, and right now the only, plug-in editor for Windows.  This is the Public Beta 1.0.0.  EVNEW can edit all 23 of the Nova-specific resources, plus cicn, PICT, rle8, rleD, snd, str, and str resources.  It has the capabilities of ResEdit, EnRLE, DeRLE, ConText, and ResStore all wrapped together in a neat little package.  The source code will be available soon.  Send all comments to me at Aprosenf@aol.com.

2024.title: ShipVariants1.0.6.sit
2024.author: Anonymous
2024.description: Now compatible with Nova 1.0.6. This plugin allows you to buy every variant of every ship in Nova. It also permits you to buy variant fighter bays. It is not a cheat, as you have to be able to buy the regular version of a ship before you are allowed to buy its variants. This version works extremely well, and fixes every bug and other issue that was brought to my attention since the first release. I know people who enjoy this plugin so much that they don't play without it. There is a readme included, which explains precisely what has been changed. Talk to me at dbrauer@hfx.andara.com

1262.title: Miners Heaven WIN
1262.author: Anonymous
1262.description: Another fun plug.  This Plugin creates a new system with a planet called "Mining Depot"  Which is just that, a place to sell all minable materials for high prices, and where you can outfit your ship with mining outfits.  One jump away from the depot, you have three different systems each with only their specific asteroid. Fun, Easy Money! made by bassman. Contact: bassman2k4@yahoo.com

1815.title: More Ships
1815.author: Anonymous
1815.description:
Ever wonder why Earth was the home of humanity and yet there were only about 7 ships around the system at any given day? Well, this plugin ups the number of ships around those hotspots in the galaxy, such as Sol, Alphara, the Polaris outer defense systems, and parts of the Auroran Empire. This is a Windows plugin so Mac users will have to convert.

WARNING: If you have a slow computer this plugin will cause graphical lag.

Enjoy, made by BuggerPlugger. Comments to buggerplugger@yahoo.com

1890.title: PlugPackV16
1890.author: Anonymous
1890.description: Choose one of 22 different characters to play with, buy 151 new balanced outfits (i.e. Bank Accounts, Starbridge D/E upgrades, Fake IDs, Mining Team, Inertial Damper, Crew Quarters, Officers, PD Weapons, Weapon Construction Bay, many new weapon types, and much more...) that are totaly integrated into the EVN universe, hire/buy 2 new ships (new graphics), buy your own shipyard and produce ships wich you are able to sell, fly three different types of racing missions from the GalacticRacingNetwork on Las Vegas, see the totaly new target pictures and use the newest version of the ShipVariants (Note: The included ShipVariants plug-in is a special version only for use with the PlugPack). Thats the PlugPack v16. Download it now! Note: The PlugPack is a package of 6 seperate plug-ins so you are able to choose your favorite features by yourself. Note: Dont use older versions of this plug with EVN 1.0.6! Please mail me your suggestions or improvements: BuchholzChris@web.de

3274.title: Advanced Fighter Variants
3274.author: Mk.32
3274.description: This plugin grants the appropiate fighter bays that were previously blocked out by EV Nova, such as the Rebel Viper, Interceptor Class. Additional variants include the Auroran Phoenix, Frunch'ek Class, Federation Anaconda, Auroran Outfits Detected, Pirate Viper, Missile Variant and many others; including a forum-requested Rebel Thunderhead Bay. The player is allocated the appropiate fighters for which storyline the player has undertaken. Note that this plugin may conflict with various plugins that modify core principles of the game, such as various cheat plugins. Created with MissionComputer, tested on EVN v.1.0.10 on a Macintosh PPC. Contact information is Mk.32 on the forums or email supplied on the plugin splash screen.

1657.title: GalacticArmageddonCh1to2a
1657.author: Anonymous
1657.description: These are the first 2 chapters of a proposed 16 chapter plug-in which completely changes the storyline of EV Nova.  Think of it as a pilot episode no more will be created if the response is not good.

1397.title: EVN Bible HTML.sit
1397.author: Anonymous
1397.description:
This is an HTML version of the EV Nova Bible. It features a table of contents, internal links to resources, and easily readable (light on dark) text. Included are links for iCab, Internet Explorer, and Netscape, but the files can be dragged to any browser for viewing. By Bacchus Freeware/Publishing (John 'Talos' Krauss), version 1.0. Distributed with permission from andrew. Questions, suggestions, and comments should be emailed to talos@bacchusfreeware.com.

Note: this is 'identical' to the previous one I submitted. Unfortunately, that didn't work. A duplicate file can be found at http://www.bacchusfreeware.com/EV_Nova_Bible_HTML.sit.hqx if this one doesn't work either.

2232.title: MissionComputerX-220
2232.author: Anonymous
2232.description: By David Arthur. A scenario editor for all three games of the Escape Velocity series which provides graphical editors for the char, cron, desc, dude, flet, govt, intf, junk, misn, pers, PICT, STR, STR, and year resources, and template-based editors for all others. Includes integrated Resource Copier and Target Generator utilities. (Mac OS X Edition)

1624.title: Explosion Revamp v1.0.1
1624.author: Anonymous
1624.description: Explosion Revamp v1.0 Explosion revamp basically replaces all of the missile explosions and adds eleven unique ship explosions that depend on the size of the ship that is explosing. It even adds a cool new ship breakup blast! With this plugin, you will not see any ugly pepper-like blasts around an explosion. All you will see is a single, large, high quality blast. Comments, questions, or complaints go to snodbytch@cox.net.

2247.title: NovatoolsUpdate1.0.2
2247.author: Anonymous
2247.description: This update will fix some issues using the resource editors of NovaTools 1.0.1. This modification is an update, not a replacement for Novatools 1.0.1. Complete installation instructions are provided in the download package. For any questions email me (see ReadMe for email address).

1526.title: ClaviusAndBeyond 3.33 Nova.sit
1526.author: Anonymous
1526.description:
Do you remember the first Escape Velocity game? One of the best plugins was ClaviusAndBeyond from DYNA Systems. 
With mac_evnova_classic (can be found in EVN essentials) you can play Escape Velocity running through the Nova engine on MacOS and with the help of SpacePort from hypermike@adelphia.net and some minor adjustments it is now possible to play ClaviusAndBeyond in this environment as a plugin.
chris

1654.title: Full Screen Map for Windows
1654.author: Anonymous
1654.description: Full Screen Map for Windows is a plug-in that enlarges the map display window to fill your screen. This extended visibility lets you see more of the universe at once, without scrolling or zooming out. Compatible with all other plug-ins, and strictly utilitarian, Full Screen Map is a must-have. Version 1.0 made by Qaanol in May, 2006. Contact me via email, Qaanol@Gmail.com

2223.title: MissionComputer403
2223.author: Anonymous
2223.description: By David Arthur. MissionComputer is a comprehensive editor for the Escape Velocity games. Version 4 adds ship and weapon editors, and the ability to edit several resources at once - 4.0.3 improves multiple selection in the graphical editor, allows you to save when an editor is in the foreground, and fixes several bugs. Requires Mac OS 10.3 or higher on Intel or PowerPC.

3199.title: The Ringbuilders
3199.author: Anonymous
3199.description:
This plug-in expands the Kontik probe mission into a full storyline, consistent with Nova's existing storylines.  It includes new ships, outfits, and systems, and an original story, but no original graphics or artwork, although it uses existing EV graphics in some new ways.

This version has been tested only by the creator on a Mac, but I have no reason to believe it would not work on other systems. Since testing has been limited, this is a preliminary release intended for testing, and if I receive feedback, I will update it and replace it with a final version.  It is most likely not compatible with other plug-ins, or existing pilots, although it should be possible to complete the new storyline, and then continue onto one of Nova's existing storylines.

1220.title: Experienced Space-Farer v1.1
1220.author: Anonymous
1220.description: The Experienced Space-Farer is back! This version is exactly the same as the first except it should work for PC users who aren't given the option of what character to play as at the beginning of a new game. This version should force the choice to be The Experienced Space-Farer! ESF simply allows you to skip some of the monotony of starting a new pilot, making starting cash with petty trading, etc. You start the game in a Rebel Valkyrie Class V with 10 million credits. If the Rebel Valk. is not the ship of your choice, you can always sell it and use that 10 million towards another ship. This plug should be compatable with all other plugs unless you have a plug that does the same thing. ESF uses char. resourse 129, so if you know youre using that, you probably know how to fix the problem. If you have any problems, feel free to e-mail me at mswer2007-at-yahoo-dot-com. Have fun!

1249.title: KTech Outfits
1249.author: Anonymous
1249.description: KTech_Outfits.zip -- Tired of waiting until someone thinks you're the Ory'Hara until you can really thrash?  Here is an assortment of new weapons and outfits that will allow you to go toe-to-to with Polarans, if you want.  Includes an overdrive, cloak, a singularity reactor, repair droids, hyperjump extender, Fed Cloak (it's a trap, don't use it) remover, a Hybrid Laser, PD Lasers, maybe a dozen in all! Compatible with ackagato's ResetMissions plug. New ships, more for Windows EVN users at http://nova-kemet.tripod.com.  Contact: cmobb@hotmail.com.

1253.title: Licence to Kill
1253.author: Anonymous
1253.description: This plugin lets you kill any ship you want with out getting penilized by the government.  Great for destroying every ship in sight to gain a better combat rating.  Have fun!!!  Questions and comments go to sec222@mac.com.

1290.title: Pluginsfolder
1290.author: Anonymous
1290.description: Hi this file has -esw-dragoon_77 plug-ins a Quad Rail Gun 600MM and QRG all 4 firing 600MM rail guns, also DMBandRulzAlls plug-ins QMB turret non Feb, you do not need to do the fed mission to get the Quad Medium Blaster turret, Quad Heavy Blaster Turret plug-in, retool 6 ton plug-in, Heavy Blaster plug-in, also Roberts Ship Upgrades and Ship Upgrades 2 plug-ins, Ship Upgrades 2 is not finished it still works, both plug-ins works on EVN 1.0.0, 1.0.1, !.0.2. Uploaded by NSA man.

1323.title: skippercheat2.1
1323.author: Anonymous
1323.description:
This plugin fixes my second plugin, skipper2.  This basically fixes problems with my cargo bay, updates
a picture, adds a few outfits I never put in, such as the iff decoder, grav sensors, auto recharge, auto eject.
This also adds the light cannon which I forgot to put in....
The above were all fixes in the outfits plugin.
In the character plugin, I added a few characters I left out, including the kestrel and the unrelenting.
griffy208@aol.com

1355.title: Thorium Reactor folder
1355.author: Anonymous
1355.description: My Third plug-in this plug works with EVN 1.0.5. Shield Charger and overdrive plug-ins works with EVN 1.0.5 also I forgot to type that in with the other plug-ins. Now that I got that out of the way. This Plug-in has one outfit the Thorium Reactor if you can aford 4 million credits and have 8 tons of free mass you will have a nice Reactor for a little speed increase and charging your ship. You can only buy two. I don't know if it will work on 1.0.0 to 1.0.4? I only tested it on 1.0.5! My e-mail is RobertPhoenix978@aol.com I am also working on a plug-in so you can buy long-range Poloron Torpedos for EVN 1.0.5 had a few problems every ship that has Poloron Torpedo Launcher shots the long range Torpedos.

1385.title: CE Nova Resource Bible.pdf
1385.author: Anonymous
1385.description: A formatted and PDF version of the Nova Resource Bible created by Carbon Entertainment. (www.carbonentertainment.net) Included within, and bookmarked for your convenience is the latest resource bible v.6.9.02.

1390.title: EV-Nova Guide
1390.author: Anonymous
1390.description: A guide for both the rookie and veteran to the Escape Velocity series. This guide includes fighting strategies, how to build up to the ultimate ship, all the human ships in Nova (rated), FAQs, and information on the missions in Nova. Requires AppleWorks or Simpletext to open. By White Lightning. Comments go to elwindimladris@hotmail.com.

1393.title: EV Nova Reference
1393.author: Anonymous
1393.description: This is the ULTIMATE resource for anyone making plugins or who just wants to find out the deal on some aspect of the game. This is an Excel spreadsheet that contains ALL the resources in EVN and all of thier data (with the exception of desc, str, sound, and graphics). Want to  know exactly the specs of some ship or outfit? Making a plug and need to look up something quickly? Instead of opening up the datafiles and hunting for it, you can just look it up in this spreadsheet. Note that actually understanding the data often requires the EVN bible. Contact Azratax with questions or comments (Azratax@aznt.com AIM: Azratax).

1400.title: EVN Map.gif.sit
1400.author: Anonymous
1400.description:
Nova Map
Complete map of the EVN universe.
It consists of several screenshots out of several missions, so there may be some inaccuracies. If you want to modifiy it or create your own map, a full layered Photoshop version with systems, links etc. is available too.
Error reports and suggestions also welcome.
Chronos@macnews.de)

1431.title: TutorialsInS.sea
1431.author: Anonymous
1431.description:
Four tutorials give detailed instructions on how to create EV Nova spïns, spöbs, sÿsts, shäns and shïps. Practice images and examples of completed plugins are included. Also included is an empty EV Nova plugin with TMPL, and an HTML file that shows the standard spöb/spïn images.

Rick Dillman 
evnplugs@ticopa.com

1766.title: Lly Starbridges1.0.sit
1766.author: Anonymous
1766.description: "Llywelyn's Starbridges" is my first publically released plugin.  Version 1.0 contains three modified Starbridges.  The Starbridge T.A.R.D.I.S. is a Class A Starbridge with good engines, no weapons, and a great deal of cargo space and free mass.  The Starbridge Avenger has some extra space and mass but comes outfitted like an Auroran warship with rail guns and matrix steel.  The Starbridge Warlock is much like the Avenger but is outfitted like a Polaris warship.  All three are relatively expensive.  The plugin should not conflict with any other plugins or any parts of the game.  If you discover any problems please email me: G. Llywelyn (eaccounts@valaquenta.com)

1779.title: MamieNova.sit
1779.author: Anonymous
1779.description:
Mamie Nova is a "Utility Plugin" for the Polycon TC
It's a very lite version of Nova Data with only vital ressources needed to make Polycon work.
The Game will then run a lot smoother on older configurations (like mine).
Mamie Nova is a Pluging by The French Team (made by Blood_Falcon)
http://membres.lycos.fr/thebigberta/

1866.title: paintjobs1.0.sit
1866.author: Anonymous
1866.description: Paint Jobs is a ridiculously simple plug-in that allows you to purchase four different flavours of paint jobs for your starship, red, blue, green  yellow (the yellow may look a bit odd, dunno why). I made it because I was annoyed that the developers hadn't really utilised this cool possibility. The paint jobs should be available at all ports with an outfitter service. It took about half an hour to make, and has been put through a reasonable amount of testing without any problems surfacing.  If you have any comments, praise, suggestions, whatever, mail 'em in to zimziki@hotmail.com

2005.title: Sell Drop Bear.sit
2005.author: Anonymous
2005.description:
To sell something you could have bought and couldn't re-sell.
I won't tell exactly what it is, because I don't want to reveal some secrets.
But you, who are in the same case as I was, you shall understand what it is about.

2161.title: Weapon Bay Fixes.sit
2161.author: Anonymous
2161.description: This plugin fixes beam and burst weapons (ion cannons, chainguns, etc.) so that they're cumulative with themselves (having more than one of these weapons will make a difference now), also changed the polaron cannon and ion cannon to fire as secondary weapons (to avoid on fuel drain when you just want to use other primary weapons), and fixed the descriptions for fed viper and anaconda bays which erroneously reported how many vipers/anacondas they can hold. Questions or comments can be sent to stereo21@mac.com

2191.title: EV-Names.sit
2191.author: Anonymous
2191.description:
This cool little program creates names for plugin developers.They can use it  to create names.I found this little utility very helpful
Thanx

2194.title: EVN ID Formulas
2194.author: Anonymous
2194.description: Tired of not knowing what ID# to give that dsc? Need to know the spn# for your new ship? EVN ID formulas has everything you need to identify just what resource value to assign that particular resource. (Intended for use with NovaTools.)  By Blackdog of RedRavenGrafix.

2195.title: EVN Calc X.dmg
2195.author: Anonymous
2195.description: This is a program much like NovaCalc, this is for OSX users. It takes your input and outputs the numbers which you would need for your plugin. There may already be a program that does this for X but I did not see it.This program may not work with pre OSX 10.2. Contact me with any problems you are having or anything you think that I should add/takeaway. jnorth@brocktonpoint.com

2199.title: EVNAnnotatedTemplates.sit
2199.author: Anonymous
2199.description: This archive contains a set of Resorcerer-specific templates for EV Nova.  These templates are proliferously annotated from the Nova Bible and take advantage of Resorcerer's advanced template-editing features.  (Sorry, no rleD/rle8 support.)

2200.title: EVNCX.dmg
2200.author: Anonymous
2200.description: This version of EVN Calc X fixes a problem with the mission calculator section, where it returned a value 1000 greater than what it should be. Well it is fixed. Note: This application may not work for users on pre Mac OS 10.2 systems. Any problems, comments, suggestions? Contact me at jnorth@brocktonpoint.com

2203.title: EVNMV
2203.author: Anonymous
2203.description: EVN Mission Viewer is a utility for Escape Velocity: Nova plug-in developers. It allows convenient viewing and searching of mission information, and simulates mission strings for quick testing during development. Requires Mac OS X.

2204.title: EVNovaPluginManager1.2
2204.author: Anonymous
2204.description: This is version 1.2 of the EV Nova Plugin Manager. New features include: ¥ OSX compatibility ¥ Plugin Sets allow you to save sets of frequently used plugins ¥ Software Update built-in If you need help using the EVNPM then goto a http://homepage.mac.com/evnpm/ and read the FAQ and/or the manual. Bugs, Comments, Suggestions, etc. should be sent to evnpm@mac.com. Created by Booksley, released 7/16/02

2209.title: LaSEr102
2209.author: Anonymous
2209.description: LaSEr allows you to take rendered images of your ship and its masks, place them in two folders in the same one as LaSEr, and create the graphic, mask, and spïn for them. This makes it ready to convert with EnRLE by w00tware ( http://homepage.mac.com/dr_ralph/ ). The name comes from the LASIK option that also is allowed. Read the ReadMe for more detailed instructions. Version 102 adds "mask amplification," which enhances masks so sprites show up properly. NOTE: THE PREVIOUSLY POSTED (VERSION 101) DOWNLOAD NO LONGER WORKS!

2227.title: MissionComputer9-302
2227.author: Anonymous
2227.description: By David Arthur. A scenario editor for the three Escape Velocity games, which provides graphical editors for the char, cron, desc, dude, flet, govt, intf, junk, misn, nebu, outf, pers, PICT, syst, spob, STR, STR, and year resources, and RDL- or template-based editors for all others. Includes integrated Resource Copier and Target Generator utilities. (3.0.2 Classic Edition)

2231.title: MissionComputerX-200.dmg
2231.author: Anonymous
2231.description: By David Arthur. A scenario editor for all three games of the Escape Velocity series which can edit the cron, desc, dude, flet, govt, junk, misn, pers, PICT, STR, STR, and year resources. Includes integrated Resource Copier and Target Generator utilities. (Mac OS X Edition)

2233.title: MissionComputerX-301
2233.author: Anonymous
2233.description: By David Arthur. A scenario editor for the three Escape Velocity games, which provides graphical editors for the char, cron, desc, dude, flet, govt, intf, junk, misn, nebu, outf, pers, PICT, syst, spob, STR, STR, and year resources, and RDL- or template-based editors for all others. Includes integrated Resource Copier and Target Generator utilities. (3.0.1 Mac OS X Edition)

2234.title: MissionComputerX-302
2234.author: Anonymous
2234.description: By David Arthur. A scenario editor for the three Escape Velocity games, which provides graphical editors for the char, cron, desc, dude, flet, govt, intf, junk, misn, nebu, outf, pers, PICT, syst, spob, STR, STR, and year resources, and RDL- or template-based editors for all others. Includes integrated Resource Copier and Target Generator utilities. (3.0.2 Mac OS X Edition)

2239.title: NovaCalc Classic.sit
2239.author: Anonymous
2239.description:
This is the Classic version of NovaCalc.
Need the ID of that spöb dësc? Pulling your hair out from all the claculations involved in plug-in developing? This utility is for you! It calculates all the resources IDs of mïsns, spöbs, shïps, and oütfs. Go crazy! Available for Mac OS 9 and Mac OS X. email: monster@evula.org

2240.title: NovaFileChanger.sit
2240.author: Anonymous
2240.description: This Carbon application will change the file type and creator of any file into one supported by EV Nova. This program supports any file type supported by EV Nova.

2242.title: NovaTarget 100 Classic
2242.author: Anonymous
2242.description: EV Nova Target Generator, by David Arthur, provides an easy way to create the 'scan-line' target graphics found in EV Nova from an ordinary colour image. This version is designed for versions of the Mac OS prior to Mac OS X.

2244.title: NovaTools
2244.author: Anonymous
2244.description: NovaTools: ResEdit plugin editors for Escape Velocity Nova.  This is part of the NovaTools collection from wOOtWare.  Go to http://homepage.mac.com/dr_ralph/ for more information.

2246.title: NovatoolsUpdate1.0.1
2246.author: Anonymous
2246.description: NovatoolsUpdate1.0.1 is a modification of the world renowned Novatools 1.0.0 EVN resource editing utility for ResEdit, designed and developed by Ralph and Rodger Sutherland. DrRalph (as he's known in the ASW forums) has graciously permitted this 3rd party update to the original release of Novatools. Requirements are a Macintosh with Novatools 1.0.0 already installed. This modification is an update, not a replacement for Novatools 1.0.0.  Complete installation instructions are provided in the download package. Also included is a list of all changes made to v1.0.0 that are contained in the v1.0.1 update. Provided by bit-banger Arturo - July 4, 2004.

2249.title: Pf2.0.sit
2249.author: Anonymous
2249.description: PlanetForge 2.0 is an EV utility made to allow designers to rapidly create realistic planet spites with real-world parameters. Version 2.0 supports multiple graphics sets, which can be created by a user if desired, and an imporved rendering algotithm. Enjoy! Author is Bryce, email is evnova@hotpop.com.

2254.title: ResourceInterdependence
2254.author: Anonymous
2254.description: The Resource Interdependencies Table is a reference guide for EV:Nova plug-in developers.  The table shows the interrelationships existing amongst the many definable resources used by the Nova game-engine. Provided by bit-banger Arturo.

2255.title: SpaceObjectFinderv1.sit
2255.author: Anonymous
2255.description: Some missions will tell you to go to a space station or planet but will not give the name or location of the system that contains the planet. If the planet is in a system with a name you don't recognize it can be difficult to determine where you have to go without looking at every system on the map. With Space Object Finder all you have to do is type in the name of the place you want to go and it will tell you the name of every system that has a space object with the name you searched for. Space Object Finder should work under both OS 9 and OS X. It also works with the data files for all three version of EV (EV, EV:O, and EV:N). e-mail: macutator@macutator.com . Released 10/19/02. Made by "No One"

2266.title: Sprites
2266.author: Anonymous
2266.description: NovaTools: m2s, p2s, px2s, - convert PICT files, PICS files and Movies into PICT based sprites. This is part of the NovaTools collection from wOOtWare. Go to http://homepage.mac.com/dr_ralph/ for more information.   Fixed the p2s icon and folder drag/drop in OS9 .

2267.title: SwitchCON installer for Windows
2267.author: Anonymous
2267.description: SwitchCON is a small utility to make switching between Nova and total conversions easier.  As well as being able to switch to Classic, Override, Nova, Polycon EV, Starfleet Adventures, Sephil Saga and up to 6 user-defined TCs at the press of a button, SwitchCON can also manage unique pilots and plug-ins for each conversion, making your totally converted Nova experience that much more enjoyable.  This is the self-installer for Microsoft Windows 95, Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition (Me).  By Charles "CiM" Tosh.  Installer by Storm99999.

2080.title: StarcraftPlug
2080.author: Anonymous
2080.description:
This is based on an old total conversion for EVN to make it starcraft, this only includes the Battlecruiser and the Valkyrie, there is a bug that keeps the lasers from hitting marauders (email me if you know how to fix this)
Email me with questions, requests, suggestions etc.

Lordwriath@hotmail.com

1293.title: PolarisTech2
1293.author: Anonymous
1293.description: The newer version will give you access to Polaris ships as well as their outfits. Also, three new outfits which I forgot in the previous version have been added - the Matter/Anti-Matter Reactor, Organic Shield and Shield Organelles. By Denier-of-Soup, denier@rawr32.net (See http://denier-os.uni.cc/modules/EVNova/ for more Tech plug-ins).

1591.title: EV SpecialCruiser 3.0 Nova.sit
1591.author: Anonymous
1591.description:
Do you remember the first Escape Velocity game? One of the best plugins was ClaviusAndBeyond from DYNA Systems. 
With mac_evnova_classic (can be found in EVN essentials) you can play Escape Velocity running through the Nova engine on MacOS and with the help of SpacePort from hypermike@adelphia.net and some minor adjustments it is now possible to play ClaviusAndBeyond in this environment as a plugin.
It could be more fun with a powerful ship, the Special Cruiser... chris

2228.title: MissionComputer9-310
2228.author: Anonymous
2228.description: By David Arthur. A scenario editor for the three Escape Velocity games, which provides graphical editors for many resources and RDL scripts for all others. Includes integrated Resource Copier, Target Generator, Plug-in Generator, and Make RLE utilities. (Classic Mac OS PowerPC/68K version 3.1)

1421.title: SAEDevelopment Package
1421.author: Anonymous
1421.description: Just contains some handy info that I picked up while coding SAE: Nova. All in .txt PDF /Mac/PC I was going through my old back up disks and realized this was never released. Please feel free to use any info you can here... Enjoy and feel free to contact me at: mc23418@yahoo.com or go to: http://forums.eternallightstudios.com for invaluable info on SAE and support for all issues. Thanks a lot for your support :)  -- Xeres

2217.title: MissionComputer331-X
2217.author: Anonymous
2217.description: By David Arthur. A wide-ranging scenario and resource editor for the three Escape Velocity games. This latest version features re-arranged editors for easier access and a number of other improvements. (3.3.1 Mac OS X Edition)

2258.title: SpinApp
2258.author: Anonymous
2258.description:
This little Mac OS X app can take one image and create a spin, or take several images and combine them into a spin.  You cannot drag and drop yet, and it only supports JPEG files currently, but I plan to add more image types soon.
You can check for updates at: http://evweb.aresaxis.us/

2162.title: Webboardplug
2162.author: Anonymous
2162.description:
Ever silently wished you could shoot lasers at that pesky web board member who argues with you? Well now you can! Razzle Storm presents: The Escape Velocity: Nova Web Board plug-in! Now you can fly around space with your favorite digital friends and enemies on your journey across the universe! This current version (yes, there will be more) features web board members from March, 20, 2006. So download now, and let your adventures begin!

This plug-in is not recommended for children under the age of 3. It has not been approved by the FCC, and could cause potential bodily harm if ingested.

Enjoy! (View Readme for contact info)

1653.title: Full Screen Map for Mac OS
1653.author: Anonymous
1653.description: Full Screen Map for Mac OS is a suite of plug-ins that enlarge the map display window to fill your screen. This extended visibility lets you see more of the universe at once, without scrolling or zooming out. Compatible with all other plug-ins, and strictly utilitarian, Full Screen Map is a must-have. Version 1.0 made by Qaanol in May, 2006. Contact me via email, Qaanol@Gmail.com

2215.title: Mission BitMap Carbon
2215.author: Anonymous
2215.description: NovaTools: Analyze 'set' and 'test' expressions and bit usage in Escape Velocity Nova plugins. Drag and drop files or folders. This is part of the NovaTools collection from w00tWare and is re-distributed here with permission.

1767.title: Lohengrin
1767.author: Anonymous
1767.description: This plug-in adds a brand new ship, the stolen Lohengrin Federation Battle Carrier. Pic: http://i87.photobucket.com/albums/k128/raycrasher/Lohengrin.jpg  Brought to you by Claimh Solais.

3330.title: Auroran Cruiser Fix
3330.author: Anonymous
3330.description: This plugin repairs an issue with the Auroran Cruiser and EV Nova for Windows.

2109.title: The DarthKev Plug v1 1
2109.author: Anonymous
2109.description: This is an updated version of my original "The DarthKev Plug." It sports several improvements including new PICTs for various aspects and a new character. Nothing is added or removed, just improved. I figured the original made the game a little too easy. By DarthKev.

2222.title: MissionComputer402
2222.author: Anonymous
2222.description: By David Arthur. MissionComputer is a comprehensive editor for the Escape Velocity games. Version 4 adds ship and weapon editors, and the ability to edit several resources at once - 4.0.2 adds multiple selection in the graphical editor, makes some windows remember their positions, and fixes several bugs. Requires Mac OS 10.3 or higher on Intel or PowerPC.

3210.title: SpinApp 7
3210.author: EVWeb
3210.description: SpinApp takes one image and creates a spin out of it, or takes multiple images and puts them into a spin. Features drag n drop support, alpha channel extraction, and more!  New features in this version include revamped error dialogs, saving in PNG format instead of PICT, and other random changes.  SpinApp requires Java to run, which you can get here: http://java.com/ For support and updates go to http://www.galacticsw.com/ or for just support the Ambrosia Forums.

3322.title: Rebel Yell 1.3.4
3322.author: TonyR
3322.description: This is the latest and last version. It is a continuation of the Rebel story line, particularly the Rebel II story. As before there are 45 missions with a couple minor branches, a few big battles, new systems, governments, and a bunch of dumb jokes in this story.   This latest version adds a few new outfits, a couple new ships and a few small missions. It also fixes some grammar and adds a few descriptions. Contact me at rice9262@roadrunner if you have any comments

3374.title: ASW Broccoli Logo
3374.author: JoshTigerheart
3374.description: Did you love Ambrosia's logo in April where it went green for a day?  Thanks to JoshTigerheart's Department of Useless Plugs, now you can have that healthy green vegetable represent Ambrosia every time you start up Nova!  This plug-in should be compatible with just about every one of them out there, even a total conversion!

3386.title: Ten Bays 1.0 .rez
3386.author: DrKillemQuik
3386.description:
This is my first plug-in and its a super cheat plugin for Bays. I made bays for Ten different ships that dont normally get to be in a Bay. Ships are;   Raven,   Thunderforge,    Vellos javelin,    Wraith Adult,   Fed Carrier Heavy Fighter variant,    Fed Patrolboat Gunship class,    Arora Carrier,    Unrelenting,    Krypt Pod,    Pirate Carrier Heavy Weapons.      I made them all with no cost or mass + theres 100 of each.

The pictures are all wrong but the Bays and Ships work completely fine.




           Use my plug-in at your will, credit not needed. -DrKillemQuik

3403.title: ColdFusion for Nova Planets Fix v1.0 (Mac/Windows)
3403.author: CapnRobinson
3403.description:
This file fixes the planets in the latest version of ColdFusion to work with the latest version of EV Nova (v1.1.0).

The original plug-in used PICT graphics for the planets, which are no longer supported by EV Nova. This file includes the original planets converted to the new sprite format (rleD). None of the plug\'s original content has been changedâ€”this simply makes the planets work as they were intended.

Fix generated by CapnRobinson.

3415.title: Miscellaneous Missiles
3415.author: Matthew
3415.description: This plugin adds 3 missiles.  They don\'t just blow up your enemy, they do it with style.  I am pretty sure this plugin is compatible with Plug Pack v18.  These are not very balanced.  If for some crazy reason you want to use these in one of your plugins (I don\'t know why you would) just give me credit.  The outfits do not have descriptions or pictures. (I am bad at those)

3413.title: MissionComputer
3413.author: David Arthur
3413.description: MissionComputer is a scenario & plug-in editor for the Escape Velocity games. Version 4.2.1 improves the functionality of the government classes window and the oÃ¼tf and wÃ«ap editors, and fixes known bugs. (Requires Mac OS 10.3 or higher.)

1459.title: Anathema v1.2.1
1459.author: Anonymous
1459.description: Anathema Ch. 2 v1.2.1  This download replaces the old Anathema files (any version), updating it to v1.2.1.  It fixes various bugs and comes with a few features, including the 50+ page walkthrough and new copies of the pilot files.  This is the recommended method of patching Anathema.  It has been more thoroughly tested and is more full-featured than the Fixer-Upper.  Make sure to remove the v1.1 Fixer-Upper if it is installed.  Mac format, Windows users will need to convert.

1441.title: 3DShieldBubbles107
1441.author: Anonymous
1441.description:
The 3-D Shield Bubbles plug-in adds a 3-D looking shield glow to all EV:N 1.0.7 ships. The plug consists of 15 sizes of PICT shield glow graphics and all 288 EV:N 1.0.7 shän with the appropriate size shield glow specified.
Alexander Salokat : a.salokat@web.de

1615.title: EVO Facelift
1615.author: Anonymous
1615.description: v1.0.3. This plug-in set is a graphical facelift for EV Override for Nova. Features include awesome 3D ship and weapon sprites, redesigned high-quality explosion graphics, Nova-sized landing, shipyard, and outfit pics, and other additions and effects. Fully compatible with both Mac and Windows. Uploaded by Guy.

3358.title: MissionComputer
3358.author: David Arthur
3358.description: MissionComputer 4.2 is a scenario & plug-in editor for the Escape Velocity games. Version 4.2 adds the ability to tabulate a government's class memberships, allies, and enemies; a more effective STR# editor and Window menu; and several smaller improvements. (Requires Mac OS 10.3 or higher.)

1324.title: skippercheat2
1324.author: Anonymous
1324.description: This is an update/expansion to skippercheat1, which fixes a few problems, and adds two plugins, one which allows you to start off with just about any original ship, and the other makes all outfits(except ones that do the same thing, but with diff. names) and and all weapons(again the same) free, unlimited, no mass, and no drawbacks.  Please tell me any errors you find, and give me ideas for more plugins. griffy208@aol.com

2044.title: small fighters weapons.sit
2044.author: Anonymous
2044.description: This plug makes the graphics for "fighter" type ships and weapon shots smaller so that their size looks more realistic relative to the size of capital ships.

2015.title: Shields
2015.author: Anonymous
2015.description: Mega Shield Bubbles adds shield bubbles to every non-alien ship in the game. There are 7 different shield types (one for each faction), all of which are unique from each other. Gone are the simple re-colors there is a difference in texture from shield to shield, along with the usual color differences. I have tested this plugin extensively on my Mac, and have no idea how it will run on a Windows. For your convenience, I have both Mac and Windows plugins in the same package. Questions, Comments, or Concerns (or Death Threats) go to snodbytch@cox.net (please excuse my vulgar address)

1458.title: Anathema Chapter Two
1458.author: Anonymous
1458.description: Anathema Chapter Two, by Archon.  Welcome to Chapter Two of Archon's Anathema Trilogy! After guiding the economic and scientific policies of the Federation, the Director's attention turns to solidifying the Bureau's stranglehold over the rest of Humanity. Decide when to strike and when to stay your hand, gain allies and burn bridges, and lead the forces of the Federation to glorious victory. However, while you tighten your grasp around the last pockets of resistance, you may find that all is not as it seems. This plugin replaces the original Anathema Teaser. (Mac format, Windows users will need to convert.)

1605.title: EVN Battle Arena
1605.author: Anonymous
1605.description: EV:N Battle Arena has a single purpose: to provide an Arena that will allow the player to test their piloting skills against "super-ships" more powerful than anything currently in Nova (with the possible exception of ATMOS ships, et. al.). It is designed particularly to be challenging, providing some more difficulty and entertainment after one of the Six Major Strings has been completed. This is version 1.1, uploaded on December 11th, 2007. It was created by Kenneth "GutlessWonder" Webb. The .zip archive should contain two (2) files: "EVNBattleArenaReadMe.htm" and "EVNBattleArena.bin". Windows users will need to convert the .bin plug-in to be able to play -- instructions are included in the read-me file.

2013.title: ShieldBubbles1.0
2013.author: Anonymous
2013.description: The ShieldBubble1.0 plug-in adds shield glow to all EV:N 1.0.2 ships.  The plug consists of 15 sizes of rl8/rlD shield glow graphics and all 284 EV:N 1.0.2 shnÕs with the appropriate size shield glow specified.  Provided by bit-banger Arturo.

1446.title: AACPaintStationPrime104.sit
1446.author: Anonymous
1446.description: An update of ArcAngel Counterstrikes Paint Station Prime.  Compatible with 1.0.4.  This version also adds another station in the Aurora system, a new landing pic and another colour.  Updated by Nibbs.

1834.title: NewFederation.sit
1834.author: Anonymous
1834.description: This plug-in will allow you to purchase the capital rebel ships (without being attacked by federation ships) after finishing the rebel storyline. It also makes some outfits of the rebels legal. In my opinion this isn't a cheat because i don't think that a federation under the command of the former rebel leaders will forbid the rebel ships. Remember, it works only after finishing the storyline. Version 1.1 made by bmac (bmac@gmx.ch)

2181.title: AbsoluteMinimum
2181.author: Anonymous
2181.description:
This is a file for all you new gods out there.
You can drop this into an empty Nova Files folder and work on your TC in the Plugins folder. This'll mostly gaurantee that Nova loads, giving you a clean slate to work of off.
-Artanis

1548.title: Cunjo Hunter
1548.author: Anonymous
1548.description:
Tired of waiting in your ship that Charengo comes back to tell you that it's finished, you have to go back to Earth ?
Want to have your arm ripped by a fierce Cunjo ? Want to blow up two Cunjos ? Finally, want the "Cunjo Hunter" rank ?
Then this Plug-In is for You ! It make the Mission wich give you the funny rank available 100% of the time (instead of 5%) and makes the second one unavailable (wich was available 25% of the time).
I didn't make it in french because... don't know where the mïsn dësc are.

Feedbacks, comments, help in french translation/lessons, anything you want to tell me : bob.styxrun@laposte.net

1276.title: OddArmor
1276.author: Anonymous
1276.description: Tired of taking those advanced missions in a weak little ship, then being destroyed before you can even get out of the system? This plug-in fixes that, adding an outfit called the Odd Armor, available everywhere for 10 credits per layer. Maxing this outfit out effectively makes you invincible, while only getting one or two makes you powerful, yet still vulnerable. 500 layers max for a total of 5000 credit cost, no weight. Tell me what you think! PSOCringe@comcast.net, be sure to put "Nova" in the subject line, or I will just delete it.

1537.title: Colosseum 1.2 Part 2
1537.author: Anonymous
1537.description: JoshTigerheart's Department of Total Conversions presents to you the first Escape Velocity Nova TC to be released in years: Colosseum! Colosseum is a small, combat-oriented TC that has seen two years of development time to bring one solid, challenging gameplay package. Experience combat on the EV engine as never before with Colosseum's selection of interesting weapons and ships, as well as the ability to customize your fighter down to essential components such as the engine and shield generator. However, though the focus is on winning battles to advance your rank, other groups are at work, and Colosseum features a storyline to go along with your progress. The Colosseum Part 2 package includes CTC Graphics and CTC Dev Screenshots. Many people have contributed to the development of this total conversion see the full credits both in-game and in the readme for all who participated even a tiny amount. This TC is in Mac format: Windows users will need to convert. Got questions, comments, bug reports, or planetary tribute? Look through the contact information found in the readme. Make sure to download Part 1 as well! Also, this is a complete update and replaces all older files.

1918.title: PolyconGraphics4 v1.0.sit
1918.author: Anonymous
1918.description:
Polycon EV is a total conversion for EV Nova featuring all new ships, outfits, systems, etc.  More information and screenshots can be found at the Polycon EV website...
http://www.evula.org/anubis/index.html

By AnubisTTP (arrakis666@yahoo.com)
NOTE: also requires Polycon EV v1.0, PolyconShips v1.0, PolyconGraphics v1.0, PolyconGraphics2 v1.0, and PolyconGraphics3 v1.0.

1909.title: Polycon EVv1.2PC
1909.author: Anonymous
1909.description:
Polycon EV is a total conversion for EV Nova featuring all new ships, outfits, systems, etc. More information and screenshots can be found at the Polycon EV website... http://www.evula.org/anubis/index.html By AnubisTTP (arrakis666@yahoo.com). PC conversion by Belthazar. 

NOTE: also requires PolyconShipsPC, PolyconGraphics1PC, and PolyconGraphics2PC.

2226.title: MissionComputer9-301
2226.author: Anonymous
2226.description: By David Arthur. A scenario editor for the three Escape Velocity games, which provides graphical editors for the char, cron, desc, dude, flet, govt, intf, junk, misn, nebu, outf, pers, PICT, syst, spob, STR, STR, and year resources, and RDL- or template-based editors for all others. Includes integrated Resource Copier and Target Generator utilities. (3.0.1 Classic Edition)

2120.title: Tournament.sit
2120.author: Anonymous
2120.description: This is basically a useless plugin, all it lets you do is watch MASSIVE!! fleet battles between the 6 major governments. It's really fun to watch! This plugin was made by Raven, any questions, comments, bugs ect. e-mail me a ravelnze@yahoo.com.au

2159.title: Warship Leviathan.zip
2159.author: Anonymous
2159.description: Josh Tigerheart presents a first: a useful plug! It's a miracle, don't you agree? At any rate, have you ever caught yourself wondering why there isn't a Leviathan that utilizes all that space to turn it into a powerful warship? Now there is! By sacrificing over half it's cargo space, this new Leviathan is armed to the teeth and is ready to haul cargo in dangerous areas, protect your freighters, or even lead unsuspecting pirates into a death trap. Please note that it uses Warship as it's escort A.I. Therefore, it cannot carry cargo for you if its an escort. On the bright side, it will go and kill things for you. Questions, comments, and especially bug reports should be sent to TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com. As usual, the plug is in Windows format. Mac users will need a converter to use it. A special thanks to those who helped me with a few things to get this plug working is included in the read me.  Nobody was able to download the previous version, so hopefully this one will work.

1535.title: Colosseum 1.1 Part 2
1535.author: Anonymous
1535.description: JoshTigerheart's Department of Total Conversions presents to you the first Escape Velocity Nova TC to be released in years:  Colosseum!  Colosseum is a small, combat oriented TC that has seen two years of development time to bring one solid, challenging gameplay package.  Experience combat on the EV engine as never before with Colosseum's selection of interesting weapons and ships, as well as the ability to customize your fighter down to essential components such as the engine and shield generator  However, though the focus is on winning battles to advance your rank, other groups are at work and Colosseum features a storyline to go along with your progress.  The Colosseum Part 2 package includes CTC Graphics and CTC Dev Screenshots.  Many people have contributed to the development of this total conversion, see the full credits both in-game and in the readme for all who participated even a tiny amount.  This TC is in Mac format, Windows users will need to convert.  Got questions, comments, bug reports, or planetary tribute?  Look through the contact information found in the readme.  Make sure to download Part 1 as well!  Also, this is a complete update and replaces all older files.

2220.title: MissionComputer400
2220.author: Anonymous
2220.description: By David Arthur. MissionComputer is a comprehensive editor for the Escape Velocity games. Version 4 adds ship and weapon editors, and the ability to edit several resources at once. Requires Mac OS 10.3 or higher on Intel or PowerPC.

1547.title: CSENewSwitzerland.sit
1547.author: Anonymous
1547.description:
What is the most stunning thing in this plug-in?
Some think the Stock Options are a must, while others prefer the Red Cross, and its Lottery. Scientists vote for the Pulsating Neutron Star, and engineers for the CSE Research Facility and its Techplorer.
But the players certainly prefer the first-ever released missions where YOU really decide what you want to do. In the minor Swiss United Banks string, you will be trusted with valuables, and it will be up to you to either deliver them as promised, or to betray the trust of your employer and make easy money but beware of the jail and of the bounty hunters!
With about 200 enhancing resources, this self-sufficient plug-in is a teaser for the major New Switzerland Plug-in soon to be released!
[soon = indefinite duration, ranging from minutes to years]

2132.title: Unity Part 2.sit
2132.author: Anonymous
2132.description: This is the second chapter of the Unity Series.  Unity Part 2 adds 12 additional missions to the Vell-os storyline.  They deal with the final defeat of the Bureau after the suicide of Commander Krane as well as the final union of humanity (thus the title of the plugin).  Also included is an updated version of Unity Part 1, which adds 12 additional missions to the Polaris storyline which deal with an ancient enemy of the Wraith and how Ory'hara truly unites Humanity.  Both parts feature new ships, weapons and telepathic abilities, systems, planets and much more.  Enjoy! Part Two released 7/29/03.  Send questions and comments to AGS848@AOL.com.  Requires EV Nova for Mac version 1.0.6

2229.title: MissionComputer9-320
2229.author: Anonymous
2229.description: By David Arthur. A scenario editor for the three Escape Velocity games, which provides graphical editors for many resources and RDL scripts for all others. Supports standard and .rez plug-in formats, and includes integrated Resource Copier, Target Generator, Plug-in Generator, and Make RLE utilities. (Classic Mac OS PowerPC/68K version 3.2)

1703.title: Hit This 1.1
1703.author: Anonymous
1703.description: Hit This! update brought to you by Josh Tigerheart's Department of Utterly Useless Plugs! This plug makes weapons travels across the screen three times as slow. Sounds like a cheat right? WRONG! The A.I. can evade just as easily as you can, not to mention your shots travel slow enough to where hitting things can become very difficult. Not even 2x mode will help much.  This version, as you probably expect, updates the plug for Nova 1.09. Email me at TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com should you have anything useful or useless to say. The plug, like the last three, is made with EVNew, so therefore is in WinEVN format. Mac users need a converter.

3369.title: New Side Bars
3369.author: Josh "Hellraizer" begent
3369.description: This is not a plugin but just three images that you can use in your plugins. It includes a new fed side bar, a new auroran side bar, and a template so you can make rebel side bars or side bars for plugins that include new races.

1333.title: Startwithanyship2.sit
1333.author: Anonymous
1333.description: Finally, after months of false leads and speculation, Startwithanyship2 is out!  Made by the same guy who made the first Startwithanyship. This new version is bigger, badder and a MUST HAVE.  Features Include:  [-] 200+ NOVA Ships Variants. That's 150 more than the original! [-] 5 Million Credits in the beginning, as opposed to the 2 Million in the previous version!  [-] Start off With a "Frightening" Combat Rating!  [-] Variant names as seen on NPC's.  Simply choose the ship you want when creating a new file under "Background" and Go! Then, when you're done, REMOVE THE PLUG. It's that easy. Any Questions? Contact me at my new e-mail bassman2k4@yahoo.com

2171.title: World-of-the-Wraith-1.5.sit
2171.author: Anonymous
2171.description: World of the Wraith 1.5. The new mission string, with new ships, planets, systems, graphics, new dudes, governments, pers, and, basically everything. The new mission string is now complete in version 1.5, for all those who downloaded 1 or 1.0.2. Also, i used a special grammar program, and spell checker, and I made a new spob graphic too. Have fun playing WORLD OF THE WRAITH.... an experience to remember. email- saaciplank@hotmail.com (the other one take 3 days to get to me) (by the other one, I mean bug_reports_and_comments@saaciplank.co.uk) thanks.

2010.title: SGCharacters
2010.author: Anonymous
2010.description: This is a fairly simple plug-in created for those who don't want to start a new game in a shuttle. This plug-in adds 10 new start characters with a variety of different ships. E-mail me with any comments/suggestions/requests at SomeGuy2382@mac.com.

1257.title: MacGnG EVN Plug
1257.author: Anonymous
1257.description: this is a crazy awsome plug in. THIS IS A CHEAT! u get alot of money and there is a secret weapon of death.... so cool! outfits are CHEAP and powerful, and one of the ships is tricked out, i'll let you find all the goodies.  HAVE FUN :)

1473.title: Arpia v1.1 for PC
1473.author: Anonymous
1473.description:
Arpia version 1.1 for PC. This is an updated version of the "Arpia tale of an agency" plug-in. It includes outfit balance (energy drainage, reload time, free space, ), fixes small problems (purchasing ships) and makes many descriptions a little longer, making the plug-in a little more of a story.
"Hello, my name is Ekrid Malrow, and I represent the company known as the Anti-Raider and Pirate Intelligence Agency, Arpia for short.  Arpia offers its services everywhere in space.  We are here for the protection of Traders and other non-military people" This plug-in adds a whole new major storyline to EV Nova. It adds more than 43 missions, 18 outfits (6 weapons), a new government with its own system. Become the most powerful warrior in the universe by meeting lead figures of the age, forging alliances, helping make military/technological associations and more Made by Pace [haldora] (pacehaldora@hotmail.com) © 2004 M.D.U.

2235.title: MissionComputerX-310
2235.author: Anonymous
2235.description: By David Arthur. A scenario editor for the three Escape Velocity games, which provides graphical editors for many resources and RDL scripts for all others. Includes integrated Resource Copier, Target Generator, Plug-in Generator, and Make RLE utilities. (Mac OS X PowerPC version 3.1)

2216.title: MissionComputer331-9
2216.author: Anonymous
2216.description: By David Arthur. A wide-ranging scenario and resource editor for the three Escape Velocity games. This latest version features re-arranged editors for easier access and a number of other improvements. (3.3.1 Classic Edition)

2091.title: STNTFFplug 01v4.sitx
2091.author: Anonymous
2091.description: Introducing the first teaser from the STN: The Final Frontier Development project. This plug allows you to buy an intrepid class star ship from most shipyards and includes a few other goodies. For Mac and Windows Versions. This download is for Mac. Email can be sent to stntff@startrekaccess.com

2212.title: MacPluginConvertor101
2212.author: Anonymous
2212.description: By David Arthur. This simple utility converts EV Nova plug-ins from the Windows '.rez' format back into standard Macintosh plug-ins, now with improved support for EVNEW-made plug-ins. (1.0.1 for both Mac OS X and Classic)

1242.title: Inertialess Striker
1242.author: Anonymous
1242.description: This cheater plug-in makes the default "New Pilot" character have the Inertialess Striker, one of the more elusive, rare ships out there. Made with Windows, works around the single-character bug. Macs obviously need the plug-in convertor. You can e-mail the author, MoveZig, at speedybug256@gmail.com.

1237.title: HellhoundsUnleashed v1.0
1237.author: Anonymous
1237.description:
this is a simple plugin, that just expands the amount of hellhound launchers and missles you can have. Now you can have up to 6 launchers, and up to one thousand hellhound missles. That should satisfy your craving for lightweight mass dectruction.

Note: the availability and requirements of these outfits remain the same.

should be compatable with most othe plugins.

1472.title: Arpia v1.1 for Mac.sit
1472.author: Anonymous
1472.description:
Arpia version 1.1 for Mac. This is an updated version of the "Arpia tale of an agency" plug-in. It includes outfit balance (energy drainage, reload time, free space, ), fixes small problems and makes many descriptions a little longer, making the plug-in a little more of a story.
"Hello, my name is Ekrid Malrow, and I represent the company known as the Anti-Raider and Pirate Intelligence Agency, Arpia for short.  Arpia offers its services everywhere in space.  We are here for the protection of Traders and other non-military people" This plug-in adds a whole new major storyline to EV Nova. It adds more than 43 missions, 18 outfits (6 weapons), a new government with its own system. Become the most powerful warrior in the universe by meeting lead figures of the age, forging alliances, helping make military/technological associations and more Made by Pace [haldora] (pacehaldora@hotmail.com) © 2004 M.D.U.

1973.title: rEV.sit
1973.author: Anonymous
1973.description: After a much to long a wait I know, rEVisited is here.  For those who don't know rEV is a graphics update meant to be used with the EV Classic port.  It is a three-parter, and not stand alone, it will require the installation of the classic port found here:  http://www.ambrosiasw.com/cgi-bin/vftp/dl-redirect.pl/mac_evnova_classic.sit?path=evn/essentialsfile=mac_evnova_classic.sit  Made by KMQ -- kmq at damnsw dot net. Mac only - Windows users will need to convert it.

2265.title: SpinAppv2
2265.author: Anonymous
2265.description:
Mac OS X version of SpinApp.  A small application that shows an open dialog that can take multiple images, or just one. Depending on the choice it will combine the images into a spin, or it will create a 6x6 spin from one image, then it will ask where to save the new spin. The new spin will be saved as a pict. Can extract mask from transparency and no longer screws up with transparency.
Check for updates at: http://evweb.aresaxis.us/
Email: ajwweb@earthlink.net

1656.title: Galactic Grocers
1656.author: Anonymous
1656.description:
This Galactic Grocers by Of Doom. I have always thought there wasn't enough trading in EVN. so you can now be a grocery courier. This is my first plugin so try to judge accordingly. Please report any bugs to me at johnbraxton@sympatico.ca 

Thanks

Of Doom

3323.title: Rebel Yell for Windows
3323.author: Tony Rice
3323.description: This is the version for Windows. It is a continuation of the Rebel story line, particularly the Rebel II story. As before there are 45 missions with a couple minor branches, a few big battles, new systems, governments, and a bunch of dumb jokes in this story.   This version adds a few new outfits, a couple new ships and a few small missions. It also fixes some grammar and adds a few descriptions. Contact me at rice9262@roadrunner if you have any comments

1908.title: Polycon EV v1.0.sit
1908.author: Anonymous
1908.description:
Polycon EV is a total conversion for EV Nova featuring all new ships, outfits, systems, etc.  More information and screenshots can be found at the Polycon EV website...
http://www.evula.org/anubis/index.html

By AnubisTTP (arrakis666@yahoo.com)
NOTE: also requires PolyconShips v1.0, PolyconGraphics1 v1.0, and PolyconGraphics2 v1.0.

1530.title: Cold Fusion for Nova.sit
1530.author: Anonymous
1530.description: Featuring the creative talents of the late, great Dreamwave Studios, here is Cold Fusion for Nova (1.0.0), the approved port of the graphics modification plug that brought Override to a new level. Designed to improve the experience of playing the official port of Override to Nova without hugely changing gameplay, CFN features completely modified and retextured variants of Overrides original ship models, 3/4 sprites, new planet graphics, professional landscapes, aqua buttons, eye-popping explosion effects, distributed turret placements and more - all in thousands of brilliant colors rather than the 256 of Override and the (unmodified) EVO to N port. Its the same universe it just looks better. Read all about it and check out a few previews at http://home.comcast.net/~drtrowel/

1945.title: RealmOfPrey Nova
1945.author: Anonymous
1945.description: Realm of Prey for EV Nova is a port of Tim Isles's classic TC for Escape Velocity. The tale is set in a galaxy administered by the benevolent Earth Confederacy which, after decades of successful expansion, has evolved into little more than an anachronism that is beginning to crumble and fall apart at the seams. True galactic power lies in the form of powerful pirate guilds, expansionist transgalactic megacorporations, and a mysterious xenophobic splinter faction. The plug boasts a whopping 220 original missions, 65 new weapons and outfits, over 100 brand new worlds and systems to explore, and 54 new and altered ships. The Nova edition also features several enhancements, including ship variants, mineable asteroids, and improved gameplay.  Please read the support documentation before attempting to play! This port (Version 1.0) was made by MacDevil and submitted to the addons page on 8/3/08. Enjoy!

1914.title: PolyconGraphics2 v1.0.sit
1914.author: Anonymous
1914.description:
Polycon EV is a total conversion for EV Nova featuring all new ships, outfits, systems, etc.  More information and screenshots can be found at the Polycon EV website...
http://www.evula.org/anubis/index.html

By AnubisTTP (arrakis666@yahoo.com)
NOTE: also requires Polycon EV v1.0, PolyconShips v1.0, PolyconGraphics v1.0, PolyconGraphics3 v1.0, and PolyconGraphics4 v1.0.

1818.title: MultipleStrings.sit
1818.author: Anonymous
1818.description: Version 1.1 of the Multiple Strings plugin.  Significantly debugged.  Will now allow you to complete all 6 major strings while keeping the access to all the ships and outfits.  Any questions or comments can be sent to aiellc@nycap.rr.com

1368.title: WIN-Hypergate fix
1368.author: Anonymous
1368.description: WIN plug: This reactivates all(most all) the dead hypergates and reconnects them to the network in a logical fashion. I know there are two other similar plugs, but this one is for WIN EVN. Also includes an expensive "Forged Hypergate Pass" outfit. It will get you unlimited access to the Hypergate network... Just be sure to dodge Bureau and Dechtakar scans -- they want it as badly as you do! kudos to Trooper1023 at bjhaberman@prodigy.net

3427.title: cargotanks
3427.author: mercury software
3427.description: I don\'t know if this has every ben made before, so i made a plug that adds extra fuel in exchange for cargo space.

1536.title: Colosseum 1.2 Part 1
1536.author: Anonymous
1536.description: JoshTigerheart's Department of Total Conversions presents to you the first Escape Velocity Nova TC to be released in years: Colosseum! Colosseum is a small, combat-oriented TC that has seen two years of development time to bring one solid, challenging gameplay package. Experience combat on the EV engine as never before with Colosseum's selection of interesting weapons and ships, as well as the ability to customize your fighter down to essential components such as the engine and shield generator. However, though the focus is on winning battles to advance your rank, other groups are at work, and Colosseum features a storyline to go along with your progress The Colosseum Part 1 package includes CTC Essentials, CTC Base, a new Nova Music.mp3, the Official Colosseum Strategy Guide, and the all-important and often neglected Readme (MAKE SURE TO READ IT!). Many people have contributed to the development of this total conversion see the full credits both in-game and in the readme for all who participated even a tiny amount. This TC is in Mac format: Windows users will need to convert. Got questions, comments, bug reports, or planetary tribute? Look through the contact information found in the readme. Make sure to download Part 2 as well! Also, this is a complete update and replaces all older files.

1348.title: SuperCheats2.7
1348.author: Anonymous
