1348.description: Well I finally got around to making version 2.7.  This version adds 4 new ships (2 of which are by me) and a universal map.  This version is also compatable with Nova 1.0.1.  For those of you who don't know this is a plug-in that adds many very powerful ships and weapons to the game.  It also adds a mission that will give you A LOT of money.  Questions...comments...suggestions email me at CeRD@mac.com.  Enjoy!

3353.title: Holiday Torpedoes v.2.1
3353.author: Michael Llenos
3353.description: These red, green, blue, and purple torpedoes, I believe, are fun to fire off during the Holiday Season. Enjoy!

2009.title: sfa teaser.sit
2009.author: Anonymous
2009.description: Starfleet Adventures Teaser -- This plug allows you to create a new pilot that can fly a "Constitution" class starship and fight Klingon D-7s and Romulan Birds of Prey from the original Star Trek series, to give you a tiny, tiny taste of what the upcoming Starfleet Adventures TC is like. This will not allow you to play the standard Nova scenario, nor is it compatible with other plugs. For Macintosh -- Windows users will need to convert the file. Please post bug reports or comments on the SFA discussion board at http://www.ev-nova.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=145

1318.title: Salvo Weapons
1318.author: Anonymous
1318.description: Want to make the game more interesting without messing with the stats of all these ships and weapons or by adding a whole lot of stuff?  This is the plug you are looking for!  Salvo Weapons makes every weapon in the standard game fire at the same time.  See the read me included to learn about some of the effects.  This absurdly simple plug has such a large effect on the game, you'll notice it the moment you or someone else starts shooting.  This plug was made with EVNew, so therefore its PC.  Mac users need to use a converter.  Questions/Comments/Bug Reports/Death Threats should be sent to:  TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com  All email with attachments will be deleted on sight.

1550.title: Dark Kestrel v1.1
1550.author: Anonymous
1550.description: v1.1. of Dark Kestrel contains updates to the original, including some inconsistancies I had to fix, new weapon(s) I added, and a surprise for those with Mission Computer. Download and spread some new Kestrels around, for fun's sake. by Arjjea Deonnas/for comments, questions and answers e-mail me at dpolsuch@charter.net

1460.title: AnathemaTeaserMac
1460.author: Anonymous
1460.description: This is the Teaser for Archon's upcoming plug-in Anathema.  Anathema follows the events after the player's rise to the head of the Bureau of Internal Investigation.  While the Teaser is mostly prologue to the major events that will take place in the full version, there is still quite a bit to do.  Anathema gives the player much more direct control over the Federation.  Do you fund research into new military technologies?  Or increased border patrols?  Or do you just divert credits directly into your personal account?  Of course, there is plenty of Nova-style storytelling and some fun blow stuff up missions to be had as well to keep players entertained along the way!  You are the Director.  What is your will? (Mac format, Windows users will need to convert. Made by Archon.)

3375.title: Defense Laser
3375.author: Anonymous
3375.description: This plug adds a new outfit called the defense laser.

3401.title: EV MAGMA: Nova v2.0 (Mac/Windows)
3401.author: CapnRobinson
3401.description: Orignally released by meowx in 2001, EV MAGMA is a complete overhaul for the sounds and graphics of Escape Velocity. Now this great plug-in has been ported to EV Nova Classic, featuring all new ship, weapon, outfit, interface, and planet graphics, as well as new sounds and music! This version of the plug is an update for EV Nova 1.1.0 compatibility. Ported to EV Classic for Nova by CapnRobinson. (www.andrewtc.com)

2131.title: Unity Part1.sit
2131.author: Anonymous
2131.description: This plugin adds 12 additional missions to the end of the Polaris storyline.  They deal with an ancient enemy of the Wraith and how Ory'hara truly unites Humanity.  This is an updated version containing a bug fix and a new name.  Features, new ships, weapons, systems, planets and much more.  Enjoy.  Part 1(second version) released 9/15/02.  Created by MacDevil.  Send questions and comments to AGS848@AOL.com.

1637.title: FighterVariants.sit
1637.author: Anonymous
1637.description: This plugin fixes the bug in Nova where regular fighter bays eat fighters from variant bays. That is, if you have an Auroran Anaconda Bay, and you recall your Auroran Anaconda, it gets turned into a regular Anaconda, which you won't be able to launch. The file is huge because of the people who made the engine, not because of me. Also, keep in mind that that's all this plugin fixes. You'll still have to go about getting variant bays the same way (that is, capture a Rebel Destroyer Carrier). The plus side is that this plugin should be very compatible. Talk to me at dbrauer@hfx.andara.com

1281.title: pHultradrive.sit
1281.author: Anonymous
1281.description: pH Ultradrive is a simple plug that changes the "Overdrive" outfit in several fundamental ways. #1, it kicks butt now your Polaris Raven or Fed Carrier will now move quite a bit faster than a Manta. Whoah Nelly. #2, it costs 4 million credits, and is available everywhere. Incompatible with the plug, "All Items Available," I think... but should work with most others that don't also try to modify the Overdrive. If you already have an Overdrive from before -- lucky you -- it will now become Ultradrive free of charge.   ----- =philter= ------

1539.title: CombatDroneAAC
1539.author: Anonymous
1539.description: Combat Drone is a fairly simple modification. Creates a new weapon (Combat Drones) and the Bay to hold them along with the weapon it uses. a short range turreted beam gun. nothing particularly strong or invulnerable so its not a cheat. Graphics by ArcAngelCounterstrike

3190.title: The DarthKev Plug
3190.author: DarthKev
3190.description: Here's my third edition of The DarthKev Plug. It boasts a few improvements and all the cheats of the previous two versions. But as always, it still balances out in the form of everything being expensive. Very expensive. Remember, feedback is always welcome.

3272.title: Firefly Ship Mod
3272.author: Lindley French
3272.description: This is a preliminary release of content which will be part of Escape Velocity: Firefly. It allows you to fly the Firefly-class transport within the normal Nova scenario. It has not been tested in combination with any other Nova modifications. The Firefly-class transport has specs and a price point roughly based on the Starbridge. The Short-Range Shuttle is also included, and may be purchased as a carried ship for the Firefly. Professional Companion not included.

1311.title: Reset by Raven.sit
1311.author: Anonymous
1311.description:
Finally, it is complete. Reset by Raven allows each pilot who completes a storyline to reset and continue buying upgrades and ships that were previously earned. Thus allowing players to have one pilot who has completed every single mission in the entire game!

If you have any questions, comments or bugs e-mail me at ravelnze@yahoo.com.au

1661.title: Galvenic Pirates 1.sit
1661.author: Anonymous
1661.description: This is my third EVN Mod. This plugin will add a mission string to the game. This plugin is not finished yet it's a release to see if people want to see the rest of the string or not. Send comments to jwillie194@netscape.net (be polite), and rate it on this page. Those two factors will determine whether I will continue or not.

1346.title: SuperCheats2.5
1346.author: Anonymous
1346.description: It's here and better than ever.  This version has 27 SuperShips.  This version has some more ships from the original EV and some from EVO.  It also adds many more from NOVA.  The Borg Cube now has it's own beam (which is very powerful...like everything in SuperCheats).  If you want your own type of SuperShips please email me.  Questions...Comments...suggestions...CeRD@mac.com.  Hope you like the new version.

1395.title: EVN Starmap 0.1
1395.author: Anonymous
1395.description:
This is the first draft of a Starmap I am working on for EVN.  If you wish to print the map you will need to scale it by 150%.  I donât have a lot of time to play so it will be a while until the full galaxy is recorded, but I will update the map from time to time if people find it to be valuable.

It is a work in progress so please e-mail me at wintermute@totallyclassic.com if you notice any errors or omissions.

1619.title: evulas nova 3d targets
1619.author: Anonymous
1619.description: This is my (EVula) 3D targets plugin for Nova. Basically, all it does is change the target graphics of all ships to be something more along the lines of the ship's shipyard picture (the one with the gradient), but without the gradient. I think it looks nice if you don't, well, you can simply throw away the plugin. :)

1743.title: KestrelRevisited
1743.author: Anonymous
1743.description: Kestrel Revisited is a teaser plugin for REVISITED: EV, an upcoming plugin that will Nova-ize everything about EV Classic.  Sorry Windows users, at this time there is no .rez version of this file that will be uploaded.  If someone would like to make one, feel free to contact me.  Jericon@mac.com

1804.title: MissionStringSelector3.sit
1804.author: Anonymous
1804.description: This is a completely new version of the mission string selector, with new features and mission Strings. This version adds the Bounty Hunter Mission String, and the chance to play as McGowan in the unrelenting. Also adds the simplicity of actually giving you the first mission, rather than having to find it. Plugin creeated by Saaci Plank and the guild (Blue Halios, Black Draco, Pete Velluci, and Tor)

1830.title: New Weapons.sit
1830.author: Anonymous
1830.description: These plugs adds several new weapons to the game including, the heavy blaster, a new type of medium blaster, the biorelay laser point defense turret, the wraithii cannon(needs no ammo but drains fuel), and the phased pulse cannon.  They are all on seperate plugs so if you don't like one but like the others its not a problem.  By Nibbs.

1993.title: S7vyn mining.sit
1993.author: Anonymous
1993.description: Isn't the Kestrel unreasonably expensive? I mean, who honestly gets to S7vyn with that much money? Well, here's a way to get that money you need and buy the Kestrel without cheating or ever leaving the system. This plug-in makes a modified Astoroid Miner available at Our Spiel. This allows you to mine the system's asteroid field in order to save up for the Kestrel even if you didn't have any mining equipment when you got there just an alternative to the other Kestrel-getting plugs out there. Mail comments and suggestions (and help with the water glitch) to: sven@team-ir.org

2099.title: sw tnjo teaser 1.sit
2099.author: Anonymous
2099.description:
The very first teaser for the Star Wars: The New Jedi Order plugin!!!!! This teaser replaces the scan graphics and ship graphics of the Fed. Destroyer, Fed. Carrier, IDA Frigate, and Vellos Arrow. --NOTE-- This plug DOES NOT change the stats, only the graphics, of these ships!! Do not expect a full blown Super Star Destroyer!!!
-Made by Gemini14, TNJO Dev. Team Leader

1562.title: Dodge This
1562.author: Anonymous
1562.description:
I like making plugs, so here is another one JoshTigerheart's department of utterly useless plugs.  Ever wanted a real challenge in dodging weapons in the game?  Now you can get that challenge!  Every projectile flies three times as fast in its attempt to collide with your ship to inflict damage upon it.  However, this does not make weapons go three times as far.  Even the quickest of ships or most talented pilots will be pressed to evade those shots speeding across the game.  I do not recommend you play this in x2 mode.  You can find out why on your own.
Questions, comments, compliments, bug reports?  Email me at TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com
Please note that this plug was made with EVNew, so its Windows format.  Mac users need a convertor...again.
Also note that the readme includes important information to anyone who wants to mess with my plug in any way and then post it.  Even if you don't want the plug, it might be a good idea to download this file and read the readme.

1365.title: Various Advanced Devices 3.sit
1365.author: Anonymous
1365.description:
This new release includes 18 outfits and even more weapons.  There are also two new ships which act as escorts: Slowers and Disposable Shields.  The new weapons are either powerful or pointless, depending on your knowledge of their use.  I have also removed all the super cheats except the Mass Disabler, if you can find it.  There should be no bugs except a few difficulties with assigning tech levels.
Feel free to send comments to akleps@earthlink.net
-Klepsacovic

1932.title: PyroGX
1932.author: Anonymous
1932.description:
Remember Descent from all the way back in 1995?  Now, once again, you can fly the Pyro-GX, now in the Nova universe!  Also back are the plasma cannon and fusion cannon!  Contains 1 new ship and 2 new weapons.  Prepare for Descent . . . 
By: Fnoigy.  Pyro-GX v1.0.  
fnoigy@hotmail.com

1259.title: Marine Platoon Improvment.sit
1259.author: Anonymous
1259.description: This is a fix for something I thought very stupid. The Marine Platoon outfit is an outfit that gives you extra crew so you can capture ships, but when you buy it, the engine sells it to you as mass. Since the outfit is people, all I did was change it from instead of it taking up mass now it takes up cargo space.This plug was created by Scarab. If you have any problems or bugs email me at scarab.5@gmail.com.

2259.title: SpinApp
2259.author: Anonymous
2259.description:
Windows version of SpinApp.  A small application that shows an open dialog that can take multiple images, or just one. Depending on the choice it will combine the images into a spin, or it will create a 6x6 spin from one image, then it will ask where to save the new spin. The new spin will be saved as a pict. Can extract mask from transparency and no longer screws up with transparency.
Check for updates at: http://evweb.aresaxis.us/
Email: ajwweb@earthlink.net

1831.title: NewBalance
1831.author: Anonymous
1831.description: The first update of NewBalance, this plug has refined some of the extremes that the original took in the name of gameplay "balance" and now covers a wider selection of armaments.  Like the original, this plug changes only the weapon and outfit resources, leaving most of your other plug-ins completely untouched but still altering the gaming experience.  Do you want a new challange but aren't interested in a TC?  Then feel free to give NewBalance 1.1 a spin!  You can find me at fishloaf@hotmail.com

2262.title: SpinApp4
2262.author: Anonymous
2262.description: A universal program ( can run on any computer that has the java virtual machine installed ). A small application that shows an open dialog that can take multiple images, or just one. Depending on the choice it will combine the images into a spin, or it will create a spin from one image, then it will ask where to save the new spin. The new spin will be saved as a pict. Can extract mask from transparency. This version fixes some problems with the file filter, and adds one or 2 things, also fixes some problems using multiple images. Check for updates at: http://evweb.aresaxis.us/ Email: ajwweb@earthlink.net

3334.title: SkipMerrol 2
3334.author: TonyR
3334.description: This is the second Version of SkipMerrol. In the first one I forgot to include the Merrol missions for the Pirate story. Oops.

2025.title: ShipVariants105.sit
2025.author: Anonymous
2025.description: Now compatible with Nova 1.0.5. This plugin allows you to buy every variant of every ship in Nova. It also permits you to buy variant fighter bays. It is not a cheat, as you have to be able to buy the regular version of a ship before you are allowed to buy its variants. This version works extremely well, and fixes every bug and other issue that was brought to my attention since the first release. I know people who enjoy this plugin so much that they don't play without it. There is a readme included, which explains precisely what has been changed. Talk to me at dbrauer@hfx.andara.com

1321.title: Shivas Bow.zip
1321.author: Anonymous
1321.description:
So, rumor has it there's a new invincible ship in town.  Folks say it looks like a Vell-os Javelin, but suddenly, it's not there, and you get blown out of the sky from dead space.  All right, folks, if you've ever wanted a Vell-os Javelin that could do the Monty Python, cloak, fire while cloaked, destroy just about anything, jump 50 systems in a single bound, have shields that laugh at those pitiful Raven's 4 Capacitor Pulse Lasers, armor that shrugs off those Hellhounds like they were BBs, carry 5000 tons of cargo, and generally beat the crap out of anything that dares to be stupid enough to attack it, all while having the option of being inertialess (for you Monty Python fans who just couldn't bear to have a Vell-os Javelin that can't do it,) suddenly you're in luck.  Oh, and did I forget to mention the price?  A scant nothing?  And that it's worth somewhere in the neighborhood of a couple million?  Talk about holding it's resale value.  So, whether you want to do some ship trading and get a few million in pocket change, or you want to use this MAJOR CHEAT, you can have it right from the get-go, available at any shipyard this side of the galaxy.  Offer void where prohibited tax, title, and license not included.

I made this with EVNEW, sorry Mac users, but you're going to just have to convert.  Questions and comments can be forwarded to pkrug539@dotnet.com, death threats can be forwarded to the White House.  From the devious mind of Peter Kruger.

1486.title: Balance2.0.sit
1486.author: Anonymous
1486.description: The universe has become even more treacherous.  Capital ships now wield a great deal of power and their missiles are faster, longer in range, and carry more of a punch.  As a counter to this threat, most ships have been improved as well.  Balance 2.0 not only modifies ship and weapon attributes (these changes now include almost all the ships, including the Kestrel), it also alters government behavior, adjusts certain descriptions, and changes several outfit parameters.  I want players to think twice before attacking a big Capital ship in a little Class A Starbridge or Thunderhead.  There is now a real "balance" between the range of the railguns and the Hellhound/Gravimetric/EMP missiles (the player can no longer easily skip away and kill the enemy at a distance with complete safety).  Balance 2.0 is recommended for the experienced player whose skill level is high and who may be getting a tad bored.  Balance 2.0 is NOT recommended for the novice player (it will only frustrate you further).  Both the Mac version and the PC .rez file are included.

1878.title: PirateValkV
1878.author: Anonymous
1878.description: A plug made by request of Gorgatun. It adds the Pirate Valkyrie Class V, available for purchase at Pirate Planets. The Pirate Valk V is integrated into several dude resources and a pers, so you should be able to find it yourself. It was made for PC and is in a .rez file. It has not been tested but should be compatible with Macintosh, just make sure to convert.  Made by The Real Darth Bob. therealdarthbob@gmail.com

1803.title: missionstringselector2.sit
1803.author: Anonymous
1803.description: This plugin allows you to chose which mission thread you want to play at the start of the game, saving time, and also allowing you to experience the mission threads you haven't yet done. This version ( 1.0.2 )has fixed a MAJOR bug stopping you from playing the rebel missions, and has fixed a few other things with the vellos missions. plugin created by Saaci Plank

1445.title: AACPaintStationPrime.sit
1445.author: Anonymous
1445.description: Paint Station Prime adds two new stations, one in Sol and one in Kel'ariy. Each offers 17 different paint outfits. AAC

2173.title: WorldOfTheWraith-1.6.sit
2173.author: Anonymous
2173.description:
Right, since i have received exactly 100 complaints to date about bugs in the last version, here is World of the Wraith 1.6.3. Fixes the Polaris Scout Mission 2 bug, adds new weapon, and a few other fixes (see read me)
For new users, this plug adds a new storyline to the game, with new ships, outfits, weapons, systems, planets, missions, and loads more! A must download!

1616.title: EVO Revamp v1
1616.author: Anonymous
1616.description: EVO for Nova Revamped. Version 1 updates the graphics for all the Earth ships, giving them glows and 16bit graphics. Weapons fire from the correct positions instead of just the center of the ship, and I added particle effects to the explosions.

1660.title: Galvenic Pirates.sit
1660.author: Anonymous
1660.description: This is my third EVN Mod. This plugin will add a mission string to the game. There are 37 missions, 6 playable ships including a modified Thunderhead and Fed Destroyer, and many weapons, including my own Nuclear Warhead, a modified Radar missle and ionization turrets. E-Mail me at jwillie194@netscape.net if you have any questions.

1696.title: HeavyWeaponWarshipPackII
1696.author: Anonymous
1696.description: Heavy Weapon Warship Pack II is the NON-CHEAT version of the HeavyWeaponWarshipPack plugin. it includes a few extra goodies and some excellent outfits. All outfits from the original plugin have been modified to make them more balanced. I made this when i recieved a request to make a Version that would be less of a cheat. Instead I went all the way, improved discriptions, added outfits and weapons, more graphics, an Elite Combat Squad (balanced accordingly), 400mm railgun and planetary blaster outfits, and made all aspects of it as balanced as possible.  please see the readme to find out where to get the outfits. It still includes Mindfrelled's stunning graphics.  please email me at MobiusM1@gmail.com with any questions.  Format is Windows EVNEW .rez, and requires the proper converter for use on a mac. plugin by: Cunjo

1725.title: Inertial Damper
1725.author: Anonymous
1725.description:
This is a cool plug-in for all you owners of a Starbridge or other great ship that still want the ability to have an inertial less ship.  This plug will put an outfit in every planet that has an outfitter that you can buy an "Inertial Damper."  The only problem is it cannot be sold and it costs 1.5 Million, but on the bright side it doesn't weigh anything.

Questions, Comments, Constructive Criticism please e-mail at coolrockpro@icqmail.com

This is my first EVN plug-in, so please be gentle :)

2153.title: Veterans Ship
2153.author: Anonymous
2153.description: This plug-in allows you to start the game with any ship that costs less then one million credits (not including the Vell-os.) A few of the ships also have new startings.

2017.title: Ship Hangar for EVC
2017.author: Anonymous
2017.description: Ship Hangar for EVC: Public Version 1.0 - For use with the official port of EV Classic for EVN game engine, this plug-in adds one new station to the Darven system, in the galactic west. The Ship Hangar Station can store up to 2 fully customized ships for the relatively small price of 50,000 credits. Your ships can be retrieved from the station at any point afterwards. See enclosed Read Me for full details. These are .rez files created with EVNEW, Mac users will need to convert them! Comments? Questions? Bugs? Send an email to slouch@stonerrock.net

1849.title: NovaOutfitSpecs
1849.author: Anonymous
1849.description: OutfitSpecs is a very simple pair of plugs. All they do is add in-game specifications to the descriptions for most Nova outfits and weapons displayed in the Outfitter menu. Two versions of Nova outfits and weapons are supported by this addon. The OutfitSpecs106 plug contains specifications for EV:Nova v1.0.6 and the OutfitSpecs108 plug contains specifications for EV:Nova v1.0.8. Windows users will have to convert to .rez format first. Please see the ReadMe.txt file for more details and contact info. Provided by bit-banger Arturo - February 20th, 2005

1504.title: blackholepirates
1504.author: Anonymous
1504.description: This plug-in adds the Black Hole Pirate gang to the galatic north. They have some cool outfits and ships. The centerpiece of the plug is the Pirate Dragon, which isn't unbalanced (surprise!). Made by gray_shirt_ninja. [email removed at author's request]

2014.title: shieldglows
2014.author: Anonymous
2014.description:
This plugin will add shield glows for every ship in EV Nova I have made each government ship have there own color for eg Aurorans have red shields. This plugin hasn't been tested thoroughly as I don't have the resources to test it in wide range of computers. If for any reason you have problems with this plugin email me at Shekky_ca@yahoo.com

I have not made a windows version and if anyone would like to port this let me know the results of your endeavor.

1172.title: 1RebelCheater
1172.author: Anonymous
1172.description: All weapons free and no mass! Star wars and Polaris Ships cheapest here. Bio Relays lasers will dominate any planet with ease. Just add Solar panels. Bug and tech help to katcan@optusnet.com.au

3313.title: EVN Expansion (beta)
3313.author: Arjjea Deonnas
3313.description: The EVN expansion seeks to bring a level of combat realism and immersion by taking existing game factors and tinkering with them extensively.  Combining everything from new and old ship & outfit variant availability to painted faction ships (auroran families, roughnecks, etc) to changing existing outfits to better reflect and enhance gameplay(salvo fire, changed stats, new armor and reactor outfits). There are 6 new starbridge variants, and new systems and planets to explore north and south of the map.  Wraith ships are now purchasable in Polaris space, but only if you can find them.

1618.title: EVula Plug.sit
1618.author: Anonymous
1618.description:
The EVula Plug.  This plug adds EVula to the game, along with a planet dedicated to him which happens to be in its own system, which is dedicated to EVula.  Have fun.
Created by CDRCoyote  Contact me at nyle.buss@public.usa.com

1855.title: Officers1.0.sit
1855.author: Anonymous
1855.description: This plugin adds 6 different types of officers to the game.  They improve various aspects of your ship, depending on their specialty.  I was not planning to release this.  However, several people on the webboard expressed a desire to see a plugin of this type.  Enjoy guys.  Version 1.0 released 7/13/02. Created by MacDevil. Send questions and comments to AGS848@AOL.com.

1426.title: survival guide2
1426.author: Anonymous
1426.description: Here is version 2.0 of the downloadable EVN Survival Guide. It was complied on 4-28-02, so it is as up-to-date as possible. Lots of new and fixed information with this version, so if you have the older version go ahead and download this one. Sorry about the file size, but the Outfitters section has 80 or so graphics that take up a fair amount of space...

1428.title: The Non-Technical EVN Bible
1428.author: Anonymous
1428.description: This is a guide for making better plugins, compiled from 29 experienced plug-in developers including Martin Turner (author of Frozen Heart). It is a complete list of production values that we feel will vastly help developers improve thier plug-ins. This is especially designed by people who are new to plug-in developing, but even some of the most experienced people can learn from it. It's only a few kb, what do you have to lose? Compiled by 21st Century Digital Boy. Port to RTF for PC people by Zacha Pedro (LebPierre(a)wanadoo dot fr).

1447.title: AACPaintTransparencyfix.sit
1447.author: Anonymous
1447.description: This is for AAC Paint Station Prime. It simply makes the Vell-os and Wraith ships not  transparent, so the paint outfits work correctly for them.  AAC

1452.title: Adzara-Lightning 1.1
1452.author: Anonymous
1452.description:
Version 1.1 of Adzara-Lightning fixes the bug that prevented the player from using the Rebel Lightning Bay.

As an old EV: Override veteran, I was overjoyed by EV: Nova. But there were some things that I missed about EVO, one of which was the best fighter in the game: the Adzara. It was unique be relying on shield regeneration rate rather than heavy shielding - it was very easy to get it's shields down to almost nothing, but let it out of your weapon's range for a few seconds and you'd be back to square one. This plug-in modifies the Lightning to fill this role - the shields are cut almost in half, but the regeneration rate is more than enough to make up for it, and I also included a Lightning Bay if you work for the Rebels. By 21st Century Digital Boy.

1454.title: Aggressor.sit
1454.author: Anonymous
1454.description:
This plugin adds one outfit: the Aggressor system, available on Viking. Basically, all it does is make another ship mad at you. This is useful for:

-Challenging that big, fat, juicy Manticore that is about to jump out before you can get to it
-Luring a nonhostile ship (such as Krane's Valkyrie) away from its slower, heavily armed escorts

1864.title: Outofammo.sit
1864.author: Anonymous
1864.description: Out of ammo makes any weapons that you are out of ammo for skipped over during selection, giving you a slight upper hand during real-time battle when you need to get the right weapon as fast as possible. Every little bit counts, and it's not cheating.

1961.title: ReMain-Edited.sit
1961.author: Anonymous
1961.description: In the original ReMain, you could restart your pilot and start new mission strings, though with the same ship, but you were stripped of about 98% of your money and some outfits. This is an edited version of ReMain, where you get to keep all your money and all outfits unlike the original ReMain. I'd like to thank Evil Machine for letting me post this, seeing that it is mostly his work, I just edited 2 tiny things.

1899.title: Polaris Tech 3
1899.author: Anonymous
1899.description: The final version of the Polaris tech plug-in will give you access to some of the outfits I forgot to include in the 2nd version. Also, you should now get the Polaris HUD instead of the civillian one when you buy Polaris ships using this plug-in. Denier-of-Soup  denier@rawr32.net (See http://denier-os.cjb.net/modules/EVNova/ for more tech plug-ins).

1711.title: Hyperdrive
1711.author: Anonymous
1711.description: Have you ever wanted to just get out of a system quickly? Have you ever been destroyed as soon as you left the planet? Then this plugin is the perfect solution for you.  The Slipstream Hyperdrive allows impatient space-farers to jump into hyperspace from above the planet! For twice the price of of a Horizontal Booster, you can jump from twice as close, a.k.a. from above the planet.  There has been no known side effects of this revolutionary technology, and although some people have complained that whenever a ship goes into hyperspace above the planet a giant storm starts up, it has never been proven.  Its not like you can control the weather, but hey...who cares if a person is cleaved in two by lightning. This is NOT a cheat plugin, for it does not alter the game scenario, it just extends your life span....or patience.  Created by Chronodrago. Have any questions or comments?  Send them to peiceofcruds@yahoo.com or PM me on the boards.

1750.title: Krypt Expansion 2.0
1750.author: Anonymous
1750.description: Krypt Expansion 2.0 is a remake of Krypt Expansion in my Planet Expansions plugin. This version has better descriptions, the numbers of Krypt pods are reduced and traders have been added to systems, and the hyperlinks are no longer confusing. Out of all the plugins I've made, I consider this one to be the best. If you have questions/comments/ bugs/complaints please contact me at deathshot@neo.rr.com - Made by Gremlin360

1765.title: Limited Flagships
1765.author: Anonymous
1765.description: Have you ever destroyed a Federation flagship such as the UFS Razorback? Have you noticed that it appears the next day like nothing happened? Are you sick of it and a little freaked? Limited Flagships makes it so when you destroy a Federation flagship, it's gone forever. E-mail any questions/comments/bugs/complaints to deathshot@neo.rr.com - Made by Gremlin360

2040.title: Sketchfighter 4000 Nova
2040.author: Anonymous
2040.description: This amazing plug allows you to fly the Sketchfighter (among other craft) from Ambrosia's game Sketchfighter 4000 Alpha. But that's not all! There are also weapons for you to use and new systems to explore (okay, so there are only eight). Plug, blood, sweat, toil, and tears by gray_shirt_ninja.

1790.title: MC Hammer plug.bin
1790.author: Anonymous
1790.description: This is a plug in idea that I thought up when I was bored in a few seconds and made in a few minutes as it only uses 9 resource. All it does is add three MC Hammer related outfits that can purchased for a reasonable price and changes the Nova theme music to MC Hammer's "U can't touch this". By egroeg5

1979.title: Revenant
1979.author: Anonymous
1979.description: This mod adds one ship (the Revenant Starbridge) and 3 outfits (2 weapons and 1 make-your-life-easier outfit). This isn't quite a cheat, but the ship and weapons are a step above Federation technology and the ship includes some end-game Polaris outfits like a cloaking organ and multi-jump organ. The ship itself is a Pirate Starbridge with Mod-type guns on the wings. The weapons use existing sprites and sounds, but modify them to work in interesting and fun ways. By Koshinn. Note: this plug-in is in no way affiliated with the under-development TC Revenant by UE_Research + Development and Verb.

2253.title: redhypergate.sitx
2253.author: Anonymous
2253.description: This is not so much a plugin as a utility I changed the color of the hypergate to red.  When I was done I used what I thought was an open resource ID.  Instead of leaving it at that, I decided I should include the original .res16 file so that who ever uses this can change the resource id to what ever they need. Stuffit9 used as well as Macbinary II+ 1.0.2  If you have questions my email is dont_x_streams@yahoo.com

1448.title: Acheron
1448.author: Anonymous
1448.description: Acheron Version 1.0.0. Set in a small in-game galaxy known as the Trikeratos Alliance, Acheron is a Total Conversion for Escape Velocity: Nova, completely replacing the Nova scenario with new ships, weaponry, missions, outfits, and graphics. Created by Crusader Alpha, thanks to the help of all of the people mentioned in the ReadMe, About, and Acknowledgments texts. If you would like to contact me, use the email address found in the ReadMe File.

2023.title: ShipVariants1.0.4.sit
2023.author: Anonymous
2023.description: Now compatible with Nova 1.0.4. This plugin allows you to buy every variant of every ship in Nova. It also permits you to buy variant fighter bays. It is not a cheat, as you have to be able to buy the regular version of a ship before you are allowed to buy its variants. This version works extremely well, and fixes every bug and other issue that was brought to my attention since the first release. I know people who enjoy this plugin so much that they don't play without it. There is a readme included, which explains precisely what has been changed. Talk to me at dbrauer@hfx.andara.com  (this version is fixed from the previous).

1916.title: PolyconGraphics3 v1.0.sit
1916.author: Anonymous
1916.description:
Polycon EV is a total conversion for EV Nova featuring all new ships, outfits, systems, etc.  More information and screenshots can be found at the Polycon EV website...
http://www.evula.org/anubis/index.html

By AnubisTTP (arrakis666@yahoo.com)
NOTE: also requires Polycon EV v1.0, PolyconShips v1.0, PolyconGraphics v1.0, PolyconGraphics2 v1.0, and PolyconGraphics4 v1.0.

2086.title: Starwars plug
2086.author: Anonymous
2086.description:
Star Wars Ship Add Plug, V. 0.9
Hello, this plug is a late beta, i'm releasing it now to get feedback so i can see whether to continue the project, email me at lordwriath@hotmail.com for suggestions, questions, comments, or whatever else you decide to bother me about. The ships are, Xwing, Tie Fighter, MC-80 Cruiser, Star Destroyer, Rebel and Imperial Nebulon B Frigates, and Carrack Cruisers.

1912.title: polyconevupdate1.1.sit
1912.author: Anonymous
1912.description:
This file will update a Polycon EV installation to version 1.1. You must have previously downloaded a copy of Polycon EV 1.0 for this to work. Polycon EV 1.0 can be downloaded here.

http://www.geocities.com/arrakis666/evstuff/download.html

More information about the Polycon EV conversion can be found here.

http://www.evula.org/anubis/index.html

By AnubisTTP(arrakis666ATyahoo.com)

1278.title: Pack O Good Stuff
1278.author: Anonymous
1278.description: This little plug contains four convenient items. The treasured Galaxy Map,  the time-saving Multi-Jump, the envied Inertial Dampener, and the life-saving  Record Cleaner. I always wanted to submit this pack because I always thought  the "Convenience" section was a tad bit lacking in the Windows corner of  Nova. If you have a Mac and really, really want this plugin, feel free to convert.  Comments, praise, and threats of heresy to buggerplugger AT yahoo DOT com  Thank you.

2145.title: vellosfix
2145.author: Anonymous
2145.description:
This fixes the problem that stopped you from purchasing Outfits of Ships AFTER completing the Vell-os thread.
By Pring and TomWoozle

1338.title: Super Escorts.sit
1338.author: Anonymous
1338.description:
This plug gives you lots of free escorts to protect you against those evil pirates.
Plugin by Mr.Max
Comments to:maxi.placzek@linomail.de

1468.title: Argolian Alliance
1468.author: Anonymous
1468.description: This plug adds two new races, the Argolian Alliance and the Scourge, along with several completely new ships, and over a dozen new outfits and weapons. All the buyable ships and weapons are balanced to be about as powerful as polaris ships and weapons (though a good deal more expensive). There are also two new missions which should help give some additionall background information on the new races. Bug reports, feedback, etc. can be sent to LeeMur612@hotmail.com.

2027.title: ShipyardUpgrades1.0.6
2027.author: Anonymous
2027.description: The ShipyardUpgrades106 plug allows the player to upgrade their own ship, following exactly the same sequences of ship upgrades that are used in the Nova scenario to upgrade escort ships.  After you purchase or capture a ship as your own, a sequence of ship upgrades is enabled for that specific ship type.  You can upgrade your ship simply by going to any Shipyard that normally has that kind of ship and trading in your ship for the next variant in the Nova upgrade sequence.  The ShipyardUpgrades106 plug is only compatible with EV:Nova versions 1.0.6 and 1.0.5.  You MUST start a new pilot after installing this plug. ThereÕs a detailed readme file with more information.  Provided by bit-banger Arturo - June 28, 2003

2138.title: Various Advanced Devices.sit
2138.author: Anonymous
2138.description:
Adds four outfits.
Gravity Projector-Draws all ships in a system towards your own.
Atomic Impactor Drive-Engine type weapon, damages ships nearby while moving you in whichever direction you were going.
Spacial Collapser-Basically a reverse AID but more effective at high speeds.
Mass Disabler- Super cheat.  Disables everything in a system.  Everything except you.
Made by Klepsacovic.  Contact me at akleps@earthlink.net

1706.title: Horse of Many Colours v2.2
1706.author: Anonymous
1706.description: This plugin adds an outfit which lets you paint your ship. Yes yes, I hear you say, another paint outfit plugin. This one is different: in this one, the colour of the paint changes colour randomly. Watch your ship change colour in mid-hyperjump. Land on a planet in a blue ship, and take off in a red one. Hours of fun. Plugin by Belthazar, with help and ideas from Qaanol, Pace [haldora] and Requiem. Version 2.2 of the plugin corrects a bug which resulted in the player being granted the paint outfit several times, and also adds a readme. It should work properly, but I make no guarantees. E-mail me at jva2006@yahoo.com if you find any errors. Plugin is in Windows form, but can be converted to Mac. Compatibility with other plugins is also not guaranteed.

1669.title: Gefjon Planet Defense
1669.author: Anonymous
1669.description:
Title: Gefjon Planet Defense

This reintroduces Opal trade in the Gefjon system but makes players think twice before attempting such a suicidal run. 4 new stations have been added in the middle of the system that fire defense weapons huge asteroids make navigating a nightmare... and pirates, association ships, and Federation fight to the death making trading all that more dangerous. -- Frinkruds -- http://www.macgamer.net

1807.title: ModPirateStarbridgeMAC
1807.author: Anonymous
1807.description:
The Mod Pirate Starbridge [Mac]

This plugin adds one new ship: The Mod Pirate Starbridge. We felt it was necessary for there to be a mod variant of the pirate starbridge since there are modified versions of the others, and thus the plug was created... a year later.
This plug comes with a full set of graphics (which, I may add, are very well done.). Comes in Mac and PC format.

Graphics by persondude, compiled and written by StormÇrøw.  Released: 3/12/04
Version 1.0.3. Send any comments/bugs to insomniac1@sbcglobal.net and/or themess_stormcrow@hotmail.com

1218.title: EVNCheater100.sit
1218.author: Anonymous
1218.description: Provides an option for new pilots to start as either a Trader (default) or a Cheater - cheaters gain access to a system where they can purchase various unbalanced outfits and weapons. Prices are not reduced, but cheaters can access various easy-money missions from BBS's everywhere. Read the Read Me for much more detailed info. -- v1.0 (041102) by Vinay Sarpeshkar

1379.title: Asteroid Farming Guide 1.03
1379.author: Anonymous
1379.description: This is the real Asteroid Farming Guide 1.03.  I messed up the last one.  The Windows files do not read in Microsoft Office.  This time the files can be read in Microsoft Office.

1407.title: EVNStarmap 1.0
1407.author: Anonymous
1407.description: This is the full galactic version of my EVN starmap.  This version includes all systems and ports as well as all hypergates and links.  Systems are color coded to indicate government.  Enjoy.

1761.title: LibertyCenter100
1761.author: Anonymous
1761.description:
This plugin adds a new station, the Liberty Center for Experimental Technologies, which developed an Enhanced Kestrel, upping its crew, shields, armor, weapons, speed, etc and adds a new weapon: the Positron Torpedo, which is a VERY powerful torpedo. There is also a cheat version which makes everything real cheap and allows a lot of weapons.
By Matthew Butch (libertyof76@supernet.com)

1913.title: PolyconGraphics1PC
1913.author: Anonymous
1913.description: Polycon EV is a total conversion for EV Nova featuring all new ships, outfits, systems, etc. More information and screenshots can be found at the Polycon EV website... http://www.evula.org/anubis/index.html By AnubisTTP (arrakis666@yahoo.com). PC conversion by Belthazar. NOTE: also requires Polycon_EVv1.2PC, PolyconShipsPC, PolyconGraphics2PC and PolyconGraphics3PC.

1919.title: PolyconGraphics v1.0.sit
1919.author: Anonymous
1919.description:
Polycon EV is a total conversion for EV Nova featuring all new ships, outfits, systems, etc.  More information and screenshots can be found at the Polycon EV website...
http://www.evula.org/anubis/index.html

By AnubisTTP (arrakis666@yahoo.com)
NOTE: also requires Polycon EV v1.0, PolyconShips v1.0, PolyconGraphics2 v1.0, PolyconGraphics3 v1.0, and PolyconGraphics4 v1.0.

2160.title: Warship Upgrade
2160.author: Anonymous
2160.description: This plug-in ads three expensive but good outfits.  They give you more shields, ionization resistance, and more weapon room and slots.

2177.title: WTT v1.0.1
2177.author: Anonymous
2177.description: This plugin makes the Winter Temptest attack turreted. Damage and stuff have not been altered. Plugin by solaris150.

1901.title: PolarisCollector1.0
1901.author: Anonymous
1901.description:
This adds the Collector, a Polaris asteroid mining ship.  It's fully balanced and integrated into the EVN universe, and is designed to work with PlugPack v16.  The Collector adds an interesting new twist on asteroid mining by including a built-in grappling beam, and a very short yet powerful mining laser.  It uses some fairly advanced and animated custom graphics, and has detailed descriptions.  
--If you're a developer who'd like to use this ship in your plug-in, feel free to do so, but please email be about it first.
created by artifex()-- please send any suggestions or comments to vontay@sbcglobal.net
http://www.freewebs.com/aperion0/2004/index.htm

1408.title: EVNStartpackv.3.0.sit
1408.author: Anonymous
1408.description: Welcome to Mk.32's Startpack v.3.0. First release. Features pilots who have started each storyline, pilots who have finished each storyline, a quick EVN guide, a guide to hacking your pilot file to swap ships, and more! Any duel threats, comments, complaints, compliments, etc go to the email address inside the file. Thanks!

1604.title: EVN Azdara1.1
1604.author: Anonymous
1604.description: From JoshTigerheart's Department of Useful Plugs comes the Azdara, the fastest stock ship in the entire EV series. Now it is here to outfly anything Nova has to offer. With this plug you can now purchase the Azdara, ported directly from the EVO TC, fully armed with it's Swivel Phase Cannons, and fly circles around Darts and Mantas. The 1.1 fixes the bug (or bugs if you were using anything besides Win 1.06) that the plug had.  See readme for details and credit to the fixer. Question, comments, bug reports, chocolate-chip cookies? Send em to TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com

1704.title: Holpa Systems
1704.author: Anonymous
1704.description:
Holpa Systems V1.0 9/17/06

This plug adds a few systems in the holpa nebula area and a couple ship variants available
for sale. The new systems also have thier own government. Made by HazMatBlue email any comments/problems to HazMatBlue@gmail.com

1543.title: CoolShieldBubbles
1543.author: Anonymous
1543.description: This plug-in adds shield bubbles to all the non-alien ships in the game. That means that every time a ship is shot, the ship glows. I was kind of lazy, and I didn't do different colors for different governments, but depending on how well this one does, I might make another one with a different shield-bubble-color for each government. I used Adobe Photoshop CS to make the shield bubbles, coupled with some information I obtained from an online tutorial. By X'arnor. :)

2248.title: PCbatchConverter
2248.author: Anonymous
2248.description: This utility is for Windows NT only (2000/XP/Vista). This simple batch script will convert all MacBinary files in a folder into usable .rez files.  Directions: Place converter.bat in your nova directory. To convert all .bin files in "Nova Plug-ins," simply run the file. To convert all .bin files in any other folder, drag the folder onto the converter (this process should be familiar to you if you've ever converted any .bin files individually). Made by Nonconventionally Creative.

1911.title: PolyconEV1.2Update.sit
1911.author: Anonymous
1911.description: This file will update a Polycon EV installation to version 1.2. You must have previously downloaded a copy of Polycon EV 1.0 for this to work. Polycon EV 1.0 can be downloaded here. http://www.geocities.com/arrakis666/evstuff/download.html More information about the Polycon EV conversion can be found here. http://www.evula.org/anubis/index.html By AnubisTTP(arrakis666ATyahoo.com)

1663.title: GameEnhancements1.0.sit
1663.author: Anonymous
1663.description: This plug enhances many areas of the game.  It adds links between many storylines and makes it so that the Variant Fed String is no longer a dead end.  There is now a new battle at the end of the Rebel string.  This plugin also incorporates my RebelSideMissionsFix1.0 plugin.  Enjoy.  Version 1.0 released 6/26/02.  Created by MacDevil.  Send questions and comments to AGS848@AOL.com.

1630.title: FastWarp.sit
1630.author: Anonymous
1630.description: This tiny plugin makes it a lot faster to jump from system to system by eliminating the Warp Up, just hit the (default) J key and you ship will come to a stop and bam your in the next system. Created by The Dichromatic Project.

1903.title: PolarisFix PaedtBug.sit
1903.author: Anonymous
1903.description: Everyone remembers me -SL- ranting on about how evil this problem of being stuck with the scientists on Paedt never coming to the bar was, then i found out others had this problem too AKA its a bug.  Thus i found out its one simple mistake by Ambrosia, the misn had the box for "dont give misn to cargo ships" checked, thus many people with ships like the starbridge couldnt do the mission.  This plugin fixes that untill a patch fixes it for real.  Enjoy...        by SL cslo@mac.com

2082.title: Start As An Auroran
2082.author: Anonymous
2082.description: As far as I've seen there is no one who has made a "start as an Auroran" plug. Until now. This plug simply starts you off in Auroran space with a Firebird, 100,000 credits, hypergate codes and an Heraan House Warrior ranking. Just a fun little thing to play around with. Any questions on use, bugs, errors or bomb/death threats can be sent to alexcavalier42@yahoo.com. By: A-Dawg

1263.title: Missile Storm Cheat
1263.author: Anonymous
1263.description: This is the first cheat I have made as well as the first plug-in I am submitting. It is one outfit that makes a semi-intelligent swarm of 350 respawning missiles to kill all ships in the system but you. The swarm will only despawn if you jump out of the system or land. This is a windows file so mac users must convert it to use it. By Vlamic.

1534.title: Colosseum 1.1 Part 1
1534.author: Anonymous
1534.description: JoshTigerheart's Department of Total Conversions presents to you the first Escape Velocity Nova TC to be released in years:  Colosseum!  Colosseum is a small, combat oriented TC that has seen two years of development time to bring one solid, challenging gameplay package.  Experience combat on the EV engine as never before with Colosseum's selection of interesting weapons and ships, as well as the ability to customize your fighter down to essential components such as the engine and shield generator  However, though the focus is on winning battles to advance your rank, other groups are at work and Colosseum features a storyline to go along with your progress.  The Colosseum Part 1 package includes CTC Essentials, CTC Base, a new Nova Music.mp3, the Official Colosseum Strategy Guide, and the all-important and often neglected Readme (MAKE SURE TO READ IT!).  Many people have contributed to the development of this total conversion, see the full credits both in-game and in the readme for all who participated even a tiny amount.  This TC is in Mac format, Windows users will need to convert.  Got questions, comments, bug reports, or planetary tribute?  Look through the contact information found in the readme.  Make sure to download Part 2 as well!  Also, this is a complete update and replaces all older files.

1382.title: BlankNovaPlugin
1382.author: Anonymous
1382.description:
Another simple file, this gives you a blank Nova plugin. Saves you the trouble of changing the file Type  Creator so your plugin works in Nova. Just duplicate it and get to work.
Bonus: Includes the Nova templates on the plugin.

1398.title: evn bits bible.sit
1398.author: Anonymous
1398.description: Have you ever wondered what all those control bits really meant? At last with Version 1.0 of the EVN Bits Bible, all will be revealed! All 529 bits used in the EV-Nova default scenario have been covered and their secrets unlocked in over 120 more details annotations. A perfect tool for any plug-in developer and curious minds. Visit http://homepages.ihug.com.au/~markchai/ for the latest version. Currently the file has 657 text entries and each bit has been classified by story string. By The Wanderingwalrus.

1399.title: EVN Bits Bible 0.1.0.sea
1399.author: Anonymous
1399.description:
pHave you ever wondered what all those control bits really meant? How do you set b238? What does it mean? If you're an EVN Plug-Developer pondering the control bits, then the EVN Bits Bible is for you! This initial release version of the Bits Bible contains 340 (from around 450 used by EVN) bit descriptions (how they are set) as well as 50 notes on the bits. A vital tool for anyone wanting to better understand the bits in EVN.
PThis is the initial release, version 0.1.0 and contains 390 entries. by The Wanderingwalrus

1412.title: NewHypergates.sit
1412.author: Anonymous
1412.description: This is a map, black text on a cleaned-up white bkgnd, of the EV Nova galaxy. The hypergate routes from the ActvatesHypergates plug-in have been added in color. The galaxy is too big to print on 8 1/2x11, so this needs 15" to print large enough to read the system names, but it is in Mac PICT format, so any app can read it and split it up.

1414.title: nova bible.sit
1414.author: Anonymous
1414.description: This guide will divide the nova bible into several separate documents. This makes the viewing of the bible easier....  By ENtarus,

1424.title: ShpBits1.0.sit
1424.author: Anonymous
1424.description: Author: Nathan Groh (Mr. Lothario) Release Date: 6 April 2002  Description: For plug developers only. This file contains a read me outlining a standardized system of ncbs which make it possible for plugs to determine if the player is flying and/or has captured a specific ship or ships. e.g. making an outfit available only if the player is piloting a Rebel Destroyer.

1425.title: survival guide
1425.author: Anonymous
1425.description: Here is a downloadable version of the EVN Survival Guide. It's still in HTML format, but all you need is a browser (which, if you're reading this, means you have). It's all self-contained, so it works great for you dial-up users, too, as you don't have to connect to read it. It also includes the EV Survival Guide.

1427.title: TechLevel 2
1427.author: Anonymous
1427.description: TechLevel List This provides a list of all the tech levels used in the default Nova scenario.  Included is a text file listing what types of items are in each tech level, a text file with a full listing of ships and thier techlevel, and a text file with a full listing of all outfits and thier techlevel. I have included both mac and pc versions of all the text files, as well as a theoretically crossplatform html table version of the outfit and ship lists (it's a lot more readable than the text version). Enjoy.  .Zip format, because just about every archiving program can open .zip.

1451.title: AdditiveColorTtab.bin.sit
1451.author: Anonymous
1451.description: This plugin overrides the standard transparency table resource from Nova Graphics 1 with a much better (IMO) one.  I made this because it has always bugged me how awful Vell-Os and some Polaris ships look in 8-bit.  They look bad because the standard transparency table that comes with Nova is designed for Alpha-Blending, while engine glows, running lights, and weapon glows are designed for Additive color.  So when your Vell-Os Dart accelerates, instead of the glow being added to the base sprite and making it glow brighter, it is merely drawn opaque on top of it.  See the picture at http://www.rail.com/peter/images/AdditveVs.jpg for an example of this.  My plugin will make Vell-Os ships look (mostly) the way they were supposed to, and Polaris ships' running lights now blend in properly.  I would consider this plugin a must for anyone who has to use 8-bit color (like myself).  Made by Vaumnou, 5/22/03.

1523.title: Classic4Nova.sit
1523.author: Anonymous
1523.description: Classic4Nova v1.2.2 (22:25 02/09/03) - Makes the original EV universe available in plug-in form, with a great number of enhancements such as point defences, ship variants and cross-over missions. Features new ships, weapons, outfits and systems, including a few surprises for fans of the rest of series. See http://homepage.mac.com/jonathanboyd/evn for updates.

1542.title: ConvWormholes
1542.author: Anonymous
1542.description:
This simple little plug makes all the wormholes one fourth (1/4) as far away from their respective system centers.  This makes them much more accessible and easier to use, while at the same time retaining their inconspicuous nature.
If you have not discovered the locations of any wormhles yet, I personally recommend that you do not use this plug so you can retain the thrill of discovery.
Send questions, comments, and suggestions to iisven@mac.com

1554.title: Defensive BRL v1
1554.author: Anonymous
1554.description: This plug-in creates a point-defense version of the Biorelay Laser. It becomes available after the Nil'Kemorya have accepted you as Ory'Hara in the Polaris string. This plug-in was created using EVNEW, and is available only in Windows at this time. Plug-in by MavHunterExtreme

1577.title: Escape Pod Freeflight
1577.author: Anonymous
1577.description: Escape Pod Freeflight version is a plugin created by me, KarTaniK, that will alow you, the player, to control your escape pod once its ejected.  this plug comes in two version, the other being inertialess.  just read the document enclosed with the plug for details and you'll be controlling where you land in no time.  have fun, and if you have any questions, you can contact me at kartanik@yahoo.com

1582.title: EV-Nova Sound Pack v1.0.0
1582.author: Anonymous
1582.description:
The EV:Nova Sound Pack v. 1.0.0 includes 237 sound files for you choosing.  This first release only includes escort / fighter sounds, i.e "Roger That", and "5 Seconds Before Assault".  Later version will include opening music and weapon sounds.

Please note that this is a collection of .snd files.  IT IS NOT A PLUG.  This is for Plug-in developers only.  If you know how to use ResEdit, I think you know how to use these.

To sumbit your own sounds email them to me at: metke@hevanet.com.  Please include your name, the name of who created the sound file, and what the sound file is supposed to be (i.e. a missle or explosion ect.)

1599.title: EVCTC Weapon Hardpoints.sit
1599.author: Anonymous
1599.description: This file adds weapon hardpoints to the EVC conversion for all ships. Not compatible with plugs that change the standard weapons or the shän resources. Feel free to use these in your own plugs as long as you give me credit. Version 1.0.0, author Robert "Mazer Rackham" Smith, email tallguy1138@yahoo.com

1641.title: FissionReactor31.0.7R.W.
1641.author: Anonymous
1641.description: This is my Fission Reactor 3 Plug you can buy three fission reactors the first one is 1,000,000 credits weight 10 tons charge 15 just guessing the second one is 100,000 cretits weight 8 tons charge rate 34 you can buy more than one the third one is 250 credits weight 2 tons charge rate 120 for 1000 credits you can charge your shuttle like your using 1 solar panel. 1.0.7 Robert00002@aol.com

1668.title: Gefjon Fix.sit
1668.author: Anonymous
1668.description: This is the first plug-in I have ever made in my life of playing EV.  And though you may be turned off by that don't worry...it works!  That may be because it only does one thing which is makes it so you can't buy or sell opals for low in the Gefjon system.  You can still buy and sell for high but this makes it so you can't go from planet to planet getting more and more money.  You can however harvest and get money that way.  Enjoy it and please use it as I have heard many complaints about the Gefjon system.  E-mail:ather_00@hotmail.com

1672.title: GefjonFix 2.0.3.sit
1672.author: Anonymous
1672.description: This plug-in makes the opal trade route in the Gefjon system harder by adding more pirates and putting a larger gap in between the planets. For those people who want more challenge :). It also adds another pirate station. This plug-in is known to clash with Planet Killer Deluxe. This version adds compatibility for the latest version of Përs of the Webboard. By patrick (: a z d a r a :) Version: 2.0.3

1708.title: huntinggrounds.sit
1708.author: Anonymous
1708.description: Don't you hate it when you've just disabled a Manticore after a hard fought battle, and you're trying to board and pillage it only to have a reinforcement fleet come in and blow it up before you can take that half a million credits? Well, that happened one too many times to me, so I went and made my favorite hunting grounds more easily huntable. This plugin stops those annoying reinforcement fleets from coming in at the 4 systems between Evlei and Koria (Scheros, Mallereth, SPC-089, and NGC-1066). It also changes the düde percentages of the 4 systems so that rebel ships appear less, and the larger pirate ships appear more. In combination, these provide for a very profitable hunting experience in the galactic north. Happy hunting!

1715.title: hypergates.sit
1715.author: Anonymous
1715.description: Fixes broken hypergates, and other cool things with the hypergates.

1720.title: IllegalWeapsFix.sit
1720.author: Anonymous
1720.description: This plugin allows you to buy illegal Heavy Blaster turrets and Quad Light Blaster turrets without being in the Rebel string.  All illegal weapons have had their mass requirements changed so that they are the same as their legal counterparts.  A few other small things have been changed with other outfits.  This plugin was made at the request of several people on the webboard.  Enjoy guys.  Version 1.0 released 1/11/03.  Feel free to e-mail me at AGS848@AOL.com with questions and comments.

1736.title: KamikazeVipers
1736.author: Anonymous
1736.description: Adds a kamikaze viper bay outfit , more expensive than the standard viper bay to balance out the highly destructive nature of kamikaze pilots. praise , complaints or suggestions to ixorus@mac.com

1739.title: kestrel arrow
1739.author: Anonymous
1739.description: This plug-in makes the Kestrel easier to navigate. It adds a bright green arrow when you have one, which points in the direction your Kestrel is facing. Some people complained that the Kestrel was very difficult to see normally and virtually impossible to see while cloaked, and someone suggested an arrow pointing the way. So I did this. You'll want to read the ReadMe (hence the name) before you use the plug-in. By Brian "orcaloverbri9" Norwood. Email me at orcaloverbri9@spymac.com.

1748.title: KontFix.sit
1748.author: Anonymous
1748.description: Have you ever been stuck in Kont, and cannot go into hyperspace cos your out of fuel? With this little bug fix, you can refuel on Kont, allowing you to complete the mission. A very useful and effective plugin, by Saaci Plank

1754.title: LAPD Station
1754.author: Anonymous
1754.description: LAPD Station plug-in works on EV-Nova 1.0.5 It is a station that fed ships stay away from and Rebel ships dock Pirate ships Free Traders don't last long with Rebel ships and LAPD ships and the station shooting them. This Station sells LRHM Launcher and LRHM Missiles Jam Type 1-0 Jam Type 2-0 Jam Type 3-1 Jam Type 4-2 you can get outfits it has a shipyard you can recharge it has a Bar this is a test plug-in made today if it needs inprovements let me know. Robert Phoenix my e-mail is RobertPhoenix978@aol.com This plug-in may work on EV Nova 1.0.6 you may have to throw out your EVN Pilot File for 1.0.5 and get a new pilot file for EVN 1.0.6.

1770.title: lucrativeprivateering95A28
1770.author: Anonymous
1770.description: By MacPatriot.   I created this plug-in because I wanted to make pirating more profitable. There are 5 changes: #1. Escort sale price increased to 25% of retail price + 50% of upgrade costs, to remain consistant with players ships. #2. Marine Platoon uses up five tons of cargo space instead of five tons weapon mass. (after all, they will ride inside your ship not on the wings!) #3. Disabling Radar Missiles can be bought on two "shady" fed planets, Viking, and Simpson. #4. New Trade route smuggling disabling radar missles between auroran worlds, and two fed planets. #5. "MacPatriot, Dictator for Life" of the privateers now roams the galaxy in his Hot-Rod Pirate Valk! Compatable with New Characters v2. Let me know what other plug-in's you use and I will try to make this plug compatable with them.

1772.title: LWD 1.1
1772.author: Anonymous
1772.description: This simple little plugin adds three new missions to the game. The missions start in the bar on Harbour. You don't need to have done any of the strings to get them. This update fixes a confliction with some Nova Files that would cause EV Nova to crash on some computers and makes the missions slightly easier.

1788.title: MassRetool.sit
1788.author: Anonymous
1788.description: I had a Cambrian ship, and it just had tons of cargo space, and no weapon space. Mass expansions and retools have a max of 4. This plug-in raises the maximum amount of mass retools you can get in non-polaris space (you can get two in polaris space, and they count as a different outfit). --Borg682

1806.title: Modified Ship Variants v1.0
1806.author: Anonymous
1806.description: Modified Ship Variants is a compilation of Ship Variants, Fighter Variants, and Pirate Modified Starbridge.  Pirate Modified Starbridge's data has been edited to make it fit the Ship Variants style and purpose.  Other than that no data has been edited.  This plug-in was designed by Zerak Toman at the request of Ozzyman.  Comments, suggestions, or requests can be e-mailed to RolliKid@aol.com.

1810.title: MoonSet
1810.author: Anonymous
1810.description: This is a graphics set for PlanetForge 2.0 that makes your planets look similar to Altia, except more rounded.  Made by diordna.

1829.title: New Status Display 1.0.sit
1829.author: Anonymous
1829.description: This plugin replaces the existing status displays for all seven governments. By Blue Dog blue.dog@macunlimited.net

1840.title: No Waves
1840.author: Anonymous
1840.description: This plug-in eliminates the use of waves while dominating planets, adding a little more fun to domination.

1867.title: PaintStationPrime.sit
1867.author: Anonymous
1867.description: This version of Paint Station Prime will work with Plug Pack V16.  I didn't make it the credit should go to ArcAngelCounterstrike.  It will add stations where you can paint your ship at Sol, Aurora, and Kel'ar'Iy.  Updated by Nil'kimas.  Contact me at daprice@mac.com .

1988.title: RONIN
1988.author: Anonymous
1988.description: The Guild's been destoyed. Your master and friends are dead. You have nowhere left to turn. Yet with your skills, who isn't going to turn to you? --- RONIN extends the original Bounty Hunter story into it's own complete string by adding over 40 new possible missions. New characters, new oufits, new organizations, new loyalties and new enemies.  Work for nearly everyone, seek out the truth and in the end find honor. Developed by Kame (kame@0three0.net).

2146.title: VellosFuelRegen
2146.author: Anonymous
2146.description: A much improved update to my old T0 Recharge plug. This plug fixes what I consider to be a major flaw with the Vell-os ships. It fixes problems with the fuel regeneration properties of each Vell-os ship making it possible for the player to fly the Dart and Arrow while still maintaining the proper recharge rate for the player's T level. This recharge rate also stays with the player even if they decide to use "physical" ships at the end of the storyline. Developed by Kame.

2224.title: MissionComputer9-200
2224.author: Anonymous
2224.description: By David Arthur. A scenario editor for all three games of the Escape Velocity series which can edit the cron, desc, dude, flet, govt, junk, misn, pers, PICT, STR, STR, and year resources. Includes integrated Resource Copier and Target Generator utilities. (Classic Edition)

2243.title: NovaTarget 100 OSX.dmg
2243.author: Anonymous
2243.description: EV Nova Target Generator, by David Arthur, provides an easy way to create the 'scan-line' target graphics found in EV Nova from an ordinary colour image. This version is designed for Mac OS X only.

2256.title: SpaceObjectFinderv2.sit
2256.author: Anonymous
2256.description: Some missions will tell you to go to a space station or planet but will not give the name or location of the system that contains the planet. If the planet is in a system with a name you don't recognize it can be difficult to determine where you have to go without looking at every system on the map. With Space Object Finder all you have to do is type in the name of the place you want to go and it will tell you the name of every system that has a space object with the name you searched for. Space Object Finder can also produce a simple map to help you visually locate the system you want to go to. Space Object Finder should work under both OS 9 and OS X. It also works with the data files for all three version of EV (EV, EV:O, and EV:N). e-mail: macutator@macutator.com . Released 11/8/02. Version 2.0. Made by "No One"

2117.title: ThunderScoop
2117.author: Anonymous
2117.description: ThunderScoop is the ultimate mining tool. It lets you buy a powerful mining laser and scoop combined. Made for Windows. Made by jimmytherock. My email is sam_pickering00@yahoo.co.uk. Comments and Criticism appreicated.

1997.title: SAE PC v1  II of II
1997.author: Anonymous
1997.description:
SAE - PART II of II - PC

Feb 6th 2005 note: The official SAE site IS going down. So I have uploaded the PC version of Star Wars: Smuggler's Alliance Expansion copyright 2003-2004 Xeres TO: Ambrosia Software EV:Nova Add-ons site. Please enjoy the PRE-CONVERTED PC VERSION. If you need support you MUST email me (Xeres) At: mc23418@yahoo.com That email will ALWAYS be around. 

For size reasons I split the plug-in onto TWO parts, you MUST have both parts I AND II to play. Get it all at ASW.

Part II SHOULD contain:
SAE Graphics 5.rez
SAE Ships 1.rez
SAE Ships 2.rez
SAE Sounds.rez
READ ME File

1649.title: Forget about  Barry1.1
1649.author: Anonymous
1649.description: Yes, I noticed a small bug on the forget about barry plug, so I made this.  I left off the small piece of information that you must accept the whatever..... just so you know, it impacts nothing when you accept, that's just so you don't keep seeing it again.  Email me at mbelins1@hotmail.com  by zapp

1241.title: Illegal Drugs 2
1241.author: Anonymous
1241.description: If i'm not mistaken the other Illegal drugs plug-in had a problem. The drug multiplied on the cargo hall. Maybe i'm wrong, but i suggest you to download my new plug-in,that is totally correct, eliminate the other and use this. Mac users only. The email is the same Klaudio197@hotmail.com

1517.title: charFix.sit
1517.author: Anonymous
1517.description: For all people who actually like to play the game starting from scratch.  Have you ever noticed that the shuttles description says that it is basically being phased out, but with the 25,000 credits you have, you can nearly buy the much better and much more popular heavy shuttle?  Well now you can.  You will recieve a slight deduction in the number of credits you begin with, but will be given a heavy shuttle. This is not a cheat plugin, as balance is maintained.  By Luke Bearl. E-mail in enclosed read-me.

1787.title: MassDriver
1787.author: Anonymous
1787.description: This plugin adds an weapon available in Federation space for 500,000 credits, 40 tons of mass, with a max of 4. It is called the Mass Driver Turret, inspired from a plugin i played on EVC. It is extremely powerful, but with the price tag, weight, and extremely expensive ammunition, it should not be considered a cheat. I dont know why anyone would care, but if you want to avoid cheating, be my guest! I'd say it balances out, so i will label it as "NOT A CHEAT". Incompatibilities possible, for instance, HyperGatePass 1.0 causes your turret to dissappear every 4 days, inexplicably. I was unable to fix this, despite my best efforts/ Tell me what you think! PSOCringe@comcast.net, be sure to put "Nova" in the subject or i will just delete it.

1235.title: Hell Swarm
1235.author: Anonymous
1235.description: The ultimate fire  forget weapon. Just download, follow the instructions in the readme, and you'll find out why. Just for clarity: CHEAT CHEAT CHEAT. It doesnt really get more cheatish than this. Enjoyable all the same. Tell me what you think! PSOCringe@comcast.net, be sure to put "Nova" and the title of the plug-in the E-mail refers to in the subject or i will just delete it.

1501.title: Black Hole Pirates v0.1
1501.author: Anonymous
1501.description: Adds the Black Hole Pirate gang to the galatic North. This new version has 13 missions, 19 outfits, 10 weapons, and 10 ships. When completed it will add one major plotline to Nova. Made by gray_shirt_ninja and DArk Matter Productions (DAMP). [email removed at author's request]

1587.title: EV Enhancer 1.0.2
1587.author: Anonymous
1587.description: EV Enhancer is a plug for the EVN port of the classic Escape Velocity. It brings the port up-to-date with many of the engine features of EVN (such as gun ports) as well as adding tons of new outfits, a few new ships, and some new missions. Some of the new outfits added are fusion reactors, point-defense turrets, martial arts classes (available at Hikeeba), fuel cells, electrified armor plating, handweapon upgrades, long-range scanners, asteroid mining stuff, and many other cool things, all with balanced prices and weights. Many of the outfits also integrate with the storylines, especially the martial arts classes. If you have a previous version of this plug installed already, you will have to replace it with this version. This plug has been tested on EVN 1.0.8 for Mac (with the EVC port installed). PC users will have to convert it. Made by Nil'kimas. [email removed at author's request]

1594.title: EVC Descs 2.0
1594.author: Anonymous
1594.description: JoshTigerheart's Department of Useful Plugs brings you another update for the EVC TC:  EVC Descs 2.0.  Now, in addition to adding to or rewriting the planet descriptions, now outfits, ships, escorts, and bars have been changed to make the EVCverse more interesting.  Most descriptions are serious in nature and stay true to the original lore, others are entirely new, and still more are just humorous.  Also new is a .rtf readme instead of a .txt that always screws up when opened on other platforms.  Futhuremore, the plug is still compatible with rEVisited, see readme for details.  Questions?  Comments?  Curious on how to outfit a Civillian Viper?  Send me an email, its in the readme.  This plug is in Mac format. Windows users need to convert. [email removed in the hopes of getting less spam]

1821.title: Munitions
1821.author: Anonymous
1821.description: Munitions is an armory plugin, adding ten new outfits to the game. The outfits are fairly balanced, though the prices are a little low, and nothing is so incredibly powerful that it destroys everything in one hit :-( . Everything works, and all the technology is easily available to the user. Made on a mac.

2264.title: SpinApp6.1
2264.author: Anonymous
2264.description: A small java application that shows a menu, you can use an open dialog that can take multiple images, or just one, or drag the files to the main menu. Depending on the choice it will combine the images into a spin, or it will create a 6x6 spin from one image, then it will ask where to save the new spin. The new spin will be saved as a pict. Can extract mask from transparency and no longer screws up with transparency. Now stays open after finishing a spin and will remember the last location used to open and the last location to save as long as it stays open. Check for updates at: http://evweb.aresaxis.us/

1254.title: License to Life
1254.author: Anonymous
1254.description: Here is my License to Life! Allows you to buy anything without any other licenses. Useful with my All Ships plugin. Have fun! -X'arnor

1643.title: Fixer-Uper
1643.author: Anonymous
1643.description: Anathema Fixer-Uper by Archon  This plugin includes a few minor fixes, such as one ship's stats and a few typos, but more importantly, fixes one weap that did not previously work and a bug that made it impossible to progress through the last few missions of Chapter 2.  Other updates may be posted from time to time if new bugs are brought to my attention.  To install, just drag the Fixer-Uper into your plugins folder.  Do not remove the "~" from the file name or it will not properly overwrite the old information.  (Mac format)

1531.title: Colloseum auto-eject
1531.author: Anonymous
1531.description: This is a plug-in for JoshTigerHeart's Colosseum total conversion. It simply changes the Escape Pod outfit to also have an auto-eject function. It also changes the Old Coyote to have 1 shield and 2 armor, so it shouldn't explode right when you come back. It won't have any engines or a reactor, so you'll have to reoutfit it. To use the plug-in, just drop it in your Nova Plug-ins folder with the Colloseum data files in the Nova Files folder. The plug-in is in .rez format, so Mac users will need to convert it. Made by Mispeled.

2041.title: Sketchfighter 4000 Nova 1.1
2041.author: Anonymous
2041.description: This is a brand new version of Sketchfighter 4000 Nova. It adds a number of ships and weapons from the game Sketchfighter 4000 Alpha. This version (1.1) adds several more ships and outfits that the old version had, as well as changing many parts of the interface to mesh with the Sketchfighter theme. If you're a fan of Sketchfighter then this is the plug for you. By gray_shirt_ninja.

3203.title: Weapon Sounds Plugin Rez
3203.author: Shinra
3203.description: Hello everyone. This is my First Plugin for EV Nova. This Plugin contains Sounds used for Weapons. Weapon sounds include Star Wars, Star Trek, Babylon 5, Stargate, and a lot more. Enjoy. :)

3256.title: Fetty's Landing and Hypergate Access
3256.author: Fetty
3256.description: This add-on adds two items to the outfitter.  The first is a landing Pass which allows the holder to land on any planet no matter what.  The second is a hyper-gate pass which allows the holder to use the hyper-gate system without completing the Sigma storyline.  The passes are 10 mill a piece to preserve fair game play.

3362.title: Pirate and Police Concept
3362.author: JoshTigerheart
3362.description:
Pirate and Police Concept is a plug-in helpful for plug-in developers and TC creators.  The idea, explained in more detail in the readme, was originally presented for the Open Source TC.  It focuses on creating a more realistic system of handling piracy involving civillians, police, military, and pirates who may hide themselves or openly wave their flags.  While the plug is "playable", it is meant for the use for large plug-in and TC development purposes and isn't intended for the average user.
