The ideas within may be used with credit given.  The plug-in is presented as is and will not have any future updates.  Question or comments?  Please contact me via PM on the boards or through email in the address found in the Read Me.

3412.title: Active Flares for EVCN
3412.author: Qaanol
3412.description: This is a plug-in for the \"EV Classic for Nova\" total conversion of EV: Nova. Active Flares for EVCN restores the behavior of Decoy Flares to more closely match the original Escape Velocity game. With this plug-in, Decoy Flares are fired by the second trigger and drift slowly through space.

3441.title: minecraft tribue beta
3441.author: mercury software
3441.description:
this plug adds a few items from minecraft more will be added later.
enjoy :)

1808.title: ModPirateStarbridgePC
1808.author: Anonymous
1808.description:
The Mod Pirate Starbridge [PC]

This plugin adds one new ship: The Mod Pirate Starbridge. We felt it was necessary for there to be a mod variant of the pirate starbridge since there are modified versions of the others, and thus the plug was created... a year later.
This plug comes with a full set of graphics (which, I may add, are very well done.). Comes in Mac and PC format.

Graphics by persondude, compiled and written by StormÇrøw.  Released: 3/12/04
Version 1.0.3. Send any comments/bugs to insomniac1@sbcglobal.net and/or themess_stormcrow@hotmail.com

1519.title: CHECK b511 .sit
1519.author: Anonymous
1519.description: Flying around?  No "meaningful" missions in sight?  Aborted or turned away a crap load of other missions that would have led you to an unwanted destiny?  Can't seem to get anywhere anytime soon?  Frustrated?  Well this plug-in may alleviate all or none of those problems.  Introducing "CHECK b511"!!!!!!!  What this little plug-in does is check to see if this all important bit has been set.  Land any planet with a Mission BBS and if you see this mission being offered, then you KNOW you are NOT going to get into any major plotline.  Want to fix this nasty problem?  Just accept the mission and continue on your quest towards Galactic Conquest!!!!!     Known side-affects:  Will cause strange mannerisms to pilot if used improperly (i.e. accepting this mission if you are already in a major mission string or have completed one), as well as cause the pilot to get angry if this fix does not work.

1532.title: Colored Targets1
1532.author: Anonymous
1532.description: Tired of all those plain red targets? This plugin changes the colors of the targets to reflect their governments (they are the same color as what their background gradients are). For example, all Auroran ships remain red, while all Fed and Vell-os ship targets are a light shade of blue. This plugin won't conflict with any other plugins, unless the other plugins modify the default targets. Created by EVula (www.evula.com).

1625.title: Explosion Uplift-
1625.author: Anonymous
1625.description: Explosions Uplift      This little plugin makes the explosions ingame become bigger and last longer. Gameplay is not affected at all.

2165.title: Wild20Geese20Add-on.sit
2165.author: Anonymous
2165.description: This is a plug which adds 14 missions to the Wild Geese story line that deal mainly with McGowan and the pirates.  If you want it all:  action, adventure, and romance, this plug-in has it.  Questions and comments can be e-mailed to me at v00d00chi1e@yahoo.com.  It's my first plug, so be kind.  No known conflicts.  Plug-in's used with listed in read-me. Version 1.0 made with ResEdit using Nova Tools.

2211.title: MacPluginConvertor
2211.author: Anonymous
2211.description: By David Arthur. This simple utility converts EV Nova plug-ins from the Windows '.rez' format back into standard Macintosh plug-ins. For Mac OS 9 and Mac OS X.

2090.title: STNTFFplug 01v4.rez
2090.author: Anonymous
2090.description: Introducing the first teaser from the STN: The Final Frontier Development project. This plug allows you to buy an intrepid class star ship from most shipyards and includes a few other goodies. For Mac and Windows Versions. This download is for Windows. Email can be sent to stntff@startrekaccess.com

2069.title: SpaceTrader1.0
2069.author: Anonymous
2069.description: The moment you've been waiting for, the release of SpaceTrader! Over a month due, it is finally here, and with a vengence! SpaceTrader adds over 270 new  used ships and outfits! SpaceTrader also includes ArcAngel Counterstrikes Paint Station Prime! So buckle up, and prepare for an awesome ride! --- If you would like to make a suggestion for future updates, give comments, ask questions, or report ANY bugs, please mail either me (zealous@ev-nova.net) or Jonathan (jonathanboyd@mac.com).

1910.title: Polycon Targets
1910.author: Anonymous
1910.description: This plug-in is for the Polycon TC and will replace the target pictures to new ones. I made it because I wasn't satisfied with the standard Polycon targets. If you have any questions email me at BuchholzChris AT web DOT de

1325.title: skippercheat2V1
1325.author: Anonymous
1325.description:
This plugin fixes my second plugin, skipper2.  This basically fixes problems with my cargo bay, updates
a picture, adds a few outfits I never put in, such as the iff decoder, grav sensors, auto recharge, auto eject.
This also adds the light cannon which I forgot to put in....
The above were all fixes in the outfits plugin.
In the character plugin, I added a few characters I left out, including the kestrel and the unrelenting.
griffy208@aol.com

1341.title: SuperCheats2.0
1341.author: Anonymous
1341.description: In this version i fixed several bugs (like the fact that the kestral wasn't availible anywhere at all...and some others).  It also combines the two plugins into one plugin.  The last thing it adds is the Ultra Manta by request.  Enjoy!  Questions...comments...advice: CeRD@mac.com.

1574.title: EMEV-Rage
1574.author: Anonymous
1574.description: EV:Rage is a plugin I made for a few reasons.  First of all, I had just about had it with having the caps lock key on all the time, and I wanted the game to be a bit harder.  So there's EV:Rage.  It makes ships and weapons faster, adds more weapons, shields, cargo, space, etc. to ships, makes weapons more powerful, adds a few more pirates and such.  Have fun, and don't blame me if you can't leave a planet cause there's too many Feds outside.  By EvilMachine.

1611.title: evnovarized1.0.0
1611.author: Anonymous
1611.description:
EV: Novarized is a collection of modifications for EV: Nova Classic. It is not a cheat and does not add any new resources to the game, it only changes existing ones. It was created for the purpose of improving the Escape Velocity port and takes advantage of features only available under the Nova engine.
     Adds smoke trails to weapons, improves the Map window by increasing its size and having a "show borders" function, allows users to sell captured escorts, makes the Escort Carrier red, gives a better star background and allows players to buy the Executive Transport... and more to come!

1930.title: PulseLaserPD.sit
1930.author: Anonymous
1930.description: The Polaris Capacitor Pulse Laser now packaged with a devastating point defense targeting system. Available in standard and disabling versions. You have to see this thing at work to appreciate it! Comments? - make sure "nova" is in the subj line and email me at cbrubaker@mac.com

1951.title: rebeltroublefix.sea
1951.author: Anonymous
1951.description: Rebeltroublefix is a plugin I made to make it easyier to go from 1 plotline to the Rebel one when you're done with a mission string.   Rebeltroublefix makes it so the missions  like "regular food drop" from different plotlines no longer appear, so only the rebel ones appear. This prevents you from accidentaly doing a mission for a different plotline, which ends your rebel string. This plugin only works when you get to the rebel string through the bounty hunter's guild. use the B511CHECK plugin to help you with this after you compleat a differernt plotline.

2075.title: SSAplugin.sit
2075.author: Anonymous
2075.description:
Space Sniper Alliance v. 1.0.0
The Space Sniper Alliance is an anonymous organization whose members are paid to destroy ships. In this plug, there is a random and fun mission where the pilot seeks and shoots down a ship among lots of pirate patrols. There are also many SSA Upgrades like a Space Sniper Cannon, hyperspace unit, sensors, jammer, and a covert ops package.  There are two new weapons, the sniper cannon and a close combat cannon. Depending on interest, there will be expansion and updates.  Email tachyonzero@mac.com with bugs or comments.

2115.title: Thunderforgepilotfiles
2115.author: Anonymous
2115.description: Three Thunderforge pilot files. Two fleet destroying thunderforges.  From Robert e-mail Robert9198@aol.com

2141.title: Vellos Explosions
2141.author: Anonymous
2141.description: I made a plugins that adds some better looking explosions for when Vell-os ships bite the dust. I just didn't think that telepathic ships would have fiery explosions, so I fixed the problem. Also, it fixes a small problem with the higher T levels. Only for use with EV:Nova 1.0.2. Made by P-Psycho. E-mail any problems to parrypmp@earthlink.net. Have fun!

2190.title: EnRLEDeRLE
2190.author: Anonymous
2190.description: NovaTools: Encode/decode RLE sprites to and from PICT based sprites.  This is part of the NovaTools collection from wOOtWare.  Go to http://homepage.mac.com/dr_ralph/ for more information.

2205.title: EVNPluginManager1.3
2205.author: Anonymous
2205.description: Version 1.3 of the EVN Plugin Manager. Make your life easier by organizing your plugins. Now with Drag  Drop! Windows version will be released when EVN for Windows gets released. Enjoy! By iBooks, send email to booksleyATsympaticoDOTca

2257.title: SpacePort111
2257.author: Anonymous
2257.description: Use SpacePort to convert EV and EVO game files into the newer EV Nova format. This program is designed to provide the same functionality as the never-released Port Authority, by w00tware. While the ports come fairly close, I did the best I could to make conversions as near-perfect and easy-to-use as possible. Unfortunately, due to major engine changes between previous EV's and Escape Velocity Nova, you will have to redo a few things by hand... Check the ReadMe for details, moderate plugin experience recommended. This version is an improvement over the 1.1.0 version, with three bug fixes, two of which are fairly major. SpacePort is compatible with Mac OS 8.6 through Mac OS 10.3.5. ©2004 Inferno Studios ~ http://www.EVula.org/infernostudios/ ~ hypermike (at) adelphia (dot) net

2089.title: STN Teaser
2089.author: Anonymous
2089.description: While the STN: The Final Frontier plug-in is still in progress. This little teaser will give you a taste of what's to come. This teaser will change the loading screen and menu screen to that of the future STN: Final Frontier Plug-in. When complete the STN: The Final Frontier will change the Nova Universe to the Star Trek Universe. Enjoy. Swimmoryi@yahoo.com

1357.title: TraderPlus1.0
1357.author: Anonymous
1357.description: This is a very simple plug that starts you out with 150,000 credits, a Starbridge, and a combat rating of 400 (a "Good Ability" rating). This should be sufficient for all the starting missions for the major storylines. By The Dork Cheese. This is my second plug. Bug Reports and Comments go to thedorkcheese@yahoo.com.

1287.title: Planetary Weapons-WIN
1287.author: Anonymous
1287.description: This is a fun little plug that lets you buy planetary weapons, i.e the weapons that planets fire at you, and put them on your ship.  Included are the 400mm turreted railgun, Enormous Blaster Turret, Enormous Ion Turret, and the Polaron Massive Torpedo.  All of which are available on Sol.  Made by bassman.  Contact: bassman2k4@yahoo.com

1722.title: Incomplete TC
1722.author: Anonymous
1722.description:
Very Incomplete but playable TC, did this a while back. Unlikely to do more work on it, most of graphics is own work. Please feel free to use graphics/ideas etc. [NOTE FROM pipeline]
 -- I uploaded this one (even though it had no email address) because it looked like it might be of some use to some of you. --

1274.title: novatech mac
1274.author: Anonymous
1274.description: Unlocks all ships and outfits in EV Nova (including Alien technology). Items can be purchased on Sol. Denier-of-Soup, denier.os at gmail dot com.

2149.title: VellosRevival1.0.0.sitx
2149.author: Anonymous
2149.description: This is not my first plugin, just the first I have released. The purpose of this plugin is to show what could have happened if some Vell-os had stayed behind. Even if it is small, I will add more to this. Features in this version include additions/edits to Vell-os planets, systems, and hypergates, as well as reaninmating/adding the Polaris hypergates. send comments to him_kenshin@hotmail.com ~ Kenshin the Anceint

1549.title: Dark Kestrel
1549.author: Anonymous
1549.description:
Dark Kestrel is a plug-in that emphasizes the darker and foreign nature of the ship.  With completely new weapons, a new ship, and descs to make you wonder what really happened, the Dark Kestrel brings to the fore a mighty ship that both the noobs and the truly skilled can enjoy
by Arjjea Deonnas/for comments, questions and answers e-mail me at posluch@charter.net

1271.title: No More Ammo
1271.author: Anonymous
1271.description: Never worry about running out of missiles again with this plugin! just buy the tube, launcher, chute, etc. and you can fire all the missiles you want! the storm chaingun still uses ammo. X'arnor

2187.title: Charcoal
2187.author: Anonymous
2187.description: Charcoal is the font that is supposed to be used for Nova's button labels. It's a standard Mac OS 9 font, but unfortunately is not present in Mac OS X, so for those OS X users who are missing the font, here it is. Just install the font, and Nova will use it automatically. (Windows users can find a similar font in the Win Nova Resolution Patch.)

3221.title: EVN Default Resource Usage
3221.author: Nonconventionally Creative
3221.description:
This guide is a spreadsheet containing all of the resources from the default EVN scenario, version 1.0.10, as translated by EVNEW -totxt. For this reason it contains references to the exported media resources. 
Each resource type has its own tab, with frozen header panes. 
Each resource entry includes an abbreviation of the filename from which it came. 
'STR#' resources have been reformatted to show indices (and allow fitting within 256 columns). 
Also, I added 'STR ' patch IDs.
I optimized all column headers to minimize wasted space.

3372.title: Super Weapons Beta
3372.author: Plug Maker
3372.description: This plug adds 2 weapons, the death beam and the disable beam. It's a beta so if you have any problems, contact me at IJE98@aol.com.

1388.title: Close Combat Guide 1.03
1388.author: Anonymous
1388.description: JoshTigerheart's Department of Useful Guides has released the third update of the Close Combat Guide. This guide tells you which ships are good, what weapons to use, what outfits help, and what techniques to employ to ensure that no foe can stand up to your close ranged powers. Note that this guide is more directed towards average players, so it will not have specific stats and numbers in it. Things new to this version includes a new technique, several clarifications, who knows how many typo fixes, and hints on how to deal with various weapons and ships.  Also, the guide is fully updated for 1.09.  I no longer support any earlier version of Nova. Questions, comments, and contraband cookies should be sent to TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com. The guide was written with Wordpad. If you do not have that, anything better then Notepad and Simpletext should be able to view it. If the .doc version does not work, use the .rtf. The .doc looks much nicer and is easier to read.

1192.title: Big Money Cheat.sit
1192.author: Anonymous
1192.description: Does what it says on the tin!

1467.title: Arena EVN.sit
1467.author: Anonymous
1467.description: Arena - I always wanted a gladiator in EVN. This adds a new system and spob as well as new missions based on prize fighting. There are 6 divisions and prize money to go with it. If you can live through the kamikazi then you get a new rank as well. This may not work with other 3rd party plugins so use at your own risk. Version 1.0 by Chris Copeland.

1640.title: Fireworks
1640.author: Anonymous
1640.description: Just a small fun plug that increases the particles produced from most weapons, thus making them look a bit like fireworks

1960.title: Reliant 2.0
1960.author: Anonymous
1960.description: This is a update to reliant. I am not the creator of the original, but I am taking this from cheat to regular plug. The money is reduced to fifty thou, the grammar is corrected, and there is a plot to it. THIS IS NOT A STRING PLOT! Also, there are movies in this version.

1588.title: EV MAGMA Nova 1.1 for MacWindows
1588.author: Anonymous
1588.description: EV MAGMA is a complete overhaul for the sounds and graphics of the hit Ambrosia Software game Escape Velocity, originally released by meowx in 2001. Now, this great plug-in has been re-released for EV Nova Classic. With all new ship, weapon, outfit, and planet graphics, MAGMA is a vast improvement over the graphics of the original game. All credit goes to meowx for creating the original plug-in. Ported to EV Nova by CapnRobinson.

3268.title: Firefly
3268.author: Shinra
3268.description: This is one of my many ships the Firefly. This adds the firefly to be bought at the shipyard and you can also buy escorts at the bar. I also added a Per. "Serenity" The Shipyard and Target pic are form Gee's Scrapped Firefly Ship plugin. File is in Rez format, so Mac users you are going to need to convert it.

1990.title: RONINv1.1.1
1990.author: Anonymous
1990.description: Version 1.1.1 includes fixes for all the Houseless missions by correcting travel destination and cargoDrop/Load descriptions.  Other fixes include problems with Rachel/Kestrel mission, Association bounties and Heraan bounties.  Ronin extends the original Bounty Hunter story into it's own complete thread. For more information and the latest ulpdates visit http://www.0three0.net/l-1551/ Created by Kame

1567.title: Doomsday 1.5
1567.author: Anonymous
1567.description:
Doomsday 1.5 replaces a system to the north with Wormwood, which contains the station Apocalypse, home of Doomsday Industries. Buy advanced, hard-to-find technology, often improved over the original, or one of eight highly-expensive ships. Also contains some paint outfits modeled after AACPaintStationPrime.

I was going to wait until I had the mission strings completed until I posted an update, but I've learned the first archive I posted was corrupted I tested this to make sure it decompresses, and now you have the chance to play the first five missions and perhaps even explore beyond Wormwood.  If you have any problems, please contact IIvx at mac dot com.

1444.title: AACMD StarbridgeLights.sit
1444.author: Anonymous
1444.description: This plugin gives running lights to all types of Starbridges and their variants.  The graphic was made by originally AAC.  Enjoy. Version 1.0 released 7/7/02. Created by MacDevil.  Graphics by Arc Angel Counterstrike. Send questions and comments to AGS848@AOL.com.

1589.title: EV osX icon
1589.author: Anonymous
1589.description: New EV Nova OSX Icon (Raven) I thought your osX iCON  was a little boring so heres a new one... Expand the file - Select the new icon - Get info - select the icon (in the get info window) - Copy Then- Select your EV Nova application - Get info - select the icon (in the get info window) - Paste Presto, you should ha a groovy new Icon. (send questions or comments to kake-sd@cox.net) EVula's Note: while this isn't a plugin, it's the only category where it fits (well, it's the one where it doesn't fit the least...).

1755.title: LargeNovaMap12805D4C8
1755.author: Anonymous
1755.description: This small plug-in does only one thing: it enlarges the map-dialog. If you are using a resulotion of about 1280 by 1024 and always were anoyed by the small map-dialog this is for you. Unfortunately EVN still draws the political borders in its former constraints, which may look a little weird at times.

2100.title: swtnjo teaser 2.sit
2100.author: Anonymous
2100.description:
The second teaser for the Star Wars: The New Jedi Order plugin!!!!! This teaser replaces the scan graphics and ship graphics of the Auroran Carrier, Auroran Cruiser, Heavy Shuttle, and Polaris Arachnid. --NOTE-- This plug DOES NOT change the stats, only the graphics, of these ships!!! Enjoy!!!!!
 -Made by Gemini14, TNJO Dev. Team Leader

2124.title: Turreted CPL
2124.author: Anonymous
2124.description:
This is a simple plug that adds a balanced outfit: the turreted compacitor pulse laser.   Every thing is mostly the same as the original.  Read the Readme!
Comments, question: rolley49@yahoo.com
Should be compatible with any non weapon/outfit.

2126.title: Turreted Railguns
2126.author: Anonymous
2126.description: Turreted Railguns. Ever wish that those railguns were turreted? Well, your wish is granted. This Plugin adds a turreted 150mm railgun and 200mm railgun to the game. They cost the same as the railgun, and take up the same amount of space. Tell me what you think at shebber@hotmail.com. Made by stlyesom.

2151.title: VellosTech2
2151.author: Anonymous
2151.description: This Plug-in will allow you to buy and hire Vell-os ships. It also gives you access to Vell-os weaponry and senses. Even though they don't require any space, the weapons aren't free.  You should be able to buy/hire at almost any system with a shipyard/outfitter. If not, then go to Earth. I've tested the weaponry and ships on the Feds over at Sol. Denier-of-Soup (denier@rawr32.net)

1234.title: Heavy Blaster MOD
1234.author: Anonymous
1234.description: Simple modification that changes the heavy blaster turret shot the super heavy blaster turret.  (The one Fed planets have.)  Looks much more "heavy".  Windows and Mac plugs are included. Contact at garethcross@shaw.ca

1976.title: rEV Windows001
1976.author: Anonymous
1976.description:
rEV WinNova is an authorized but unofficial zip archive version of the original rEV in .rez format created by KMQ made to be a much more easier installation to PC/Windows machines for maximum enjoyability (Thanks by the way sir for the chat on irc). Please note this is part one of three parts of file, so you will need all three parts in order to expand the archive. Quoting from KMQ himself, "For those who don't know rEV is a graphics update meant to be used with the EV Classic port."  The installation of the classic port for windows/pc registered users can be located here:

http://www.ambrosiasw.com/cgi-bin/vftp/show.pl?product=evncategory=essentialsdisplay=datefile=win_evnova_classic.zip

Anyone with questions, problems, comments is strongly encouraged to contact me please!

PC/Win Port Developer: ProfessorADN -- super.photoguy@verizon.net

1515.title: Cetus
1515.author: Anonymous
1515.description:
Cetus.zip

This is my first plug-in for EV Nova. I created it entirely from scratch. It introduces you to two new governments, several upgraded ships, new weapons, new systems and planets, and more. A lot of things are not complete but what is available is mostly finished.
It is currently a BETA that needs testing. I have tested it with two of my friends but I need more input from others in the Nova world.
If you have any bugs to report, or questions/comments please email me at darth_v8er_dude@yahoo.com. You must put EV Nova in the subject line or I will delete the email! Beta release version: .2d    Author: Darth Vader
NOTE: Please read the readme! I put a lot of time into it and it contains essential information.

1373.title: Zero Point Outfits
1373.author: Anonymous
1373.description: Since nobody has yet exploited the awesome potential of vacuum energy in Nova,  not even the mighty Polaris, well, by dad gum, someone had to change that.  So, I took the afternoon and spent some quality time making this .rez file with EVNEW just because I needed to have a good excuse for me to feel depressed about not having the resources to make a Mac plug.  The result was this: a ZPM available in a new system with a new government surprisingly close to Earth that nobody has yet discovered.  It's the lost outpost of the Ancients!  And, that of course, means lots of cool technology that runs on ZPMs.  And then, just because I was feeling devious, I also included a devastating new gun that should just make life so much easier.  So, those of you who are familiar with the Stargate universe should make good use of these new outfits.  They cost a lot, but they are worth it.  Plus, if you're downloading this, you are probably already a massive cheater and you have the money.  These plugs were created by Pete Kruger (pkrug539@dotnet.com)  Questions?  Comments?  Free food?  Drop me a line.  Read the read-me if you want to know what I'll delete and what I'll actually read.

2020.title: Ship Neccesities
2020.author: Anonymous
2020.description: This plug is four of the best outfits in my opinion - a Cloak with Cloak Detector, an Inertial Damper, a Universal Map, and a Multi-Jump.  This is a fully-tested Mac plug for any type of EVN.  This will work for any and all TC's of EVN, including the much-fanfared SFA (one of my favorites).  I find the Map useful for the times when I play strict mode and get blown to bits by Pirates and don't want to have to go through all the exploring again.  Have fun!

1437.title: 2ndTriggerIonCannon
1437.author: Anonymous
1437.description: Ever been annoyed that your Ion Cannon fires constantly despite the fact that your target is halfway across the system? Ever notice that enemy vessels have the ability to only fire it when in range? This plug changes all LEGAL ion cannons to secondary weapons, allowing you to conserve fuel and only use it when tactically sound. Finally you can disable the ship without worrying about that last FPC blast that slipped out... by Shrout1 - shroutdude@hotmail.com

1440.title: 3D Shield Bubbles
1440.author: Anonymous
1440.description: The 3-D Shield Bubbles plug-in adds shield glow to all EV:N 1.0.4 ships. The plug consists of 15 sizes of PICT shield glow graphics and all 284 EV:N 1.0.4 shän with the appropriate size shield glow specified. 1.Apr 2003 : Alexander Salokat : a.salokat@web.de

1801.title: MissionPack1.0
1801.author: Anonymous
1801.description: The Mission Pack adds some minor mission the the orignal EV: Nova storyline. These missions, while not having any real effect on the rest of the game, do use some cool effects. If people like this idea, then I'll release future versions with more missions. Hope you have fun with it!

2119.title: Tichel Moon.sit
2119.author: Anonymous
2119.description:
Lone plug-in "Tichel moon", adds a moon to Viking containing cool ships and a mission for HUUGGEEE $$$!  As I know it works fine, from the Red halo plug in pack..

achead_@mac.com
Machead

1996.title: SAE PC v1  I of II
1996.author: Anonymous
1996.description:
SAE - PART I of II - PC

Feb 6th 2005 note: The official SAE site IS going down. So I have uploaded THIS PC version of Star Wars: Smuggler's Alliance Expansion copyright 2003-2004 Xeres to Ambrosia Software EV:Nova Add-ons site. Please enjoy THIS PRE-CONVERTED PC VERSION. If you need support you MUST email me (Xeres) At: mc23418@yahoo.com That email will ALWAYS be around. 

For size reasons I plit the plug-in onto TWO parts, you MUST have both parts I AND II to play. Get it all at ASW. 

Part I SHOULD contain:
SAE Data 1.rez
SAE Data 2.rez
SAE Data 3 .rez
SAE Data 4.rez
SAE Data 5.rez
SAE Data 6.rez
SAE Graphics 1.rez
SAE Graphics 2.rez
SAE Graphics 3.rez
SAE Graphics 4.rez
READ ME File

1306.title: Rebels
1306.author: Anonymous
1306.description:
This Pug-In adds 31 missions at the Mission BBS on Rebel II in the Koria System.
You can get Ships and other things for 0 Credits! You only have to land again!

1322.title: skippercheat1
1322.author: Anonymous
1322.description: This is a cheat which includes 6 new / modified outfits (phaser is my favorite).  It also includes one char in addiition to the default.  You get a scarab, and are competent and work for feds, and polari.  you start with lots of money here too.   read the read me for the full scoop

1665.title: GameEnhancements1.2.sit
1665.author: Anonymous
1665.description: This plug enhances many areas of the game. It adds links between many storylines and makes it so that the Forced Fed String is no longer a dead end. There is now a new battle at the end of the Rebel string. This plugin also incorporates my RebelSideMissionsFix1.0 plugin.  This is version 1.2 which adds support for 1.0.4 and fixes a major bug.  Enjoy. Version 1.2 released 4/22/03. Created by MacDevil. Send questions and comments to AGS848@AOL.com.

1924.title: Pretty Targets.sit
1924.author: Anonymous
1924.description: Pretty Targets is a plug that replaces the red, lined, and somewhat monotonous target grpahics in Nova with beautiful full color pictures of the ships, most of which are taken from the picture which shows up when you get info on a ship in the shipyard.  The target graphics look much better now and shouldn't give a hit on performance.  By DePaul.

1768.title: Longer Battles
1768.author: Anonymous
1768.description: Tired of battles going by in the blink of an eye?  Did you think that a certain battle in a storyline should have lasted alot longer?  Well, now those wishes can come true!  This plug doubles the shields and armor of all the ships and doubles the strength of all shield and armor outfits so those battles can last longer, thus becoming more entertaining.  Now, Federation Carriers shrug off those Hellhounds, Auroran Cruisers laugh at your Heavy Blaster Turrets, and Ravens just plow through everything you fire at them.  Of course, you can do the same now as well, so the playing field is still just as even as it was before.  It just now takes you longer to win...or loose. Questions? Comments? Bug reports? Send them to TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com. Like the others, this plug is in Windows format. Mac users need a convertor.

1498.title: Better Start 2.0
1498.author: Anonymous
1498.description: Better Start 2.0 still allows you to start with a Heavy Shuttle with 100,000 credits. The intro has been changed to just a text box but still is great to read. I've also added a picture to the intro so it looks better and I removed the plugin designers from the game because of a very unkind complaint. If there are any problems contact me at deathshot@neo.rr.com - Made by: Gremlin360, chronodrago, and JacaByte.

1199.title: ChrisKestrel.sit
1199.author: Anonymous
1199.description: This plugin upgrades the Kestrel and chops the price down over 1/2 off. I've boosted the shields, armor, speed, and turn rate so as to help it more easily stand up to the big boys (such as the Raven and Javelin). I've even added a little suprise... see the readme file attached. Also added more crew for taking over ships with and lots more free mass for your own upgrades! Go now, friends, and rule the galaxy!

1246.title: KenNorris.sit
1246.author: Anonymous
1246.description: Some cheat plugins make EV Nova crash on some systems because there is an upper limit to the number of outfits that may be available at any given time.  The solution is to make a plugin wherein the best items are always available and the rest are never available.  If you have the same number of outfits available at each outfitter, your system will not crash from exceeding the upper limit.  This plugin also makes new pilots start as a "Virtuous Citizen" in every governments' systems.  This file comes with a Read Me and a sample pilot file to play with.  Created by Ken Norris.

1394.title: EV Nova Resource Bible.html
1394.author: Anonymous
1394.description:
HTML resource bible

html port of the resource bible, navigation bar on left of window.
much easier to use than all the other ones imho...

2178.title: XenophobicGovts
2178.author: Anonymous
2178.description:
Just plop this in your friends Plugins folder for a real laugh.  Dont snicker too loud when the whole Federation army is pounding your friends wimpy shuttle.
This changes all the governments to Xenophobic (Will attack you allways).  Made by: The Cheat  Thecheat112@yahoo.com

1481.title: auroffshootfix
1481.author: Anonymous
1481.description:
AurOffshootFix 1.0 released 5/10/02 by Kanddak
Removes the hideously annoying "no mission for cargo ships" flag from Auroran offshoot missions 1 1b and 2, enabling some more missions in the Auroran line for starbridge pilots, which you might otherwise miss completely (as unlike the "no mission for cargo ships" nuisance in the Polaris missions, the offshoots are not necessary to complete the game).

1487.title: balance changes
1487.author: Anonymous
1487.description: After playing the game a while, I didn't like how weak the Federation ships were, or how some of the stuff in the game was either priced out of practical use or just didn't do enough for it's costs. I hopped on resedit and tweaked away. I've used these setting for a while now, and some of my friends who have the game asked me to send it to them, so I thought I'd see if the rest of the evn comunity might wanna try my balance changes.

1503.title: BlackBeltWithRestart.sit
1503.author: Anonymous
1503.description:
After getting to the seventh "step" in the Auroran story line and receiving martial arts training, this awards a Black Belt in the Heron Style martial arts as a token of you new increased ability to capture disabled ships.  This Plugin also unsets the flag that prevent you from starting any other story line.  So you can get your Black Belt and then play through any of the other story lines.  But getting back in the good graces of the Feds so you'll be offered the story you want can be an adventure in itself!

email   TerrellEGrayJr@yahoo.com

1571.title: EM-ReCycle
1571.author: Anonymous
1571.description: ReCycle is a plug-in I wrote after finishing one of the main storylines and realizing that I couldn't play another storyline afterwards.  What this plugin does is makes a special mission, found in the BBS, named "Restart".  Once this mission is accepted, you will be able to play any of the storylines again with the same pilot, but you will lose most of your cash and your ship.  I did this to keep it from being a cheater plug, cause starting off with a kestrel in the beginning of the game is kinda cheap.  You do keep any Ranks you had before, so if you had the HyperGate codes, you keep those.  By EvilMachine.

1573.title: EMCharacters
1573.author: Anonymous
1573.description: EM - Characters is a little plug that lets you choose from 7 different character types.  These will actually make the game harder, not easier, for people who want to have a new challenge.  They're all pretty different, each one comes with a new intro screen, and your status bar will change depending on what government you're in best with.  By EvilMachine.

1601.title: EVN-StarCraft TC Pre-Beta
1601.author: Anonymous
1601.description:
I originally started on this project in an effort to make an StarCraft total conversion for EV:Nova but as I stumbled on many problems that prevented me from completing this project It was left unfinished. This is the still unfinished pre beta version of the plug, and it contains many ships and weapons. I will upload it here so that other plug in makers can use my work or maybe continue it. 
Evil_Shadow

1613.title: EVNUltraWarp
1613.author: Anonymous
1613.description: UltraWarp is a utility plugin which shortens the duration of the warp effect, allowing you to make long trips at a faster pace.

1633.title: FedPatrolBoatUpgraded
1633.author: Anonymous
1633.description: A fed Patrol Boat Upgrated to do all mission strings it is up to your skill level if your ship makes it thru a mission string, also for people who can not use the plug-in folder you can still reload some of the ammo, this pilot file is also for first time pilots who downloaded EV Nova and want extra speed, firepower, shield and armor etc. I do not know if it will take out a Starbridge E. From Robert e-mail Robert9198@aol.com and Pirate Software.

1658.title: Galaxymap1.0.zip
1658.author: Anonymous
1658.description:
This is a balanced plug for a map that reaveals all systems you can jump to (All but s7even). It costs 1.5m and wieghs 5 tons, so I consider it balanced. If you have any questions or comments send them to me at nextgenddrer21@hotmail.com. This version includes the mac and windows version of the plug.

enjoy!

1695.title: HeavyWeaponWarshipPack
1695.author: Anonymous
1695.description: Heavy Weapon Warship Pack is a plugin that adds a very powerful missle. (the antimatter missle) and two cheatish upgrades for mass, shields/armor, a repair system, and extra weapon mountings. it is all you will ever need aside from the stock weapons to make your own Heavy Missle warship. it also has some VERY VERY sweet graphics courtosy of 'mindfrelled' Made with EVNEW for Windows, so you will need a converter to use it on a mac. the rest was put together by me (Cunjo) for you (insert name here) please email me with any questions, bugs, comments or abusive emails at MobiusM1@gmail.com. thank you for using my plugin.

1721.title: ImprovedStart.sit
1721.author: Anonymous
1721.description: Removes the Vell-os missions unless you start as a telepath and offers various other possible starts. Also reduces the chances of being offered the key missions and increases the requirements for them so that newcomers are less likely to be overwhlemed by choice and left unprepared.

1735.title: Kamikaze Leviathans.sit
1735.author: Anonymous
1735.description: A small plugin that adds a kamikaze leviathan to the game. Send them into battle and blow up all ships in your path. Includes a preconverted windows .rez version as well as a mac version. Made by Cunjo.

1746.title: Khamikazi.sea
1746.author: Anonymous
1746.description:
Khamikazi Viper v1.0.0
	This plug adds one ship, the Khamikazi Viper, and it's bay. This is different from the other version made as it doesn't replace the Federation viper bay. The Khamikazi viper is a viper that will slam into enemy ships, causing massive damage. 
		Created by Meaker VI
		With Help from AGDenton

1757.title: LaserTorp
1757.author: Anonymous
1757.description:
v 0.9 This plugin adds one weapon, the "Nuclear Pumped X-Ray Laser Torpedo" and the 2 associated outfits. It should be available on Viking or anywhere else the EMP Torp is. This is a powerful missile weapon, but not so powerful as to be a cheat (about the same as an EMP torp, but a bit faster and less vulnerable to PD weapons). It has pretty good range, but you'll miss the cool part if you are not close enough to the target to see it when it detonates.
It is not quite fully polished (outfitter picts, sounds etc.), but I would like comments before going though that much more effort. Created by tessa_rat@yahoo.com 8/9/04

1769.title: LowendTempest
1769.author: Anonymous
1769.description:
This plug modifys the winter tempest so it won't slow down low end computers. Great if you have an old computer. :)
By Xenesis

1783.title: Mark V v1.0c
1783.author: Anonymous
1783.description: Last time it seems the data file was corrupted and wouldn't unstuff properly, so I'm re-uploading it.  The plug-in's major focus is the ability to upgrade Starbridges or Valkyries to their next level (i.e Mod C to Mod D, Rebel IV to Rebel V) and adds a few other things as well.  By Tazian.

1800.title: MissionPack1.0.1
1800.author: Anonymous
1800.description: The Mission Pack adds some minor mission the the orignal EV: Nova storyline. These missions, while not having any real effect on the rest of the game, do use some cool effects. Version 1.0.1 fixes (hopfully) all of the spelling mistakes left in 1.0.0. Version 1.0.2 should be out soon, which will be compatible with several other popular plugins and have some new missions. Check out http://www.geocities.com/newkongindustries/missionpack.html for the latest information.

1816.title: MorePower
1816.author: Anonymous
1816.description: Remember how in Escape Velocity and Escape Velocity Override how fast the ships were and when you pressed the caps lock to double the speed it was almost too fast to fight or board ships? This plugin is here to solve the incredible sluggish movements of all the ships in the game ( thus keeping the current balance between all ships). This plugin doubles all the speeds, accelerations and turning speeds for all two-hundred and seventy-eight versions of ships that are in Escape Velocity: Nova.  email: gewthen@mac.com

1823.title: Myprsplug1.0.1.sit
1823.author: Anonymous
1823.description:
This is a plug that includes 33 new pëople, most of which were submitted to me by people on the EVN webboard. The other ones are mostly pilots of mine. This plug was self-tested, so Im not completely sure, but it should be compatible with anything that doesnt change any përs files. Thanks for playing my plug! Geoff
Email bugs/suggestions to Lavarpsu10@aol.com

1838.title: NewShips1.0.2
1838.author: Anonymous
1838.description: This plugin adds a few new ships that you can buy, some more new weapons that are expencive, and an edited system. Made by: Unreal Centipede Unrealcentipede@yahoo.com

1845.title: Nova Files
1845.author: Anonymous
1845.description: These are pilot files and some plug ins I downloaded, on the vip ship Duchess you need to put the Duchess plug in, in the plug ins folder the fed patrol ship named Bounty Hunter you need the H-bomb plug in, put it in the plug ins folder. From Robert e-mail Robert9198@aol.com Try out the pilot files send e-mail if you like them or not.

1859.title: Out of Fuel Fix
1859.author: Anonymous
1859.description:
Out of fuel? Last save point an unihabited planet/station? This simple plug-in will grant the player a single solar panel, so you can recharge and continue on your way. You only need to land and take off. Works in any system.

This plug-in works by creating one new cron event (RID 400) which will activate if the player does not own a solar panel. Remove plug-in after use.

This is a .rez file created with EVNEW, Mac users will need to convert it. Comments? Questions? Bugs? Send an email to slouch@stonerrock.net.

1895.title: polaris fix.sit
1895.author: Anonymous
1895.description: This plug fixes a minor problem with the Polaris storyline, in which some people were having problems with completing the mission to Capture the Vell-os Lyrell on Earth.

1907.title: PolShipFix.sit
1907.author: Anonymous
1907.description: This plug-in fixes a slight problem I found in EVN 1.0.1. In v1.0.1 two of the Polaran ships, the Cloaking Raven and Scarab can appear in the game before theyre supposed to. While this is not a critical problem, it upsets the continuity of the game and can imbalance combat in Polaran space during the early parts of the game.

1915.title: PolyconGraphics2PC
1915.author: Anonymous
1915.description: Polycon EV is a total conversion for EV Nova featuring all new ships, outfits, systems, etc. More information and screenshots can be found at the Polycon EV website... http://www.evula.org/anubis/index.html By AnubisTTP (arrakis666@yahoo.com). PC conversion by Belthazar. NOTE: also requires Polycon_EVv1.2PC, PolyconShipsPC, PolyconGraphics1PC and PolyconGraphics3PC.

1917.title: PolyconGraphics3PC
1917.author: Anonymous
1917.description: Polycon EV is a total conversion for EV Nova featuring all new ships, outfits, systems, etc. More information and screenshots can be found at the Polycon EV website... http://www.evula.org/anubis/index.html By AnubisTTP (arrakis666@yahoo.com). PC conversion by Belthazar. NOTE: also requires Polycon_EVv1.2PC, PolyconShipsPC, PolyconGraphics1PC and PolyconGraphics2PC.

1922.title: PolyconShipsPC
1922.author: Anonymous
1922.description: Polycon EV is a total conversion for EV Nova featuring all new ships, outfits, systems, etc. More information and screenshots can be found at the Polycon EV website... http://www.evula.org/anubis/index.html By AnubisTTP (arrakis666@yahoo.com). PC conversion by Belthazar. NOTE: also requires Polycon_EVv1.2PC, PolyconGraphics1PC, and PolyconGraphics2PC.

1925.title: ProdigalSon1.0.sit
1925.author: Anonymous
1925.description: This plugin makes it so that Commander Krane is no longer flying around in a weak Starbridge when you have to kill or capture her.  Be careful, she is now a very tough opponent.  Created by MacDevil.  E-mail at AGS848@AOL.com with comments.

1940.title: Railgun Fighter Class Abomination
1940.author: Anonymous
1940.description: Railgun Fighter Class Ambomination. This plugin adds an Abomination variant to the game. It mounts 5 150mm railguns and 4 200mm railguns as its standard weapons. Tell me what you think at shebber@hotmail.com. Made by stlyesom.

1983.title: RewardShips.sit
1983.author: Anonymous
1983.description: This plugin adds one new "reward" ship for each of the six mission strings as well as four other "ships" that are available at the end of any string.  All are found on the ATMOS planet at the end of the string.  This is for people who want something new and different to go conquor the galaxy in after a mission string.  This is version 1.0.  It is not compatable with any other plugins that modify the existing EVN ships or adds new ones.  It is compatable with fixes and new targets.  Version 1.0 released on 5/22/02.  E-mail MacDevil at AGS848@AOL.com with comments!

2021.title: ShipsUpgrade.sit
2021.author: Anonymous
2021.description: This plug-in allows 40 ships to be upgraded via the Outfitters, to a different subclass. Upgrades to Rebel, Pirate, Federation, Sigma and Auroran ships included. Also 5 Variant ships can be bought at the shipyards, including improved Sigma Ships with updated Sigma Bulk Missions. Also, a seperate plug-in fixes problems with Polaris ships which can cloak / tunnel, adding full long names to the ships, indicating which organs they have. Fully compatible with Fixes, and has a comprehensive Read Me. This version fixes two minor problems with the plug-in. By Michael-Luke Jones -- Problems and queries to jonesml45@mac.com.

2036.title: SigmaWarship
2036.author: Anonymous
2036.description: This plugin adds a new ship and outfit. The new ship is a souped up levithan. They are lacking descipritions and you cannot buy the sigma energy cannon without the ship.The outfit kills sheilds but does no damage to armor.Email me at Neodragon52@aol.com

2037.title: Simultaneous Fire
2037.author: Anonymous
2037.description: This is a fun plug-in that changes the firing style of certain weapons to fire simultaneously when you buy more of it's type, instead of simply shooting faster.  This plug-in was created by EVNEW, so it probably will not work on Macintosh machines, but requires no conversion to be made by windows users.  Hope you like it!

2105.title: The amazing lego plug
2105.author: Anonymous
2105.description:
This is a proof-of-concept plug- it adds a small, cheap ship that was built using a lego modeler found on ldraw.org. It was built with MacBrickCad, rendered with POV-ray, and does not, as of yet, include any graphics other than those needed by the shän. Have fun! 
-made by )\/(aelstrom, andystei_at_san_dot_rr_dot_com

2113.title: TheChallenge102.sea
2113.author: Anonymous
2113.description: This is a plug for players looking for a new challenge from EVN. The challenge is simply to dominate the new system. It is harder than you might think. The Challenge v. 1.0.2 includes several fixes, as well as a bonus easier version of the plug-in for those who find the original too much of a challenge. This should now work with AAC Paint Station Prime, a popular plug made by AAC, and several resource IDs have been adjuested to work with Nova 1.0.1 without changing any parts of the original scenario. Made by mrxak.

2164.title: White Star
2164.author: Anonymous
2164.description: This is just a taste of an upcoming plug of mine in which i am going to unleash all your favorite ships from babylon-5 into the evn universe it doesn't have a desc in this file and for the plug it will be much stronger but this is like i said just a taste email me for requests bonzai3452002@yahoo.com

2169.title: WinUnityP2.sit
2169.author: Anonymous
2169.description: This is a Windows compatible version of Unity.  The plugin adds 12 additional missions to the Vell-os storyline.  They deal with the final defeat of the Bureau after the suicide of Commander Krane as well as the final union of humanity (thus the title of the plugin).  Also included is Unity Part 1, which adds 12 additional missions to the end of the Polaris storyline.  They deal with an ancient enemy of the Wraith and many characters from the Polaris storyline as well as some others return in these new missions.  This version has been slightly altered from the original Mac version to avoid a fatal bug with AI ships attacking planets under the PC version.  There are only a few minor changes, but the game will no longer crash.  PLEASE NOTE: This plugin is not in .rez format and will need to be converted after download.  Enjoy! Part Two (PC) released 9/27/03.  Send questions and comments to AGS848@AOL.com.  Requires EV Nova for Windows version 1.0.6.

2241.title: NovaPaintCarbon
2241.author: Anonymous
2241.description: This program allows you to calculate the ModVal value for Paint. It has an easy-to-use GUI which lets you calculate the value either as RGB percentages or using the standard apple color picker. Made by Kevin Ballard [http://kevin.sb.org/evnova/]

2251.title: PilotConverter3.0.sit
2251.author: Anonymous
2251.description: The spirit moves you and you feel the need to play in a different universe. Maybe you've downloaded the EV or EVO plugins for Nova, maybe you're moving from the Mac version of EVN to the Windows one. Any way you look at it, you're going to miss your old pilot file. You know the one: it has that super 31373 ship that took you hours and hours to save up for and equip the way you wanted. If only there were some way to convert you old EV/EVO/Mac pilot file to work with Mac/PC Nova. Well, now you can. Utility only runs on the Mac.

1759.title: Leka EVON 1.sit
1759.author: Anonymous
1759.description: Leka EVON corrects two system errors in the EVO plug-in set for NOVA.  1)  DSN-9843 (ID = 186) has only 90% ships (dude).  2)  Leka (ID = 342) has only 90% ships (dude).  This plug-in is only for use in EVO for NOVA and not for the Classic version of EVO. Afterburner.

2142.title: Vellos Weapons
2142.author: Anonymous
2142.description: This plugin is still in beta. Anyone who uses it does not have to send feedback, but it would be greatly appreciated. Just as it says, this adds some new weapons along the vell-os string. Please refer to the read me, and please keep in mind, as this is a beta, if your computer either a. Explodes in your face or B. Mutates into a living being bent on your destruction, it is no responsibility of mine and is your risk. [email removed at author's request]

1224.title: fnoigyweap
1224.author: Anonymous
1224.description: 2 new weapons for those of Federation ranks.  If you can buy a Gunboat, you can buy the Lightning Gun.  If you can buy a Carrier, you can buy the Super Laser.  Extract fnoigyweap.hqx to your desktop.  In the folder Archive, take Fnoigy Weapons and put it in your Nova Plugins folder.  Play and enjoy.  See enclosed txt file for a few more details.  created by fnoigy@hotmail.com

2018.title: Ship Hangar for EVO
2018.author: Anonymous
2018.description: Ship Hangar for EVO: Public Version 1.0 - For use with the official port of EV Override for EVN game engine, this plug-in adds one new station in the Iothe system, to the galactic south of UE space. The Ship Hangar Station can store up to 2 fully customized ships for the relatively small price of 50,000 credits. Your ships can be retrieved from the station at any point afterwards. See enclosed Read Me for full details. These are .rez files created with EVNEW, Mac users will need to convert them! Comments? Questions? Bugs? Send an email to slouch@stonerrock.net

1186.title: Battlecruiser PC
1186.author: Anonymous
1186.description: This is my first submitted plug-in for Nova. Adds a new ship called Battlecruiser, and a weapon called Disruptor Turret.  So far there are no descriptions and the ship and weapon are free, but these will be fixed in later versions.  THIS PLUG IS BETA. Version .15b

1541.title: Continuum
1541.author: Anonymous
1541.description: The Deltan Star Continuum is the empire that Devlin Sotanax carved out of space.  This REZ plug-in has all 7 ships, Devlin's system and world, as well as our Tachyon reactor.  Hope you like the radar graphics, e-mail me for any problems at sotanax2001@yahoo.com.  Come to my world.....and shop til you drop!

1982.title: rEVWinNovaShipsRes
1982.author: Anonymous
1982.description:
This zip archive features enlarged sized ships for rEV WinNova as .rez files for use only as a "resource addition" to those that use the PC/Win editor "EVNEW". These files are NOT plug-ins but rather additional ship graphics authorized but unoffically stemming from the original rEV by KMQ. Use these only of you want amazingly huge ships to play with that fill up your screen! Also includes the original smaller sized corvette ship graphics for those that find the corvette to big to play with on rEV WinNova.

Anyone with questions, problems, comments is strongly encouraged to contact me please!

PC/Win Port Developer: ProfessorADN -- super.photoguy@verizon.net

1334.title: stellarnuke
1334.author: Anonymous
1334.description:
Stellar Nuke:
Transforms the stellar grenade into a stellar nuke, which kills almost everything within it's range ("small"=500 pixels, "big"=1000 pixels).  The best part is that it doesn't hurt the player at all.  This plugin also allows you to buy the stellar nuke launcher and stellar nukes everywhere for free, and it takes up zero mass.  Also, you can buy up to 500 launchers and 500 grenades.  Pick one of the two sizes (one plugin has "small", one has "big"), and drag it into the Plugins folder.  Have fun...
-jprummo@gmail.com

1795.title: Mining Beam 3.0
1795.author: Anonymous
1795.description:
Mining beam 3.0 is here! This plug-in is perfect for those who don't have the time to mine! This beam will destroy any asteroid it comes in contact with! This is the mac version of the copy.
Questions, Comments, Feedback, and death threats should go to JPNyden@att.net

1697.title: HELHOUND missile ship variant1
1697.author: Anonymous
1697.description:
HellHound missile ship variant allow you to drive a Hellhound missile.
This version 1.1 fix the bug who unallow you to buy objects and weapons after you purchase the ship.

Email : lancelot.deferriere@free.fr

1215.title: escorts mac
1215.author: Anonymous
1215.description: Unlocks all escorts including the Aliens, and unique ships such as the Unrelenting and the Kestrel. Warning: This plugin may interfere with some of the ships unlocked in my Novatech plugin. Denier-of-Soup, denier.os at gmail dot com.

2073.title: Spinning Weapons 1.1
2073.author: Anonymous
2073.description: Another plugin updated by the JoshTigerheart's department of utterly useless plugs. What this plug does is make every non-beam non-fighter weapon in the game spin around endlessly. Yes! Now you can watch them spin and spin until you pass out from becoming dizzy. Past visual effects, this plug does nothing. Should be compatible with most other plugs due to its absurd simplicity.  The 1.1 updated makes the plug fully compatible with the 1.09 version and take less than half the space on your hardrive! Send questions/comments/bug reports/mindless rambling to TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com. This plug was made with EVNew so therefore is in Windows format. Mac users must convert it to run.

2261.title: SpinApp3
2261.author: Anonymous
2261.description: A universal program ( can run on any computer that has the java virtual machine installed ). A small application that shows an open dialog that can take multiple images, or just one. Depending on the choice it will combine the images into a spin, or it will create a spin from one image, then it will ask where to save the new spin. The new spin will be saved as a pict. Can extract mask from transparency and no longer screws up with transparency. This version fixes some problems with the file filter, and adds one or 2 things. Check for updates at: http://evweb.aresaxis.us/ Email: ajwweb@earthlink.net

2038.title: Sirrus
2038.author: Anonymous
2038.description: This is my first EV Nova plug-in, so I hope people enjoy it. Simply put, it adds a single Zephyr who wanders around the universe. He says some funny stuff and has some good gear if you manage to board him. Made by Scout.

1187.title: BeamZ
1187.author: Anonymous
1187.description: This plug is called BeamZ. It allows you to buy two new beam weapons on Earth. This is my first plug-in I have ever made, so it might have a few glitches and stuff, but I don't think it does. Any comments, complaints, requests, questions, and so forth send to  bladeboy295 at yahoo dot com. Windows format, Mac users can convert. Enjoy, and wait for more to come!

1175.title: Polaris Alpha
1175.author: Anonymous
1175.description: _Polaris_Alpha_ combines all of my previous plugins, BeamZ, Map Tech v1.1, Zalien Access and adds a bunch of small little changes, and a few big changes. It is a cheat, because I have added a super-easy mission which pays BIG! It is for windows, mac will have to convert. Enjoy! -X'arnor

1858.title: OryHara Laser
1858.author: Anonymous
1858.description: Ory'Hara Laser. After playing through the Polaris plotline I wondered why Ory'Hara, the most powerful being in the universe had to use the normal human engineered outfits when the Vell-os got to run around with shield penetrating super-weapons. I introduce you to the Ory'Hara Laser, about on par with the winter tempest. It's available once the Polaris plotline is finished if I wrote the plug right. Written for windows, macs will have to convert.

1825.title: New ASW Logo
1825.author: Anonymous
1825.description: JoshTigerheart's Department of Useless Plugs brings you a simple file that simply replaces the old Ambrosia logo in the intro screens with the new one found at www.ambrosiasw.com. The Department had five minutes to kill, hence its creation. If you need to send an email, it can be found in the readme. Though keep in mind, the Department did not create the logo, merely put it in a plug so you could see it in Nova.

1463.title: Anti-Pilot File Ruiner
1463.author: Anonymous
1463.description: After detecting a malicious plug-in (which took so long because of a lack visiting the add-ons page), JoshTigerheart's Department of Useful Plugs quickly created a counter in about two seconds should you feel that you are at risk of someone using the ruiner plug-in against you.  This plug-in operates in a simple fashion by replacing the mission crucial to the ruiner plug-in's operation with a 25,000 credit bounty.  In order to make it work, however, it'll need to be loaded after the ruiner.  Since plug-ins load in alphabetical order, we recommend a name that starts with a 'z'.  Questions?  Comments?  Have chocolate pies that may or may not exist?  Send 'em to the email found within the included readme.  This plug-in is in Macintosh format.  Windows users will need to extract the .bin and run that file through their convertor.

1644.title: Fixer-Upper v1.2.1
1644.author: Anonymous
1644.description: Anathema Ch. 2 v1.2.1 Fixer-Upper  This file will update your copy of Anathema (any version) to v1.2.1, fixing various bugs and adding a few features.  It also comes with a copy of the 50+ page walkthrough and new copies of the pilot files.  I do not recommend using this version.  The full Anathema Ch. 2 v1.2.1 download has been more thoroughly tested and is more full-featured this version is merely for those whose connections make downloading 17-meg files prohibitive.  Mac format, Windows users will need to convert.

2008.title: Semiteaser2
2008.author: Anonymous
2008.description: Semiteaser2 is semiteaser plus the addition of the merchant ships, adding a full line of ship data for my (hopefully) upcoming expansion. Comes with same cheat ship. Hope you enjoy!  By Oryhara.

3204.title: Super_Power_SciFi_Weapons_V3.0.zip
3204.author: Demosthenes231547
3204.description: Well it's here, the new version of Super Power SciFi Weapons. This version adds two new ships and stuff like that. So without further adieu, Super Power SciFi Weapons version 3.0 enjoy.

3222.title: Arboria 2.zip
3222.author: Equalizer
3222.description: Here it is, my first posted plug. It's still in its infancy, but up north you'll find a new government, some new ships, weapons and a few other things. I will be expanding this further, especially with support. Thanks and feel free to e-mail comments, suggestions and death threats to firesupport42@gmail.com (also I'm aware unununium is ridiculously unstable, download to find out what I mean =])

3241.title: Mecha Nova
3241.author: Pizzacat
3241.description: I noticed the distinct lack of anything mecha based in the game and fan-made plug ins. After reading dozens of forum posts asking for some, I decided to do it myself. An example picture, and more info in the note file.

3271.title: Rebel Yell 1.3.2
3271.author: Tony Rice
3271.description: This latest version removes a couple dumb missions and a cheat, I used to get money while testing. It also fixes a problem in a large battle and has all ship descriptions and some other minor fixes. The story is still an extension of the Rebel line.

3396.title: Indie Valk
3396.author: Naf5000
3396.description: This Plug-in adds one new ship; the Porsche Valkyrie Heavy Upgrades. It\\\'s sort of like the civilian version of the Pirate Valkyrie IV. I have taken care to not make it overpowered, and not just because of it\\\'s price tag. Plus, it has blue engines. Does your Valk have blue engines? I thought not.

1478.title: Ashen Galaxy part 4
1478.author: Anonymous
1478.description: After three long years of development, Dark Matter Productions is pleased to release a new total conversion for Escape Velocity: Nova. Ashen Galaxy puts you on the bridge of a mighty warship, tasked with defending humanity from all threats. You'll need all of your wits and cunning (and a little help from friends) in order to protect Earth from her foes. Ashen Galaxy includes dozens of new ships and weapons for you to play with. There are over two hundred systems for you to explore, along with a campaign to keep you on track with fighting the aliens. This is part 4 of 4. It contains Ashen Galaxy Data 1 and 2, and Ashen Galaxy Ships 1 and 2. Make sure you download parts 1-3!

1476.title: Ashen Galaxy part 2
1476.author: Anonymous
1476.description: After three long years of development, Dark Matter Productions is pleased to release a new total conversion for Escape Velocity: Nova. Ashen Galaxy puts you on the bridge of a mighty warship, tasked with defending humanity from all threats. You'll need all of your wits and cunning (and a little help from friends) in order to protect Earth from her foes. Ashen Galaxy includes dozens of new ships and weapons for you to play with. There are over two hundred systems for you to explore, along with a campaign to keep you on track with fighting the aliens. This is part 2 of 4. It contains Ashen Galaxy Graphics 1, 2, and 3. Make sure you download parts 1, 3, and 4!

1512.title: capshipsfix
1512.author: Anonymous
1512.description: This is quick fix that I made will make it so that all the capital ships in the game don't disappear when you complete a major storyline. All you have to do to install it is to drop it into your plugins folder, and you are set. Easy as that. Made by P-Psycho

1575.title: EMS.sit
1575.author: Anonymous
1575.description:
Hello and welcome to the Elite Marine Squad plugin this features a souped up version of the Marine Platoon, with a substantially better chance of capture, but with a cost to match. But if you can afford them... enjoy...
Released by Michael C, for Mullet Man

1183.title: AllShipsAvailable
1183.author: Anonymous
1183.description: This plug-in will allow you to buy any ship, at any shipyard. It does not alter the price or capabilities of any ships, it just allows you to buy them anywhere. -JB

2103.title: Tenetrian Heavy Shuttle.sit
2103.author: Anonymous
2103.description: Tenetrian Enterprises Heavy Shuttle. This plug adds a new government in the Spica system. Here you can buy 1 new ship and 1 new weapon. The ship is an upgraded heavy shuttle that's a little more powerful than it should be and the weapon is a radar missile generator (don't need to buy ammo). The radar missiles are very powerful and can disable pretty much any ship with one hit but it's heavy, they reload slowly, and it's kind of expensive. This is the first part of a plug am I writing and I'll judge by feedback whether or not I finish it. Tell me what you think of it at shebber@hotmail.com. Made by stlyesom.

3277.title: The Firefly (FIXED)
3277.author: Marc the epic
3277.description:
I downloaded someone else's 'Firefly Ship Mod' plugin but DID NOT WORK. I totally recreated it and made it work. nuff said. Version 2.0 is more realistic. Created by the kid who made THE A-TEAM, Marc The Epic
Priced at 450,000
Standard Weapons: 2 100M Turreted Railguns, 1 Medium Blaster, and 2 Ionic Particle Cannons.

2106.title: The Best Plug
2106.author: Anonymous
2106.description: Josh Tigerheart's Department of Useful Plugs brings you the solution to that never ending debate:  which plug is the best one?  Now, that epic argument has finally come to a conclusion with the release of The Best Plug.  Never again worry about trying to decide which one is the best, you can now have it.  No more do people need to argue over whether ARPIA or Ship Variants shall rule the world, the best plug is here.  Got questions, comments, bug reports, or the Ultimate Question to the Ultimate Answer of Life, the Universe, and Everything?  Send them to the email found within the readme file.  This plug is in Mac format, Windows users will need to convert it.

1740.title: Kestrel Plug-in
1740.author: Anonymous
1740.description: Just drop the plug-in into your plug-ins folder and you will be able to buy the Atinoda Kestrel anywhere.  Thank you for your support.  Zerak Toman

1819.title: MultipleStrings1.1.sit
1819.author: Anonymous
1819.description: Final Mac version of the plugin.  Fixed a few minor things.  This plug will allow you to run through all 6 major strings on one pilot while keeping access to all the outfits and ships from the strings you have already completed.  Any feedback is welcome at aiellc@nycap.rr.com.

1841.title: NoConversionLimit101.sit
1841.author: Anonymous
1841.description: Now compatible with EVN 1.0.1, this is a very simple plugin which raises the limits of cargo and mass retools to 60 each, for a possible total of 1200 converted tons using both Polaris and normal versions. Cargo pods and mass expansions are still quite limited (6 max each), as they are removable systems, and should (I believe) be in keeping with other limits. Now you can make your All-Star Cambrian Assault ship. There is no readme, but the file is named extremely obviously. It should work this time, I promise. Talk to me at dbrauer@hfx.andara.com

1277.title: Our-Spiel Shipyard
1277.author: Anonymous
1277.description: Our-Spiel shipyard is a windows plugin that allows you to purchase EVERY PLAYABLE SIP in the game, including variants, and special ships (unrelenting, thunderforge, vellos craft, etc...) from Our-Spiel, it also includes a hypergate form Varden to S7evyn, that allows you to get back to S7evyn anytime after completing a string. the rest of the game is completely uneffected. because i do not have a reliable stuffit program the file has been Zipped. this plugin cannot be used with the unity plugins, or with any plugins that ADD ships to the game (shipvariants is ok though) made for nova 1.0.6. plugin by -Cunjo- MobiusM1@gmail.com

1921.title: PolyconShips v1.0.sit
1921.author: Anonymous
1921.description:
Polycon EV is a total conversion for EV Nova featuring all new ships, outfits, systems, etc.  More information and screenshots can be found at the Polycon EV website...
http://www.evula.org/anubis/index.html

By AnubisTTP (arrakis666@yahoo.com)
NOTE: also requires Polycon EV v1.0, PolyconGraphics v1.0, PolyconGraphics2 v1.0, PolyconGraphics3 v1.0, and PolyconGraphics4 v1.0.

1219.title: Experienced Space-Farer
1219.author: Anonymous
1219.description: Experienced Space-farer simply allows you to skip some of the monotony of starting a new pilot, making starting cash with petty trading, etc. by adding a new starting character. You start the game in a Rebel Pirate Valkyrie Class V with 10 million credits. If the Rebel Valk. is not the ship of your choice, you can always sell it and use that 10 million towards another ship. This plug should be compatable with all other plugs unless you have a plug that does the same thing. ESF uses char. resourse 129, so if you know youre using that, you probably know how to fix the problem. If you have any problems, feel free to e-mail me at mswer2007-at-yahoo-dot-com. Have fun!

1374.title: AddShips.txt
1374.author: Anonymous
1374.description: Have you ever wanted to add ships that you have modelled to NOVA.  Well then this tutorial is for you.  It tells you step by step just about everything you need to know about adding your ships to NOVA.  Questions...Comments...Suggestions...CeRD@mac.com.  ENJOY!

1442.title: A-wing plug.sit
1442.author: Anonymous
1442.description: Like Star Wars, do we??? Here's a nice A-Wing from The Return Of The Jedi. Have fun.... Version 1.0 Made by Jelmer Post from the Netherlands.

1449.title: Activates Hypergates
1449.author: Anonymous
1449.description:
Activates Hypergates
Plug-in for EV Nova 1.0.0
Michael McDonald (mcdonald@cyberus.ca)

Remember those dead, inactive hypergates scattered across the Nova
galaxy? With this plugin, when you get the access codes from Sigma
Shipping, you'll be able to utilize the -entire- hypergate network, rather
than the scant few gates scattered around Auroran and Federation space.
There have, of course, been a few changes to existing hypergate routes,
to accomodate these new nodes.

1521.title: ChooseThread2
1521.author: Anonymous
1521.description:
Update to ChooseThread. The old one prevented you from getting Bounty Hunter missions too soon.

This plugin allows you to choose which story your pilot will follow -- the other stories will never be offered. "None" allows normal gameplay, although in that case it would be smarter to remove the plugin.

1626.title: ExplosionPlug
1626.author: Anonymous
1626.description: This plugin replaces the default explosions that come with EVN. We may do the other ones later... Rendered by Chaoticore Design: http://www.chaoticored.tk/ . Enjoy!

1664.title: GameEnhancements1.1.sit
1664.author: Anonymous
1664.description: This plug enhances many areas of the game. It adds links between many storylines and makes it so that the Variant Fed String is no longer a dead end. There is now a new battle at the end of the Rebel string. This plugin also incorporates my RebelSideMissionsFix1.0 plugin.  This is version 1.1 which adds support for 1.0.2 and fixes a few bugs.  Enjoy. Version 1.1 released 9/7/02. Created by MacDevil. Send questions and comments to AGS848@AOL.com.

1822.title: Myprsplug.sit
1822.author: Anonymous
1822.description: This is a plug that includes 33 new pëople, most of which were submitted to me by people on the EVN webboard. This plug was self-tested, so Im not completely sure, but it should be compatible with anything that doesnt change any përs files.

1837.title: NewShipandWeapons
1837.author: Anonymous
1837.description: This plugin adds 1 new ship that you can buy, a few new weapons that are expencive, and an edited system.  Made by: Unreal Centipede  Unrealcentipede@yahoo.com

1851.title: Nuke.sit
1851.author: Anonymous
1851.description:
This is a plug I made a few days ago, my first for Nova. My first plugin release to the public for that matter. It contains one weapon, a nuclear missile (hence the name "Nuke") and three outfits required to use that weapon. You can buy the above outfits anywhere.

This plugin is the minor product of curiosity. I wanted to see what I could do with sub-munitions  the bööm resource.

2047.title: Sol Research Labs v1 0 2
2047.author: Anonymous
2047.description:
This is Sol Research Labs version 1.0.2, now fully compatible with EV:Nova V1.0.6.
It adds 5 new outfits.
Any complaints thing you would like to see added, gimme a shout: tru7h@jonpearse.net
Cheers, Gazza

2085.title: StarWars Galaxy Map.sea
2085.author: Anonymous
2085.description: The star  wars galaxy is a vast mass of planets and systems. This map is open to the public to use as you see fit. It has over 150+ systems. Why not 1200 you ask? This is due to the star wars galaxy being very focused and potent. The creation of this map was done to the extent of planet placement pulled directly from the Star Wars Role-Playing book. This is a great start for any expansion and/or TC. This file will also be included in the "SAE Developer's Pack" Coming soon from Eternal Light Studios. Email at: info@eternallightstudios.com Website: www.eternallightstudios.com Questions: www.eternallightstudios.com/ELSForums

1453.title: After Nova
1453.author: Anonymous
1453.description: After Nova is an abandoned plug-in by JoshTigerheart, dropped because I wasn't morbid enough to keep working on it and also was dumped in favor of the Open Source TC that's currently in the works.  This file is far from finished and is not playable.  However, some other plug-in developers, especially those wanting to do some sort of degenerated or post-apocalyptic scenario, may find some of the content helpful for ideas.  Additionally, if you wish, you may finish the project, see details within the Readme.

1181.title: AllItemsAvailable
1181.author: Anonymous
1181.description: This plug-in will allow you to buy just about any item at any outfitter. It does not alter the price or capabilities of the items, it just allows you to buy them anywhere. -JB

1540.title: CombinedFixes102
1540.author: Anonymous
1540.description:
This Combined Fixes plug incorporates all the fixes I have put together for EV:Nova version 1.0.2. It inlcudes fixes for six different issues with this version. The combined plug and all of the individual plugs as well as fixes for other versions can be found on Quick Fix webpage at http://home.attbi.com/~slagblah/evn_fixes.html. - slagblah@attbi.com
[This plug-in superceeds the version of the same name submitted earlier today and should be posted instead.]

1764.title: LicensesAsRanks101.sit
1764.author: Anonymous
1764.description: Now compatible with EVN 1.0.1, this plugin simply changes licenses so that they show up in the ranks section, instead of cluttering up your outfits. Licenses aren't really outfits, anyway. Once again, there's no readme, but the plugin should be compatible with anything that doesn't also change licenses. Talk to me at dbrauer@hfx.andara.com

1250.title: LargeShinobiPlugin
1250.author: Anonymous
1250.description: Adds the Large Shinobi ship(The UFO looking type) to the EVN Universe. May be too powerful for some people, but you can modify that if you really want to. Goes for 0c and is equipped with no weapons or upgrades, so you can do that yourself. Not known to conflict with any current plugs, but report any problems, suggestions, etc to the address in the Read Me file. Enjoy!

1335.title: StoneWeaps
1335.author: Anonymous
1335.description: This plugin adds two new insanely powerful weapons: the Sentiel and the Hyperscud Launcher. The sentinel is a long range, high powered beam weapon (easy planet domination) and the Hyperscud launcher is a super-fast, one-hit-kill missile launcher. Warning: Might be considered a cheat by some, being that you can kill just about anything in a couple seconds. Although, they come with price tags upwards of 10 million credits...  Don't think there're any bugs, but if you find any please e-mail me at evilfish@mac.com - Soon to come: More cool weaponry, thinking about a few new systems, new ship/s. MAC RULES.

1170.title: 0 Mass Outfits.sit
1170.author: Anonymous
1170.description:
Ok.  Either I'm REALLY BLIND or people just are not that smart.  Anyway, here it is.  This liddle handy-dandy plug-in changes the mass of ALL outfits to 0.  Soooo, you liddle cheaters (or people who don't want to be called cheaters but need extra help) just plop this plug-in into your folder and max out on all those outfits.  Please note that this doesn't change the COST or how many you can purchase.  Just the mass.
Questions? Comments? email: metke@hevanet.com

1380.title: bible and tmpls.sit
1380.author: Anonymous
1380.description: This is the official EV Nova bible, a technical document explaining the EV Nova engine to plugin developers.  This archive also contains the ResEdit TMPLs necessary for editing EV Nova plugins.  For help and information, we suggest you visit the EV Developer's Corner web board.

1436.title: 24-bitWinNovaIcon
1436.author: Anonymous
1436.description: Windows icon file of the 24-bit (true colour) EV Nova icon.  It's identical in appearance to the image shown under "In Brief" on the EVN page (http://www.ambrosiasw.com/games/evn/), since it is basically that same image imported into a Windows icon editor and saved as an icon.  Anyway, it's much higher quality than the icon that comes with Windows Nova.

1450.title: Added Gefjon Run
1450.author: Anonymous
1450.description: This plugin is for 1.0.5 .  It adds the Geflon Run back into the game.  Made by Stephen.  Email questions and comments to sec222@mac.com .

1484.title: Azdara-Lightning
1484.author: Anonymous
1484.description: As an old EV: Override veteran, I was overjoyed by EV: Nova. But there were some things that I missed about EVO, one of which was the best fighter in the game: the Adzara. It was unique be relying on shield regeneration rate rather than heavy shielding - it was very easy to get it's shields down to almost nothing, but let it out of your weapon's range for a few seconds and you'd be back to square one. This plug-in modifies the Lightning to fill this role - the shields are cut almost in half, but the regeneration rate is more than enough to make up for it, and I also included a Lightning Bay if you work for the Rebels. By 21st Century Digital Boy.

1546.title: CriticalHitWeapon
1546.author: Anonymous
1546.description: Critical Hit! Entry One- This was an entry submitted by Masamune into The mrxak Challenge, for the Critical Hit! competition. It was awarded 1st place. For more information and winners visit: http://www.evula.org/mrxak/EV/TmC/TmC.html

1572.title: EM-VivaLasVegas
1572.author: Anonymous
1572.description: Viva Las Vegas is a little plug-in I wrote that adds a new Space Station to the Vega system.  It allows for better gambling options than just the race.  Check the Mission BBS in the station to get the missions.  By EvilMachine.
