1651.title: FPC Changer
1651.author: Anonymous
1651.description: If fusion pulse cannons inexplicably being front quadrant turrets has ever annoyed you and you are very very lazy, then this tiny little plug-in is for you! It makes FPC's be normal. That's it. I'm pretty sure it includes the latest EVN 1.0.6 balance changes. william@route26.com

1694.title: Heavy Weapons.1.0
1694.author: Anonymous
1694.description: Heavy Weapons is a cool plug, it has a heavyer blaster turret over the heavy blaster turret, a 400mm turreted railgun that is better than the 100mm turreted railgun, plus an ion turret that shoots insted, it does no damage to shields or armor it just ionizes and slows down a ship, this plug is for 1.0.7 EV Nova it it made quick, R.W.

1698.title: Hellhound X
1698.author: Anonymous
1698.description: Hellhound X adds 15 new outfits, including the Hellhound X, at a station in the Kania system.  Most of the weapons are quite powerful, therefore quite expensive.  Some lack pictures, but all of them are good in some way.  email is bond-stephenbond@cox.net

1718.title: IconsBoXs1.sit
1718.author: Anonymous
1718.description: These are new slick looking 128 pix 3D icons expecially for EVN (and the EV and EVO ports too). In addition, included is a collection of virtial 3D boxs to serve as folders for your EV series games.

1811.title: More Additions.sit
1811.author: Anonymous
1811.description: This is my second released mod for EVN. This will add two weapons to the game. One is the shock artillery unit, a fast and heavy-damaging turret, and the other is the nuclear warhead, a powerful missle with a huge blast after it explodes. One Auroran Crusier variant and one Fed Destroyer variant holds these weapons. You can send any comments to me at jwillie194@netscape.net.

1826.title: New Bays
1826.author: Anonymous
1826.description: New Bays is a plug-in that adds three new fighter bays.  The Light Destroyer Thunderhead Bay (which carries ion cannons instead of lances), the Lightning Bay, and the Attack drone bay, which is a Cargo Drone with a railgun and an EMP torpedo.  Questions, bugs, email me at bond-stephenbond@cox.net.  This plug-in is in .rez format, so it is for Windows only.

1853.title: obarskyware.sea
1853.author: Anonymous
1853.description: Obarskyware v1.0 - This plug-in for EV Nova adds one new government, one new planet, three new outfits, a couple new missions, and a myriad of other things to your game. Not capatible with AAC Paint Station Prime. My first plug-in. Contact evilcownevil@hotmail.com for questions and comments about the plug.

1880.title: Planet Destruction 1.0.0
1880.author: Anonymous
1880.description: This is a Mod to the basic scenario which makes all planets killable and with a set regen of 60 days, also Graphics have been modified so that if its dead it looks dead. Included is a weapon to do the killing with.

1934.title: QMBTurret.sit
1934.author: Anonymous
1934.description:
My first plugin submitted, this is and upgraded version of the Quad Light Blaster Turret, only now called the QMB Turret. Slightly upgraded and more powerful, yet larger and more costly. Robert's idea, thank him. For any problems email me at: gbfbassfreak@yahoo.com. Note: This won't work with any plugins that I'm aware of. Enjoy.

Brought to you by DMBandRulzAll, ASW, and ATMOS. :)

1969.title: Return of the Forklift - Updated.sit
1969.author: Anonymous
1969.description: The forklift has made its long, awaited return. It has arrived. The most deadly and respected weapon around, the forklift is a sure killer. Plugin created by Saaci Plank (the_forklift@saaciplank.co.uk). Plugin updated for EVN 1.0.6 by Stephen Crowe (sec222@mac.com).

2046.title: Sol Research Labs
2046.author: Anonymous
2046.description:
This plug-in adds 4 new outfits.
You can buy them at a station near Earth.
If you haev any problems email me @:
Jddavies@highway1.com.au By Gazza_2001

2094.title: StrikerBay v2
2094.author: Anonymous
2094.description:
This plug adds a Striker bay outfit (and Strikers) to Polaris outfit facilities.  they will be available at any port where you can buy Manta bays.  This update makes the bay a bit more affordable (down to 3.00M from 5.00M), changes the capacity from 6 to 4 Strikers, adds outfit graphics, and improves upon the outfit descriptions.
Send questions, comments, and suggestions to iisven@mac.com

2176.title: WraithKrypt Characters.sit
2176.author: Anonymous
2176.description: This is a pretty simple plugin I created that allows you to be either the Wraith or Krypt when you create a new pilot. It starts you on the correct planets pending on which race you choose. Its more or less just for kicks. Enjoy! Submitted by MacGP

2206.title: evnpluginrepairkit.sit
2206.author: Anonymous
2206.description:
I have a permanent fix for all programs stuffed with Stuffit 7!

I have just written an AppleScript program that will automatically change the type and creator codes to the correct Nova format! This will work with any file, so be careful! We no longer have to suffer 5 minutes converting it in Resedit!
-Written by Gemini14

1938.title: RAGE Bays
1938.author: Anonymous
1938.description: This plugin adds a a RAGE Gunboat Bay to the game. Each bay can hold up to 3 RAGE Gunboats. There is no bit requirement so you can buy the bay at any point in the game. Outfitter graphics provided by ArcAngel Counterstrike. Tell me what you think at shebber@hotmail.com. Made by stlyesom.

1370.title: X-series prototypes
1370.author: Anonymous
1370.description: Win CHEAT PLUG! Tired of the same old Manticore super-suped cheat-ship? (and no offense to celdirick22003@yahoo.com, because despite that you inspired this plug!) Try this: five prototype ships, each developed unknowingly in tandem by the five major governments (no Vellos, sorry). VASTLY DIFFERENT STATS - choose which of the five suits your playing style (see README for ship descriptions outside of the game)! Also possible (10% chance) to find as escorts! Recommended for use with PlugPackV16. Made by Trooper1023 (bjhaberman@prodigy.net)

1364.title: Various Advanced Devices 2.sit
1364.author: Anonymous
1364.description:
It's like Various Advanced Devices, only not as old.  More devices, more bugs, a much longer description, and a bonus plug-in for helping with the creation of other plug-ins.
Adds Dark Vell-os power, engines, cheats, and a deadly combination: the Quad Light Cannon Turret, EMP Generator, and Chaingun Turret.  And more.
Questions, comments, insults, help with the many bugs: akleps@earthlink.net
Made by Klepsacovic

1650.title: Forget about Barry
1650.author: Anonymous
1650.description: A great plug, this eliminates Barry (and the tutorial) literally! You'll see what I mean when you try it.  Not recommended for first time players as they need the tutorial, but it started getting annoying to me, so I made this!  by zapp, email me about anything on any of my plugs at mbelins1@hotmail.com.

1606.title: EVN Boards Variants.zip
1606.author: Anonymous
1606.description: JoshTigerheart's Department of Useful Plugs (not to be confused with the Department of USeless Plugs), presents a plug not created from the ideas of one, but several. I created a thread on the Nova Webboards asking for ship variants requests. While the submitions were low in number, they were good in quality. This plug contains those that I decided to add, plus one I came up with myself. Hey, I wasn't able to fall asleep until I added it. Anyways, the five ships come complete with shipyard and escort descriptions, are flyable, hirable, and fightable. You'll see them flying around under A.I. control like any stock ship does, and can even fight them in planetary defense fleets. Credit is given to those who's ships made it in the readme, as well as a special thanks to those who didn't make it. Questions, comments, and especially bug reports should be sent to TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com. As usual, the plug is in Windows format. Mac users will need a converter to use it.  Nobody was able to download the previous version, so hopefully this one will work.

1565.title: Don Quixote Plug v1.1
1565.author: Anonymous
1565.description: The famous story of Don Quixote for EV:Nova! Now tested thoroughly! This plug is full of new worlds, characters, and adventures. Play through the two possible scenarios to gain the trust of LaM Corporations. A fun plug to play. plug developed by Don_Quixote. E-mail the_super_jew_@hotmail.com if you have any problems.

1553.title: DefaultNames
1553.author: Anonymous
1553.description: This small plug changes all the default names, nicknames, and ship names. I just replaced them with the first people and things that crossed my mind, so it's pretty weird. -Made by nuku ~_~ nuku@lonukee.cjb.net

1510.title: capital ships
1510.author: Anonymous
1510.description: This plug-in adds more shields and armor to almost every EVN ship in an effort to make the game harder and more realistic. It's a Mac plug, not tested on Windows, so use it at your own risk :( Made by gray_shirt_ninja. [email removed at author's request]

2218.title: MissionComputer332-9
2218.author: Anonymous
2218.description: By David Arthur [email removed at author's request]. A scenario editor for the three Escape Velocity games, which provides graphical editors for many resource types, both standard and EV-specific, and RDL scripts for all others. Supports standard and .rez plug-in formats, and includes integrated Resource Copier, Target Generator, Plug-in Convertor, and Make RLE utilities. (Classic Mac OS PowerPC/68K version 3.3.2)

2002.title: Scatter Weapons 1.1
2002.author: Anonymous
2002.description: From Josh Tigerheart's Department of Utterly Useless Plugs comes this updated useless piece of junk: Scatter Weapons! Now, instead of shots going where you or the A.I. intends them to, they instead shoot off in random directions! Guided weapons will still lock on, so you do not need to worry there. Great for a few laughs, though I wouldn't recommend trying to play the game seriously like this.  The 1.1 version updates the plug to be compatible with Nova 1.09.  It also eliminates the outfit and pers resources that snuck aboard the last version, making it a much smaller file. Email me at TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com should you have anything useless or useful to say. The plug is made with EVNew, so therefore is in WinEVN format. Mac users will need a converter.

1563.title: Dodge This 1.1
1563.author: Anonymous
1563.description: As you can already tell, I'm in an updating frenzy, so here is another updated version of JoshTigerheart's Department of Useless Plugs. Ever wanted a real challenge in dodging weapons in the game? Now you can get that challenge! Every projectile flies three times as fast in its attempt to collide with your ship to inflict damage upon it. However, this does not make weapons go three times as far. Even the quickest of ships or most talented pilots will be pressed to evade those shots speeding across the game. I do not recommend you play this in x2 mode. You can find out why on your own.  This 1.1 version brings the plug up-to-date for Nova 1.09, as you probably have guessed. Questions, comments, compliments, bug reports? Email me at TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com Please note that this plug was made with EVNew, so its Windows format. Mac users need a convertor.

2157.title: Wacky Asteroids for Mac OS
2157.author: Anonymous
2157.description: Wacky Asteroids for Mac OS makes the asteroids in Formalhaut behave very strangely, bouncing around and so forth, and lets you start a pilot flying an Asteroid Miner in that system. The Asteroid Mining Laser is replaced by the far more entertaining Asterburner, which is nothing less than a flamethrower writ large. Blasting the new asteroids is an arcade game in itself, able to be enjoyed any of your pre-existing pilots. Version 1.0 by Qaanol in May, 2006. Contact me via email, Qaanol@Gmail.com

1797.title: Minor Edits
1797.author: Anonymous
1797.description: Edits a few minor things in the game including passive vell-os weapon drain (when you have another ship) and Leviathan cargo edits. Mac only, sry. Contact me at dskilloran@yahoo.com

2019.title: Ship Hangar for EVO Update
2019.author: Anonymous
2019.description: Ship Hangar for EVO Update: Public Version 1.1 - For use with Guy's EV Nova Override port, this plug-in adds one new station in the Iothe system, to the galactic south of UE space. The Ship Hangar Station can store up to 2 fully customized ships for the relatively small price of 50,000 credits. Your ships can be retrieved from the station at any point afterwards. See enclosed Read Me for full details. These are .rez files created with EVNEW, Mac users will need to convert them! Comments? Questions? Bugs? Send an email to slouch@stonerrock.net

1524.title: Classic Start
1524.author: Anonymous
1524.description: I'm not quite sure, but I think this plug is from Josh Tigerheart's Department of Useful Plugs.  Might have come from the useless department, but...oh well...  Anyways, the JTDUP brings you a teeny, tiny, very minor plug:  Classic Start.  This plug merely adds a second character that starts the game with 10,000 credits instead of 25,000 credits, much like EVC and EVO.  Ok, not very impressive, but it might give a little bit more challenge to the start of the game.  All questions, comments, and demands for new plugs worth downloading should be sent to the email address found in the readme.  [email removed by request]

1329.title: StarbridgeBay
1329.author: Anonymous
1329.description: Woot! As the name implies, this plugin adds a Starbridge bay to Nova. It really isn't cheatish in my opinion because it's reasonably expensive and heavy. If I did everything correctly, you should be able to launch two Starbridges from your ship. Please Pardon the Poorly Photoshopped Pictures. Have fun. :)   Made for Windows by BuggerPlugger. Send comments and etc. to buggerplugger AT yahoo DOT com

1477.title: Ashen Galaxy part 3
1477.author: Anonymous
1477.description: After three long years of development, Dark Matter Productions is pleased to release a new total conversion for Escape Velocity: Nova. Ashen Galaxy puts you on the bridge of a mighty warship, tasked with defending humanity from all threats. You'll need all of your wits and cunning (and a little help from friends) in order to protect Earth from her foes. Ashen Galaxy includes dozens of new ships and weapons for you to play with. There are over two hundred systems for you to explore, along with a campaign to keep you on track with fighting the aliens. This is part 3 of 4. It contains Ashen Galaxy Graphics 4 and 5. Make sure you download parts 1, 2, and 4!

3202.title: The DarthKev Plug
3202.author: DarthKev
3202.description:
Hello all. DarthKev here with _another_ update on "The DarthKev Plug." This update was done because of feedback. First of all, many of you complained that I still hadn't fixed what has come to be known as the "Ridgeback Bug." For those of you who don't know, this bug caused any and all Ridgebacks to spin violently whenever they rotated. This was caused by having the wrong number in the shÃ¤n resource for number of frames for one rotation. This has now been fixed. Also, a few of you complained that, for all their talk of being peaceful, DarthKev Tech only built weapons and tools of destruction. To remedy this, DKT now makes a reactor and a shield/armour upgrade. And no, I haven't been misspelling "armour." That's just the way the Brits spell it.

As always, send all feedback, praise, and questions to darthk3v1@gmail.com. CUL8R!

3347.title: Rebel Yell 1.3.5
3347.author: TonyR
3347.description: I said 1.3.4 would be the last. I lied. This one allows those pilots that completed the Rebel I story to play this plug without having to use the Line1 fix2 plug.  Otherwise, it's the same as 1.3.4.

3392.title: CamSti Enterprises Viper Bay and Fighter
3392.author: AviKerensky
3392.description:
CamSti Enterprises presents its first product: The CamSti Viper Bay and Fighter! This bay holds up to eight fighters, and is even legal in Federation Space!


My first plug-in. Email me with comments/concerns: Sailorkerensky@yahoo.com. Please make sure to put \'Escape Velocity\' in the subject line, so I don\'t dismiss it as spam.

PLEASE tell me if I screwed it up. I do not know if it is compatible with other plugs, so experiment! Let me know what you think.

Additional thanks go to \'Jalisurr\' and \'DarthKev\' for their assistance. If it weren\'t for them, I never would have figured out how to work the editor. Still learning, at any rate, so email me comments!

1760.title: Leviathan Warship
1760.author: Anonymous
1760.description: Josh Tigerheart presents a first:  a useful plug!  It's a miracle, don't you agree?  At any rate, have you ever caught yourself wondering why there isn't a Leviathan that utilizes all that space to turn it into a powerful warship?  Now there is!  By sacrificing over half it's cargo space, this new Leviathan is armed to the teeth and is ready to haul cargo in dangerous areas, protect your freighters, or even lead unsuspecting pirates into a death trap.  Please note that it uses Warship as it's escort A.I.  Therefore, it cannot carry cargo for you if its an escort.  On the bright side, it will go and kill things for you.  Questions, comments, and especially bug reports should be sent to TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com.  As usual, the plug is in Windows format.  Mac users will need a converter to use it.  A special thanks to those who helped me with a few things to get this plug working is included in the read me.

1413.title: Non-Technical EVN Bible.sit
1413.author: Anonymous
1413.description: This is a guide for making better plugins, compiled from 29 experienced plug-in developers including Martin Turner (author of Frozen Heart). It is a complete list of production values that we feel will vastly help developers improve thier plug-ins. This is especially designed by people who are new to plug-in developing, but even some of the most experienced people can learn from it. It's only a few kb, what do you have to lose? Compiled by 21st Century Digital Boy.

1820.title: MultipleStrings1.1
1820.author: Anonymous
1820.description: Final Windows version of the plugin.  Fixed a few minor things.  This plug will allow you to run through all 6 major strings on one pilot while keeping access to all the outfits and ships from the strings you have already completed.  Any feedback is welcome at aiellc@nycap.rr.com.

2064.title: Spaceball for Mac
2064.author: Anonymous
2064.description: Spaceball, the newest in space minigames. This version for Mac. By LiAnNaSu and Pace. Questions? Comments? Concerns? Email them to andrew [dot] moscoe [at] gmail [dot] com

1595.title: EVClassicPortMod
1595.author: Anonymous
1595.description: -- Requires EV Nova Classic -- This addon makes some changes to the EV universe and utilizes the gun positions of EVN and modifies some aspects of the port, like speed and weapon ranges.  Makes it hard for you to survive.  Visit my site at: http://www.rampantintellect.com/ajw/

2143.title: VellosColorChange 1.1
2143.author: Anonymous
2143.description: This plugin adds 12 "new" Vell-os ships.  Red, Purple, Green, and Gold darts, arrows, and javelins will become available from the shipyard when you clear the appropriate mission bits.  It uses ship resources 601 and up, and so will not be compatible with other plugs that add ships that use those resources.  In version 1.1, I've merely tweaked a few missions so that you may get them using the new ships and change the colors of the dart escorts.   Plug by FadedEidolon. email bugs, questions, suggestions, comments, etc to mad0mongoose@hotmail.com

1273.title: Nova Megacheat Plug.sit
1273.author: Anonymous
1273.description: For all you cheaters out there, Nova Megacheat. This plugin allows up to 500 of each outfit to be bought anywhere for free, and all ships to be purchased for nothing anywhere. Only for pure cheaters. by Ransom Arceihn ransom582@mac.com

1269.title: New Outfits
1269.author: Anonymous
1269.description: Another plug-in from Robert Phoenix I only worked on about 1% of the plug the person who is working on my LAPD Station 2 plug-in did about 99% of New Outfits plug-in this plug has 17 New Outfits for EV Nova he also suped up the LRHM Missiles to do more armor damage and the durability is set at 50 all I know he made the missile better, the please read tells you about the outfits and how much mass the outfit uses this plug also has one space station it was called LPAD Station now it is called LAPD Station 2 for the New Outfits plug. My e-mail is RobertPhoenix978@aol.com

1417.title: NovaSpobTypes.sea
1417.author: Anonymous
1417.description:
Contains PICT format images of EV Nova's basic spöb types (found in spïn resources 1000-1065) and an HTML document that lists the ID numbers and links to the images. This is the document that is included in the TutorialsInS folder.

Rick Dillman
evnplugs@ticopa.com

1443.title: AAC-PSP-103.sit
1443.author: Anonymous
1443.description: An update of ArcAngel Counterstrikes Paint Station Prime.  Compatible with 1.0.3.  Updated by Brandon (Chuckles).

1489.title: Balances and Additions
1489.author: Anonymous
1489.description: Hello, this is my first released mod for EVN. This will balance out blaster power and add two new outfits, the Superheavy Blaster turret and a good generation unit. The prices aren't low and the ton space required isn't low either, so in my opinion it's not cheating. The Fed Destroyer also now has a max of 4 turrets and the Fed Carrier disables at 10%. You can send any comments to me (Jason) at jwillie194@netscape.net.

1514.title: Cest la vie v2.6
1514.author: Anonymous
1514.description: This is a major update for my plug.  Improves all Sigma outfits, made all fighters more combat capable, improved all blasters/turrets, added a few pers/govt, etc.  Note:  if your going to download this plug, don't download my Inertialess Ships plug, since this plug does the same thing... with a whole lot more!  By phoenix9000.  Talk to me: laciemac1@earthlink.net

1555.title: deinvinc
1555.author: Anonymous
1555.description:
DeInvinc 1.0 released 5/10/02 by Kanddak
Changes the invincible -1 shieldmod of Matt Burch and Jason Cook to a paltry 10000. Still challenging- (as they're a hundred times stronger than a normal ship) but now possible.

1576.title: EnhancedBiorelay
1576.author: Anonymous
1576.description:
The Enhanced Biorelay Plugin simply just makes the laser have a corona with a slightly diffrent color making it look a little more cooler. It does nothing else. Enjoy!
There should be no compatability issues.

Made by Deepfreeze
Email is deepfreeze@thunder-jolt.net if you have any questions, comments, complaints, or compliments.

1609.title: EVNClassicData
1609.author: Anonymous
1609.description: This plug fixes modifies the weapon speeds of the EV Classic plugin for Mac EV Nova. In my opinion, the weapon speeds are closer to the original Escape Velocity.  To install, just unstuff (and replace EV Data) to the Nova Files folder along with the other classic files.

1659.title: Galv Pirate  Fix 1.sit
1659.author: Anonymous
1659.description: This small plugin fixes a bug in Galvenic Pirates with the Turbulence Thunderhead bay. They should now be able to be launched. Send any comments or questions to jwillie194@netscape.net.

1666.title: GameFAQs1.0.sit
1666.author: Anonymous
1666.description: This is a pers plugin of the people who frequent the EVN board at GameFAQs.com.  It adds a system off of Sol and three new spobs.  Enjoy. Version 1.0 released 7/7/02. Created by MacDevil. Send questions and comments to AGS848@AOL.com.

1684.title: green cursor
1684.author: Anonymous
1684.description: This plugin simply makes the red Nova cursor green. I'm not sure what else can be said about it, as it took me about 20 seconds to do. shrug Done by EVula.

1687.title: Gundam0083Teaserv001.sit
1687.author: Anonymous
1687.description: This is a teaser plugin for my current project: "Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory".  This plug has all new graphics, as well as weapons and outfits.  It's really rough, and will definitely change in the future, but this is just a taste of what is in the works.  Also, I am looking for a development team, so if you like what you see, and you can help, there is contact information in the readme.  By Keith Ichinaga

1707.title: HR Factory .sit
1707.author: Anonymous
1707.description:
Works fine, adds the "Klaw", a HR ( hyperoid residue) accelerator for your ship, effectivly a weapon, shoots HR at extreme speeds. Links with my other plug-ins with the HR theme. Enjoy at you own risk?

Machead

1734.title: JR Balance 1 01
1734.author: Anonymous
1734.description: Was originally released as "NewBalance 1.0".  This is my attempt to rebalance blasters and fusion pulse cannon.  It also adds light cannon turrets and point defense versions of the light blaster and light cannon turrets, and improves reactor performance to make them significantly more efficient than an equivalent mass of solar cells.  In this version I broke the changes up into different plug-ins so people could pick and choose which they wanted. I also changed the fixed pulse cannon to a fixed forward mount rather than the forward quarter turret it actually was in the original game.

1741.title: KestrelClassic
1741.author: Anonymous
1741.description:
Kestrel Classic version 1.00
Gives the Kestrel statistics similar to those that it had in the original Escape Velocity, for those who want a more classic feel.
By SteveVo8a

1758.title: legal pirate thunderheads
1758.author: Anonymous
1758.description: This plug-in adds a legal Pirate Thunderhead Bay and a legal Pirate Thunderhead to the game.  They are available at any system where Pirate Thunderhead Bays are sold. [email hidden at author's request]

1763.title: LicensesAsRanks.sit
1763.author: Anonymous
1763.description: This plugin simply changes licenses so that they show up in the ranks section, instead of cluttering up your outfits. Licenses aren't really outfits, anyway. This version fixes a stupid grammatical error I made when fixing the plugin before. Once again, there's no readme, but the plugin should be compatible with anything that doesn't also change licenses. Talk to me at dbrauer@hfx.andara.com

1791.title: MD Plugins1.0.5.sit
1791.author: Anonymous
1791.description: This package includes the updates to 1.0.5 for all of the plugins made by MacDevil (me).  They will now work with EV Nova 1.0.5 and should not be used with any earlier versions of EV.  All plugins are full versions, not patches.  This means they can be used by themselves if you don't have a earlier version and that you should discard all earlier versions if you do have them.  Included plugins: Reward Ships 3.1.2, Prodigal Son 1.0.5, AAC/MD Starbridge Lights, Illegal Weaps Fix 1.0.5, Game Enhancements 1.3, and finally UNITY (Includes an updated PART 1 as well as a PREVIEW for PART 2.0).  Released 6/1/03. Created by MacDevil. Send questions and comments to AGS848@AOL.com.

1835.title: NewGalaxysplug
1835.author: Anonymous
1835.description:
incase the other NewGalaxysplug didnt work try this one OK??
rember it makes 2 new galexys 4new planets and 1 new nebula
and changes the map a little

1843.title: NoTemptation.sit
1843.author: Anonymous
1843.description: Removes the temptation to use one particular "easter egg" system where you can buy and sell opals for massive profit. You can no longer buy opals in that system.

1865.title: Overdrive
1865.author: Anonymous
1865.description: Hi, another plug-in you can get only one overdrive cost 40,000 credits also included Radar Missiles you can buy at any outfiter, and IR missiles, also the HH missiles, plus Solar Panels, with the Missile Weapons License, so you don't have to go to earth to buy one. I also included the Launchers for all the missiles listed. You don't have to look for the Missiles all over the place. This plug is made to be a non-cheat their are limits on how many Launchers you can buy and on the Missiles just like EV Nova game. My e-mail is RobertPhoenix978@aol.com

1871.title: Phoenix9000s Enhancer
1871.author: Anonymous
1871.description: This is a major update to my previously named "CRAZY!" plug.  It ads the ability to launch two fighters at once, since it worked well in my T-Head plug (never released, so I added it in this plug).  Not compatible with other plugs that modify fighter bays.  Talk to me at laciemac1@earthlink.net v2b

1882.title: Planet Rico
1882.author: Anonymous
1882.description:
Planet Rico adds two new ships, a number of new weapons (like the rock blaster), and a few non-weapon outfits.  There are three new systems and two new governments that fight over a planet inbetween their systems.  I am unsure of compatability with other plugs and EVN 1.0.5.  Also to developers, feel free to use any ship or weapon graphics, or add to my plug and re-submit.

Contact me at falchoin@yahoo.com for questions or comments

1893.title: Polaris Fix.sit
1893.author: Anonymous
1893.description: The REAL Polaris fix for the Capture Vell-os mission. The problem is the mission appears to rely on you passing through the Kania system and viewing 2 federation ships. The first Polaris fix adjusts that by making the ships show up in the target system. This plugin goes even further by removing the ships altogether. If you have already accepted the "flawed" mission, eject your cargo (poor guy) and re-accept the mission, there is no penalty for failure. This can be said to be untested, because there's no sure-fire way to make the problem happen, but it looks like it should work. If it doesn't, email me at kevin@sb.org.

1923.title: Presidential Missions
1923.author: Anonymous
1923.description: This plug-in adds a couple of missions that have to do with the 2004 presidential elections.  It pokes fun at both parties, and the missions pay pretty well.  This plug-in is not intended to offend avid Bush or Kerry supporters.  The plug-in is in .rez format, so Mac users will need the converter from the EVN Utilities page.  [email removed at author's request]

1952.title: RebelViperBays.sit
1952.author: Anonymous
1952.description:
This plug allows all Rebel pilots access to the 3 versions of the Rebel Viper and its corresponding bay.  This is a very useful plug-in for all you Rebel commanders!  Thanks to the EV Development board for helping me with this.  

Comments and questions to wooley97@aol.com

1953.title: RebelVipers.sea
1953.author: Anonymous
1953.description:
Name: RebelVipers 
Version: 1.01
Date: 5/13/02
Author: Quantum Transcendence

Description: This plugin makes the three Rebel Viper variants ( the Heavy Fighter, Interceptor, and Light Gunboat) available as an upgrade outfit similar to the Chrome Valkyrie upgrade. They are available after the purchase of a Rebel Viper and are found wherever Rebel ships are sold.

1956.title: Red Halo1v.sit
1956.author: Anonymous
1956.description:
Finnaly I have finished the Full Version of Red Halo! And boy does it include more! Apart from a complete redesign of HR Factroy and complete tests on the saftey of Tichel Moon and Hypersoid Residue, I have added a Planet Domination set that is full of plugs letting you fly a wraith and easyly conquer planets... Also included is a selection of 2 pilots of variable power to help get the most out of the new plugs!
Enjoy! Machead_@mac.com

2062.title: SP-turretedquerlacannon.sit
2062.author: Anonymous
2062.description:
Saaci Plank has created a weapon feared by all, called: 'THE TURRETED QUERLA CANNON!'. It is very good, and it is good, so get it. It is also very good, and can easily destroy an Auroran Ship.
plugin created by saaci plank

2078.title: StarbridgeShields.sit
2078.author: Anonymous
2078.description: A simple test I did to experiment with rle's and the shan resource. This plugin adds a shield glow to all starbridge variants in the game. As far as I know it should not conflict with any plug out there. It adds rleD and rle8 id 12000, and replaces the starbridge shans. Have fun! --matt (enderai@yahoo.com)

2093.title: strikerbay.sit
2093.author: Anonymous
2093.description:
This plug adds a Striker bay outfit (and Strikers) to Polaris outfit facilities.  they will be available at any port where you can buy Manta bays.
Send questions, comments, and suggestions to iisven@mac.com

2095.title: Subspace Expansion.sit
2095.author: Anonymous
2095.description: Subspace Expansion is a plug that adds up to 9 new worlds around the system, each following in the story of subspace.. Includes History of Subspace.. Machead_@mac.com

2104.title: TESTRage
2104.author: Anonymous
2104.description:
Tired of not getting that Test RAGE Gunboat Mission while in a Starbridge? This plug will allow you to get the mission while in a Starbridge or any freighter ships. V1.0 Released 9/26/2003.
Kirk Landon Staley (kauthor)

2128.title: UE Fighter
2128.author: Anonymous
2128.description: I redid the UE Fighter with updated graphics for EVO for Nova. I had already had a model for the UE fighter, but I may do more ships in the future. Send any comments to orion7792@netscape.net

2134.title: Universal Map 1.0.sit
2134.author: Anonymous
2134.description: This plugin gives you an incredibly useful item: that is, a map of the entire EV Nova universe. Essential if your fuel counts and you end up stuck trying to find a route to an unexplored system. Reasonably priced (in this unverse, you get what you pay for -).

2150.title: VellosShipsChoice
2150.author: Anonymous
2150.description: This plugin changes the Vell-os string so that the ships arn't forced upon you. Instead it makes them available in the shipyard for free at the correct time. Good plugin to have with a pilot reset plugin so that you don't suddenly lose your favorite ship. Made by Psion, Version 1.0.0

2182.title: BlitZen
2182.author: Anonymous
2182.description: NovaTools: Processes PICT resources, for compression and depth conversion.  This is part of the NovaTools collection from wOOtWare.  Go to http://homepage.mac.com/dr_ralph/ for more information.

2208.title: LaSEr101.sit
2208.author: Anonymous
2208.description: LaSEr allows you to take rendered images of your ship and its masks, place them in two folders in the same one as LaSEr, and create the graphic, mask, and spïn for them. This makes it ready to convert with EnRLE by w00tware ( http://homepage.mac.com/dr_ralph/ ). The name comes from the LASIK option that also is allowed. Read the ReadMe for more detailed instructions.

1884.title: PlanetRico.sitx
1884.author: Anonymous
1884.description: Planet Rico adds two new origional ships (unless you played my Arach vs Jarvis for EV Override) and new weapons and outfits for both.  There are three new systems, one controlled by Starworks  Co and the other by Gravity Works Inc.  The middle planet is the battle ground for these mega-corporations and is constantly changing hands.  Should be fully compatable with EV Nova 1.0.8.  Send bugs and/or suggestions to falchoin@yahoo.com

1497.title: Better-Probe-Mission
1497.author: Anonymous
1497.description:
Ever wondered why the "Launch Probe" mission is so blind to what you really do to the wrecked Auroran Cruiser? Tired of being told you "diligently kept well clear" of something you blew to smithereens? This plug-in fixes that! Now you can avoid, destroy or even board that mysterious hulk, knowing the mission text will reflect your decision!

This is more a test of the plug-in architecture than a serious plug-in. I wanted to see if "ignore, destroy or board" was a viable three-way option. I'm happy to report that it is. Send any comments to cjp39@cam.ac.uk

1705.title: Horse of Many Colours v2.1
1705.author: Anonymous
1705.description: This plugin adds an outfit which lets you paint your ship. Yes yes, I hear you say, another paint outfit plugin. This one is different: in this one, the colour of the paint changes colour randomly. Watch your ship change colour in mid-hyperjump. Land on a planet in a blue ship, and take off in a red one. Hours of fun. Plugin by Belthazar, with help and ideas from Qaanol, Pace [haldora] and Requiem. Version 2 of the plugin includes eight new colours, as well as a nice little trick. It should work properly, but I make no guarantees. E-mail me at jva2006@yahoo.com if you find any errors. Plugin is in Windows form, but can be converted to Mac. Compatibility with other plugins is also not guaranteed.

2084.title: Starter packv2.sit
2084.author: Anonymous
2084.description: Starter pack. This lets you start any of the six main storylines, from pilot creation, and skips most the boring parts (delivery missions, etc.) This plug was created by Raven, if you have any questions, comments, bugs, etc. E-mail me at anuusman@Yahoo.com.

1733.title: Irish Flag.sit
1733.author: Anonymous
1733.description:
This will allow you to fly the Irish Flag from your ship.  Works best with a fairly quick ship.
Happy St. Patrick's Day.  Hopefully it won't be too late.
-Klepsacovic
akleps@earthlink.net

1336.title: Storyline Package
1336.author: Anonymous
1336.description: This package includes 6 different files with the missions to start each storyline. The readme includes the information on where to get the missions, requirements, etc. The files in this package are in rez format, so Mac users will need a converter. Any comments, bugs, or anything else, email me at evnmodman@yahoo.com.

1294.title: PolarisTech3Fixed
1294.author: Anonymous
1294.description:
There was a bug in my previous submission that stopped the pilot from buying any outfits besides maps and licenses. Many thanks to Charlie for taking the time to email me.

The final version of the Polaris tech plug-in will give you access to some of the outfits I forgot to include in the 2nd version. Also, you should now get the Polaris HUD instead of the civillian one when you buy Polaris ships using this plug-in. Denier-of-Soup denier@rawr32.net (See http://denier-os.cjb.net/modules/EVNova/ for more tech plug-ins).

1688.title: GyfferAlpha
1688.author: Anonymous
1688.description: GyfferAlpha is a test plug with a number of ships and outfits to be used in my new storyline, Gyffer.  Please send me any comments or criticisms at Raventhief@gmail.com.  Thanks, I hope you enjoy it.

1564.title: Don Quixote Plug
1564.author: Anonymous
1564.description: The famous story of Don Quixote! Now for EV:Nova! This plug is full of new worlds, characters, and adventures. Play through the two possible scenarios to gain the trust of LaM Corporations. A fun plug to play. plug developed by Don_Quixote. E-mail Alfonzo@kgrg.com if you have any problems

1304.title: Rebel Thunderhead Bay.sit
1304.author: Anonymous
1304.description: This plug adds the Rebel Thunderhead bay. It is better and more improved than the  other thunderhead bays. The only thing is you have to be in the Rebel string to get it. One bay holds up to two rebel thunderheads. But you can have up to four bays. Eight fighters in total. This plug was created by Scarab. Thanks to general11 and Edwards for their help. Any questions, problems, or useless spam, email me at scarab.5@gmail.com

2011.title: Shard Guild
2011.author: Anonymous
2011.description:
Shard Guild adds a new pirate government, systems and stations for it, 1 new storyline, 3 new outfits, 6 new weapons and 8 modified pirate ships. It also fixes these bugs:
-ID bug of Mars and Europa
-The weapons at auroran and federation planets and stations can't shoot 
-The Argosy isn't any longer available at Heraan
-The first Auroran off-shoot isn't available with a trader ship (not a real bug)
And it changes the availability of some auroran items... For Mac, Windows users will need to convert it. Compatible with Ship Variants 1.0.6 and Capships Fix. For bug reports and comments PM me, or mail to hitchhiker@freq245.de By Frequency 245

1603.title: EVN Azdara
1603.author: Anonymous
1603.description: From JoshTigerheart's Department of Useful Plugs comes the Azdara, the fastest stock ship in the entire EV series.  Now it is here to outfly anything Nova has to offer.  With this plug you can now purchase the Azdara, ported directly from the EVO TC, fully armed with it's Swivel Phase Cannons, and fly circles around Darts and Mantas.  There is one bug I know of, which does not affect game play.  See the read me.  Question, comments, bug reports, chocolate-chip cookies?  Send em to TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com

1216.title: escorts win
1216.author: Anonymous
1216.description: Escorts for Windows. Unlocks all escorts including the Aliens, and unique ships such as the Unrelenting and the Kestrel. Warning: This plugin may interfere with some of the ships unlocked in my Novatech plugin. Denier-of-Soup, denier.os at gmail dot com.

1832.title: Newbalance1.0
1832.author: Anonymous
1832.description: Welcome to New Balance, a plug that evens out the defeciencies of some tech classes and dials back the overwhelming advantage of others.  But how now brown cow, why you you want to download -another- balance plug when there's already one perfectly adequate one avaialable?  Unlike its counterpart, this plug does nothing to any of the ship resources and is meant to work with the Ship Variants 1.6 plug in, focusing instead on overhauling weapons and outfits.  Your pride and joy will still fly the same as it always has, but pirates, traders, and many enemies you used to laugh at will be hitting you fast and hard and reducing them to space dust might not be as it was.  This plug was written in .rez format.  You can find me at fishloaf@hotmail.com.  Have fun!

1483.title: Awful Pilot Names
1483.author: Anonymous
1483.description: JoshTigerheart's Department of Useless Plugs is now bringing you the worst thing possible to ever hit the addons page:  Awful Pilot Names.  Thats right!  You too can fly under a terrible alias and have foes tremble at your name that makes ears bleed!  And, whats more, since I was only limited to three possible names for pilots, now many pers have been altered to have the new terrible names.  All the pilot names were taken from a EVN Board's thread I created for the purpose of making this plug.  Thanks to all those who contributed.  Questions?  Comments?  Bug Reports?  Contact me at TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com.  And, for the first time ever in my Nova development career, this plug is in MAC format!  Thats right, you read me right, Mac format.  Windows users will need to convert.

1556.title: DeltanStarContinuum
1556.author: Anonymous
1556.description: The second to last in the Deltan Continuum series.  I have fixed many bugs and limited my outfits to only simple required ones.  The Deltans and Dartains are now both down to one star system each, the Dartains allied with house Moash and the pirates, while the Deltans have allied themselves with the Federation.  There are only two missions, but there will be several more in the next and last installment of this plug.  Any Q's, comments or suggestions will be greatly appreciated, send to sotanax2002@yahoo.com.  Thnaks people!

1881.title: Planet Expansions
1881.author: Anonymous
1881.description: The Planet Expansions plugin provides more planets for the Federation, Aurorans, Polaris, Rebels, and gives the Krypt their own domain and Wraith a couple of their own planets. If you have ever downloaded my Polaris Planets plugin, this is exactly like that. All the files are in .rez format and and works with several plugins. If you plan to make an changes make sure to include me in them if you submit them. If you have any questions/comments/bugs/complaints please contact me at deathshot@neo.rr.com - Made by Gremlin360

2260.title: SpinApp2
2260.author: Anonymous
2260.description: A universal program ( can run on any computer that has the java virtual machine installed ).  A small application that shows an open dialog that can take multiple images, or just one. Depending on the choice it will combine the images into a spin, or it will create a spin from one image, then it will ask where to save the new spin. The new spin will be saved as a pict. Can extract mask from transparency and no longer screws up with transparency. Check for updates at: http://evweb.aresaxis.us/ Email: ajwweb@earthlink.net

1330.title: StarbridgeUpgrade
1330.author: Anonymous
1330.description: This extremely small plug-in modifies outf resource 314, which is the Chrome Valkyrie upgrade. Using this outfit to upgrade a Starbridge to a Mod Starbridge C will not remove the weapons loadout you have on your current starbridge, so you won't have to waste money or time buying those weapons back. Windows users simply unzip the file and drop the .rez file in the plugins folder, Mac users will have to convert. Made by Clarence "Iced_Plasma" Jones at palindrome_sickness[NOSPAM]@yahoo.com (remove the [NOSPAM] so that your email actually comes through to me.)

1621.title: EVWarpedTeaser1
1621.author: Anonymous
1621.description: This is a teaser for an upcoming expansion for EVN, Escape Velocity Warped. Escape Velocity Warped will add about 100 systems, a number of governments, oufits, and ships. I am not some super-great graphics designer, so the graphics are not comepletely new. Even so, I hope you enjoy it, and the next teaser will come out in a few weeks.

1272.title: Norgles Balanced Sigma Mods V1.0
1272.author: Anonymous
1272.description: From the Sigma Engineer Corps comes two new balanced mods for the discerning ship captain. The first is a way to slowly repair the armor of your ship at the expense of energy regeneration. The second is a way to speed up those bulky freighter, at a cost of 2.0 million credits and 45 tons of free mass. Both of these were designed to maximize the effectiveness of larger ships that rely on armor for their main source of protection.

1200.title: Classic Kestrel
1200.author: Anonymous
1200.description: If you've ever felt sad that the Kestrel has EVN weapons instead of those cool retro EVC torpedo launchers and proton turrets, Classic Kestrel is the plug-in for you! It gives the EV Nova Kestrel (available at S7evyn) the weapons that it had in EVC, complete with graphics and sounds. The Kestrel itself still has the cool EVN graphics, though. Due to the fact that EVC ammo wouldn't be widely available in the Novaverse, the torpedo launcher and missile rack use the ship's energy. This plug-in is for Mac, so PC users will have to convert it. Made by Nil'kimas.

1225.title: Freakin Invincible Shuttle
1225.author: Anonymous
1225.description: Don't you hate it when you start a new pilot, launch of of a planet and get blown up by a stray EMP Torpedo? Or when you really want to buy some more guns, but you simply can't? Well, here it is, the Freakin' Invincible Shuttle! You start out with this really, really, really cheaty, tuned up shuttle, that is invincible and can carry tons and tons of weapons and outfits, a bunch of credits, and a whole universe to conquer! Not recommended for people that hate super cheaty cheats, or people that hate interalias or whatever ships. -X'arnor

1944.title: Real Nukes
1944.author: Anonymous
1944.description:
This plugin modifies on weapon in Nova, the EMP Torpedo. As many already have guessed, the EMP Torpedo is no more than a nuke, no less. Taking this into consideration, what the ^@^% is with only 10 Mass Damage? Fire a torpedo at any ship, and it barely makes a dent. Even fighters can survive the blast. This little plugin makes the EMP torp. more formidable, upping the damage and removing the illegal-ness from Federation systems (like you're a Bureau operative, but you still can't use nukes but those annoying Heavy Missile Variant Fed. Destroyers can???). The price is still mostly the same, but you will find the outfit will slow you down a little. Plugin made by BuggerPlugger. Email comments at buggerplugger@yahoo.com

Made for Windows, Mac will have to convert. (Sorry to the majority.)

1717.title: Hyperoid Launcher
1717.author: Anonymous
1717.description: He he he heeee! The funniest one I have made yet! Get your hyperoid launcher today, and fire   hyperoids (shoot em out of a cannon like)like nobody's business! YEEHAW! -X'arnor

3287.title: Secondary Railguns
3287.author: Chance Helmuth
3287.description: This is a first time-plugin for me, and fairly simple as such. All it does is make railguns secondary weapons, so you can pound that cruiser or carrier at a distance while your sheilds recharge without your short-range weapon firing constantly. Please send any questions, problems, praise, scorn, etc, to chelmuth1@gmail.com.

3411.title: EMP Detonator
3411.author: Xarnor
3411.description:
This plug-in adds a new weapon, the EMP Detonator. Far more powerful than the EMP torpedo, this weapon is capable of instantly disabling any ship within the considerable blast radius (which originates from the center of your ship); however, once fired, it takes a long while to recharge. It is available anywhere the EMP torpedo is sold.

I mostly made this just as an excuse to try making some sounds that work with EVN, but it turned out a pretty cool, useful, and balanced add-on. Especially useful for those missions when you have to disable and board a weak ship and you don\'t feel like re-outfitting your entire ship just so that you don\'t destroy the target immediately. :)

3444.title: Red Cube
3444.author: Michael Llenos
3444.description: This is new plug-in with: the Red Cube, Purple Destroyer and original outfits.  At the mission computer there is a way to make a lot of money by destroying a Red Cube fleet.

1275.title: novatech win
1275.author: Anonymous
1275.description: Novatech for Windows. Unlocks all ships and outfits in EV Nova (including Alien technology). Items can be purchased on Sol. Denier-of-Soup, denier.os at gmail dot com.

1456.title: All Ships
1456.author: Anonymous
1456.description: i was so fed up with plugs that said "this one lets you buy all the ships" and you can buy like two more than normal, that i went ahead and made a plugin that lest you buy EVERY SINGLE SHIP! the only thing is is that you have to have a bunch of licenses for the fed ones, so i made a seperate plug called License to Life which lets you buy anything. have fun!!! -X'arnor, bladeboy295@yahoo.com

1455.title: All Outfits.sit
1455.author: Anonymous
1455.description: This Plug-in strips away the mission bit requirements for all the Outfits in the game. All the Outfits will appear where they normally would, without the need to do the storylines to activate them. You still need to be on good terms with the governments in order to land on the neccesary planets, and you'll need the usual amount of money. This Plug-in should be compatable with any other Plug-in that doesn't change any of the storyline specific Outfits. Created by Darian_TruBlade

1210.title: Dominators Best Friend
1210.author: Anonymous
1210.description:
Dominate complete systems in 2-10 minutes with this awesome weapon created by Blackcat
report any problems to: cnscollon@hotmail.com
ENJOY!!!

1207.title: Disabling Beam
1207.author: Anonymous
1207.description: I wanted to get that Pirate Valk4, but everytime i got close, that ion cannon and those hellhounds shot me down!  So I made this, not exactly an original idea (it is for mac, not windows) and I'm releasing it to the public! One hit and everything and anything will be disabled! It goes through shields too! by zapp email me at mbelins1@hotmail.com FOR WINDOWS ONLY.

1285.title: Planet Conquest Beam
1285.author: Anonymous
1285.description: A goldmine for domination crazy players. The Conquest Beam (sort of a misnomer) is simply  a 1 hit instakill that affects the entire system. Directions are included when you buy the weapon. The Beam comes with a Cloak, Inertialess outfit (so you don't drift too close to the planet when you gleefully watch the defense fleet die), and a very fast shield recharger (for those stray shots). For Windows only, Mac will have to convert. Enjoy!  Plugin made by BuggerPlugger, send threats of heresy and comments to: buggerplugger AT yahoo DOT com

1353.title: The Baron
1353.author: Anonymous
1353.description: This is a small plug which makes a few changes to the weapons, armour and shields of ships. Your battles will last longer, as the Aurorans get thicker armour, the Feds get high-powered shields, and the pirates stop being weaklings. Also, your Manticore will hold 12 ion cannons, your Triphammer will rip even quicker through those Fed Carriers, and the Storm Chaingun is just wh4t is says on the tin- four hail chainguns, instead of that useless thing we never noticed firing. Made : 22 July 04  For Mac  PC e-mail net_monkey@mac.com  Made with EVONE. Works with other plugs.

1457.title: AllGoodBranches-1.0.sit
1457.author: Anonymous
1457.description: AllGoodBranches 1.0 is a plugin that simply makes sure you always get the favorable branch whenever you don't have direct control over which you get. You'll always get the favorable branch whenever it was intended to be random chance. It does not affect branches that require you to be in a certain place at a certain time (like the Thunderforge branch). Enjoy, and send comments to resc0030@umn.edu.

1677.title: Gonzic Rebellion
1677.author: Anonymous
1677.description: Hello this is my second mission string for EVN. This plugin will add two new governments, the Gonzic and the Gonzic Rebellion, as well as new outfits, weapons, and missions. Made by Jason Williams (jason@creativebox.net), with extra input from Chris Craigen and from Dreamwave Studios.

1817.title: Mr.Ts Paint
1817.author: Anonymous
1817.description:
MAJOR remodel from last times failed attempt. My 32nd plug under this name. Enjoy FOOL! Bugs, questions, comments ? send to dougy_n@yahoo.com
Adds 2 utfits paint and  elite marine force. if response is good so i can se my skills have improved then i will start this huge TC i have been thinking about.

1987.title: RewardShipsV3.1.sit
1987.author: Anonymous
1987.description: This is version 3.1 of RewardShips.  It fixes a number of bugs that I found after I uploaded 3.0.  This plugin is now bug free.  Sorry to all people who downloaded 3.0.  Version 3.1 released 7/7/02. Created by MacDevil. Send questions and comments to AGS848@AOL.com.

2032.title: SigmaSpecialsFixes.sit
2032.author: Anonymous
2032.description: This plugin allows all variants of Starliners to get sight-seeing missions, all variants of the Cambrian and the Leviathan to get large bulk deliveries, and all variants of the Pegasus, Cambrian and Leviathan to get regular bulk deliveries. Cargo sizes have been reduced in order to accommodate a bug in the random size code. Bulk prices are down, and range reasonably from two hundred thousand credits for regular local deliveries to two million credits for large inter-regional deliveries. It also fixes some pictures associated with these deliveries. There is no readme, but the file's function should be obvious. Talk to me at dbrauer@hfx.andara.com

2067.title: SpaceSniperAlliance1.C254D
2067.author: Anonymous
2067.description: Space Sniper Alliance v. 1.1.0 (UPDATED) The Space Sniper Alliance is an anonymous organization whose members are paid to destroy ships. In this plug, there is a random and challenging mission where the pilot seeks and shoots down a ship among lots of nasty pirate patrols. There are also many SSA Upgrades like a Space Sniper Cannon, hyperspace unit, sensors, jammer, and a covert ops package. There are two new weapons, the sniper cannon and a close combat cannon. This version is MUCH BETTER than the previous, with updates to weapons, pirates, and more... Email tachyonzero@mac.com with suggestions or bug reports.

2068.title: SpaceSniperAlliance OSX
2068.author: Anonymous
2068.description: A new version of SSA! There are new ships, some interesting new weapon systems, new outfits and updates/fixes galore, designed to work with the EVN universe as an add-on and with other plugs as well. Simply download/install the plug and buy the membership from the outfitter to get access to the missions and outfits.

2125.title: Turreted CPL v1
2125.author: Anonymous
2125.description: This plug-in creates a turreted version of the Capacitor Pulse Laser. It only becomes available after you have been accepted as Ory'Hara by the Nil'Kemorya in the Polaris string. This plug-in was created in EVNEW, and is only available for windows. Plug-in by MavHunterExtreme

2127.title: Typhoon1.sea
2127.author: Anonymous
2127.description: THis is my first plugin.  It adds a new ship, the Typhoon Gunboat, and 3 new weapons, the Typhoon minigun, Repulsor Ray, and Tractor beam.  The 2 beams are paired as primaries so enemies are held stationary while you pummel them with the minigun.  By AceBlack

1702.title: Hit This
1702.author: Anonymous
1702.description: Hit This!  Brought to you by Josh Tigerheart's Department of Utterly Useless Plugs!  This plug makes weapons travels across the screen three times as slow.  Sounds like a cheat right?  WRONG!  The A.I. can evade just as easily as you can, not to mention your shots travel slow enough to where hitting things can become very difficult.  Not even 2x mode will help much.  Email me at TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com should you have anything useful or useless to say.  The plug, like the last three, is made with EVNew, so therefore is in WinEVN format.  Mac users need a converter.

1326.title: Sotanax1.1
1326.author: Anonymous
1326.description: As I promised after the last fiasco, here is the new DATA REZ 5 file that has three new ships in it, the Earth?Herran Battlecruiser, IDA Cruiser, and the Mod Starbridge G.  It has taken a lot of effort from the Herrans and Earth with Sotanax Enterprises as the middle man, to come up with these three ships.  All three can be found on Earth.  Sorry about the first one, Earth Intelligence intecepted our package and corrupted it.  They failed to catch this one as Devlin Sotanax himself delivered this to Ambrosia. Questions or comments, sotanax2001@yahoo.com

1719.title: Illegal Drugs
1719.author: Anonymous
1719.description: This plug-in adds a new junk called "Illegal drugs". You can buy it and sell it on trade centers. Buy cheap from the pirates and houseless and sell high on other planets like Earth, Aurora... My first plug. This plug is for MacNova -- PC users will need to convert it. My e-mail is klaudio187@hotmail.com. Test this plug, please. :D

2097.title: Super Defense Fleets
2097.author: Anonymous
2097.description: Ever thought the defense fleets in Nova were a bit easy?  JoshTigerheart's Department of Useful plugs is here to give you the challenge you want!  This plug alters the defense fleets to have harder ships.  But thats not all!  Now every defense fleet has several new variants of ships known as "System Defense".  These ships are far stronger than any in the game, garaunteed to you on your toes.  Think you can handle it?  Questions?  Comments?  Chocolate?  Send them to TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com.  The plug is in Windows .rez format.  Mac users will need a convertor.

1475.title: Ashen Galaxy part 1
1475.author: Anonymous
1475.description: After three long years of development, Dark Matter Productions is pleased to release a new total conversion for Escape Velocity: Nova. Ashen Galaxy puts you on the bridge of a mighty warship, tasked with defending humanity from all threats. You'll need all of your wits and cunning (and a little help from friends) in order to protect Earth from her foes. Ashen Galaxy includes dozens of new ships and weapons for you to play with. There are over two hundred systems for you to explore, along with a campaign to keep you on track with fighting the aliens. This is part 1 of 4. It contains the sounds and music as well as the read-me. Make sure you download parts 2-4!

1313.title: Return of the Forklift.sit
1313.author: Anonymous
1313.description:
The forklift has made its long, awaited return. It has arrived. The most deadly and respected weapon around, the forklift is a sure killer. Plugin created by Saaci Plank.
email: the_forklift@saaciplank.co.uk

1236.title: HellhoundHelper1.0.0
1236.author: Anonymous
1236.description: This plug allows you to buy 50 hellhounds per launcher rather than 50 no matter what. Most people wouldn't consider a cheat since you do have to buy more launchers to get more hellhounds. [pipeline's note: Yes, but ~I~ would, since that's the way Hellhounds were intended to work. :)]Useful for those long endeavors into enemy territory. This is a Mac plug. It has been tested on Mac EVN 1.0.8 but should work on any other version as well. It should also work with most other plugs. Made by Nil'kimas. [email removed at author's request]

1874.title: Pirate Dragon 1.1
1874.author: Anonymous
1874.description: Pirate Dragon for EV Nova by Etherguard. Does what it says on the tin, includes graphics and in-game pics as well as several versions of the ship. The mod also includes the Pirate BioRelay which can be purchased separately (and has some unique traits).

1213.title: Easy Money.sit
1213.author: Anonymous
1213.description: A Mission Cheat that rewards 170 million credits. Full instructions in the read me file(html). Fully tested, should work very well.

1693.title: HeartOfGold1-1.sit
1693.author: Anonymous
1693.description: The HeartOfGold plugin adds several new ships, outfits, planets, and characters to EV, inspired by the books and radio shows by the late Comedy/Sci-Fi writer Douglas Adams, including the kill-o-zap cannon and the ship Heart of Gold. Version 1.1 adds more outfits, and adresses some issues with the newest version of Nova. By Jdavi

1198.title: CHEATRAGE1
1198.author: Anonymous
1198.description:
While travelling through a barren system of the EVO world one night - we stumbled across an angry pirate. Months of exploration with a Hard Core pilot went down in burning glory. With a vengeance we searched void of space until the united minds of Theisos and Apokalypse produced the most frightening wrath of vengeance ever seen by the EVO world. Hundreds of planets under our mighty fists - no one can match our power! Now for EVN - we have created the greatest cheat suite ever! Over 1 hundred ships available - unbelieveable fire power. And all of this power in tiny patch files which run under Mac OS 9 or Classic.

By: Theisos (Galacticon@email.com) and Apokalypse (spystreak@email.com)

1217.title: EV Nova-Instant Death.sit
1217.author: Anonymous
1217.description: Instant Death - This is just about the ultimate weapon cheat.  It  shoots an insanely fast blast which kills any ship in one hit.  After using it, the shots that missed their targets keep on going, so they just keep flying out the edge of the screen and back in, and it is really weird.  By   z0gster  .

1243.title: InstantCash
1243.author: Anonymous
1243.description: Getting cash couldn't get any easier.  Simply install this plug-in and become rich everytime you create a new pilot.

1508.title: BulletTime
1508.author: Anonymous
1508.description: This is a plug that allows you to do "Bullet Time." As of now it is only in windows format, sorry. Created by Cunjo. Descriptions and Outfite Pictures created by Avatar7. (sorry about the crappy picture for the outfitter:). )

1560.title: diamondlaser
1560.author: Anonymous
1560.description: This is a simple outfit for EV Nova that will add only 1 weapon, however this weapon is extremely powerful... AND extremely expensive! The purified diamond laser is the newest weapon to hit the market... so download it today! If there are any problems, feel free to contact me at Jadolftrianf@yahoo.com and I'll get on it!

1570.title: Duchess
1570.author: Anonymous
1570.description: This plugin adds a new ship to Nova, the Duchess Starskipper. It is a small ship, longer than a heavy shuttle but less massive. Its sole purpose is to chauffer VIPs to distant systems. These VIPs will pay handsomly for the service (VERY handomsly), but you will not be able to take part in any missions besides ferrying passengers. No weapons, no room for upgrade, and only 1 ton of cargo space. But it has a huge range, built-in solar panels, a horizontal booster and an afterburner - plus it handles beautifully.

1610.title: EVNEnhancedSoundsFolder.sit
1610.author: Anonymous
1610.description: This plug replaces some of the sounds originally used by EVN. It currently modifies 18 sounds, which include the beeps, cloak on/off, warnings, some missile launch sounds, and more. Modify and remove parts of the plug any way you like, but first read the included information. EVN Enhanced Sounds 1.1 created, tested, and approved by MiStUhPaNdA. In .sit.hqx form. Contact information inside.

1662.title: Galvenic Pirates  v2.sit
1662.author: Anonymous
1662.description: This is my third EVN Mod. This plugin will add a mission string to the game. There are 37 missions, 6 playable ships including a modified Thunderhead and Fed Destroyer, and many weapons, including my own Nuclear Warhead, a modified Radar missle and ionization turrets. This version adds variants and fixes some things. E-Mail me at jwillie194@netscape.net if you have any questions.

1673.title: GefjonFix 2.0.4.sit
1673.author: Anonymous
1673.description: This plug-in makes the opal trade route in the Gefjon system harder by adding more pirates and putting a larger gap in between the planets. For those people who want more challenge :). It also adds another pirate station. This plug-in is known to clash with Planet Killer Deluxe. This version adds compatibility for the EVN 1.0.1. By patrick (: a z d a r a :) Version: 2.0.4

1745.title: Khamikazi Viper.sea
1745.author: Anonymous
1745.description:
This plug makes a fighter, the Khamikazi Viper, and it's bay. The Khamikzi Viper does massive damage to ships, it will fly around, shoot at an enemy, and if it gets close, will explode in a huge fireball causing death to the opponent(or -400 points of armor). This is my first released plug, it is so large because of some graphics and stuff that needed to be duplicated. Enjoy!
	Made by Meaker VI
With help from AGDenton

1747.title: KillJarJar.sit
1747.author: Anonymous
1747.description: Ever want to kill Jar Jar?  Now you can.  This plugin makes Jar Jar randomly appear and attack you, whereupon you can blow him to smithereens.  He's pretty rare in order to make it even more fun when he finally appears.  v. 1.0, created by Beamup

1780.title: MarauderHome.sit
1780.author: Anonymous
1780.description: This makes a sort of home system for the Marauders - not a planet, just a system where they hang out.  Originally intended to answer the question, "Where do these guys COME from?", it is useful if you want to find and fight Marauders to up your combat or government rating (or capture a Pegasus).  The system in question is near Sol and is a logical place for a hideout.  v. 1.0, created by Beamup

1955.title: Red Halo.sit
1955.author: Anonymous
1955.description:
Red halo is a plug-in pack containing Tichel Moon, a new moon with high $$$ mission, Hyperoid Residue, adds a MEGA rare trade item and finnaly Wraith hive, adds a Wraith home planet in a secret part of wraith space! All files known to work fine, if not tell me. Enjoy!

machead_@mac.com
Machead

1986.title: RewardShipsV3.1.1.sit
1986.author: Anonymous
1986.description: This is simply an update to my Reward Ships plugin.  The plugin now works with 1.0.2.  Enjoy!  Created by MacDevil.  Version 3.1.1 released 9/7/02.

1992.title: Rush from Merrol
1992.author: Anonymous
1992.description: This plug-in should speed up the Merrol bar missions that plague four of the plots. You should only have to do each one only once. Have fun.

2029.title: Sigma Extras
2029.author: Anonymous
2029.description: This plugins adds four more sigma upgrades to nova: The Sigma energy Maximiser, the Sigma Accelleration Maximizer, the Sigma Shield Upgrade and the Sigma Mass Increase (+45 tons of weapon space). The Sigma Mass Increase is extremely expensive, so it's not a cheat. Enjoy! Plugin made by HomeWear.

2107.title: The Challenge103
2107.author: Anonymous
2107.description: This is a plug-in for players looking for a new challenge from EVN. The challenge is simply to dominate the new system. It is harder than you might think. The Challenge v. 1.0.3 includes several fixes, as well as bonus easy and wimpy versions of the plug-in for those who find the original too much of a challenge. Readme includes contact information if you find any bugs. Made by mrxak.

2144.title: VellosDelay
2144.author: Anonymous
2144.description: This plugin sets a combat rating on the "find Vellos homeworld" mission, so you can play around, save money, and buy something stronger than a shuttle before refusing the mission and being hounded out of Fed space. If you can survive long enough in a shuttle to get away from Sol. The Vellos thread is now the only one that doesn't require a combat rating, so you could get stuck before getting a chance at the Sigma, UN Shipping, etc, missions. johna@pyramid.net.

2166.title: Win Slayer
2166.author: Anonymous
2166.description: Windows version of the Slayer plug-in. Slayer is a plug that adds a ship for each string at the bonus planet.  I did not make any of the ships so powerful that they can kill everything without worry, but they are somewhat well armed.  This version of Slayer fixes the bugs and adds descriptions for all the ships and the weapon.  Please e-mail me, StormyNight, with questions or comments at JoeyHiii@aol.com.

1824.title: Neonglow
1824.author: Anonymous
1824.description: This is a plugin that makes all the ships into bright, neon images. This will work with almost all plugins. E-mail me a nextgenddrer21@hotmail.com if you have any questions about this MUST HAVE plugin. Does not work on OS9.

1387.title: ClassGuide.sit
1387.author: Anonymous
1387.description:
I got tired of having to search through all of Nova's GOVT files trying to decyfer the different Classes, Allies, and Enemies, so i made this handy dandy guide. It outlines every government in each Class etc, in an easy to read (I think) document. Its in .PDF and Appleworks format, so download and enjoy!  -Picquilarius
[picquilarius@yahoo.com]

1798.title: Missile Tonnage 1.0
1798.author: Anonymous
1798.description: This is a simple little windows plug which increases the tonnage of all guided missiles by approximately 1, with a few exceptions (as indicated in the readme).  This slight modification makes the player accountable for how many missiles he desires and severly limits the temptation to max your missile count and destroy everything fom afar.  Enjoy! (firefox3050@yahoo.com)

1679.title: GovernmentPaintClassic.sit
1679.author: Anonymous
1679.description: Government Paint Classic is for the EV Classic TC for EVN.  It will make several of the governments (Lethean, Cydonian, Pirates) paint their ships differently.  It WILL NOT change the Confeds or Rebels because their ships are already painted.  Also does not let you paint your ship.  Works on a mac.  By Nil'kimas.  Contact me at daprice@mac.com.

1998.title: SAE Ships.sit
1998.author: Anonymous
1998.description: Nova + Star Wars = SAE  Smugglers, Pirates and more! Enjoy (PC AND MAC! .sit with .bin compression) THIS IS THE SHIP SECTION. YOU MUST HAVE PARTS 1-2 AND THE SHIPS (this file) FILE. The long awaited EV:Nova plug: Star Wars: Smuggler's Alliance Expansion is here! Bringing you stunning graphics with over a dozen new ships, planets and outfits. Come get the action here in this large EV:Nova Plug by ELS. If you have ever wanted to fly an x-wing or b-wing. This is your chance! With over 14 new ships, the SAE plug is loaded with excitement. New v1.2 brings you a few new missions and puts you in front of the Chiss race. Copyright 2003-2004 Eternal Light Studios. For support go to: http://www.eternallightstudios.com/ELSForums  [email deleted at author's request]

1896.title: Polaris Hg system
1896.author: Anonymous
1896.description:
Polaris Hyperagate System-- My first plug.  This plug creates a polaris Hyperagte network.  It regenerates some old gates and adds a few new ones as well.  It is not connected to the sigma network.  You will no be able to use it until you have started the polaris storyline.  compressed with stuffit 7.5. For Windows.  Mac users: don't forget to convert!
by darth_vader druker@uni.uiuc.edu
version 1.0 released 1/20/05.

1937.title: QuieterBRL
1937.author: Anonymous
1937.description: This simple plugin makes Bio Relay Lasers and BRLTs play the sound for Polaron cannons rather than that annoying beeping sound.  Should be compatible with any plugin, as long as it doesn't change the stats for BRLs or BRLTs.  Mispeled1@yahoo.com

1295.title: PolarisTech3MacWin
1295.author: Anonymous
1295.description: There was a bug in my previous submission that stopped the pilot from buying any outfits besides maps and licenses. Many thanks to Charlie for taking the time to email me. The final version of the Polaris tech plug-in will give you access to some of the outfits I forgot to include in the 2nd version. Also, you should now get the Polaris HUD instead of the civillian one when you buy Polaris ships using this plug-in. Denier-of-Soup  denier@rawr32.net  See http://denier.serverbox.info/ for more tech plug-ins.

2000.title: Salvo Weapons1.1
2000.author: Anonymous
2000.description: From JoshTigerheart's Deparment of Useless Plug-ins comes the 1.1 update to Salvo Weapons.  Want to make the game more interesting without messing with the stats of all these ships and weapons or by adding a whole lot of stuff? This is the plug you are looking for! Salvo Weapons makes every weapon in the standard game fire at the same time. See the read me included to learn about some of the effects. This absurdly simple plug has such a large effect on the game, you'll notice it the moment you or someone else starts shooting. This plug was made with EVNew, so therefore its PC. Mac users need to use a converter. Questions/Comments/Bug Reports/Death Threats should be sent to: TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com.  See readme for details on what the update changes.

2110.title: TheArmory
2110.author: Anonymous
2110.description: This plug-in adds a bunch of new and modified versions of weapons to EV-Nova, including shotgun rockets and the side-firing missiles. They're all balanced, so this isn't a cheat. Some of the weapon ideas have been praised by members of the EV developing community as "very nice" and "I love them", so this isn't just another "W0zz0rz, 3 n3w sh!pz 4nd w34pz d00d!" Plug-in made by The CrimpMaster. This isn't my first plug-in, just my first publicly released one. Contact me at frozenmonkeystudios@yahoo.com. This is a Macintosh plug-in. Windows people will need to convert it. 2/5EVN 1.0.9

1229.title: good cheats
1229.author: Anonymous
1229.description: one outfit makes you invincible and another can destry every ship in the system for an extended amount of time  and thair is one prity good ship

2179.title: ZPM
2179.author: Anonymous
2179.description: These rare modules can increase a ship's shielding and recharge rate up to 4 times that of normal speed. It works by extracting energy from small artificially-created subspaces.  The first module was found in 677NC near the galactic northwest, it is assumed that they came here from an alternate dimension to that of ours. Some even say they saw humans firing projectile weapons at strange people with glowing eyes on a ship shaped like a triangle, but these rumors have never been verified. After the first one was found a small company by the name of "Bob's Power Supplies" created more of them on 1112NC. But they are quite expensive and only available to the highest bidder and on black markets. Robert Stever

2108.title: The DarthKev Plug
2108.author: Anonymous
2108.description: Here it is, my first plug-in for EVNova. This plug adds a new government, several ships and outfits, seven new systems, six new stellars, and a new interface for the government. There are no missions, it's just a place to get some awesome ships and weapons. You just have to find it. Enjoy!  By DarthKev.

1970.title: Return to S7evyn 1.0.0.sit
1970.author: Anonymous
1970.description: This plugin allows people who have finished a major plotline to return to S7evyn after they have left. This may be useful for people who finished a major plotline, wanted to by a Kestrel but didn't have enough money, this will allow them to return after they have gone and made some more money. NOTE: If you havn't finished a major plotline (or you are using another pilot that hasn't) you won't be able to go there. By patrick -- (: a z d a r a :) Version=1.0.0

1596.title: evclassicportmodfix
1596.author: Anonymous
1596.description: This addon was made to change the EV Classic Port to make it more dangerous, and more realistic, like a Confed Cruiser having 8 turrets now (Its supposed to only have 4). It also uses the gun postions better. Weapon speeds were also increased to make up for short range.

1347.title: SuperCheats2.6
1347.author: Anonymous
1347.description: I've gotten a lot of e-mails asking when the next version would be released so I figured it was about time to do some work and finish up SuperCheats2.6.  In this version you will find several of my ships that I made a while back along with some new Nova ships that are now UltraShips.  I also thought that it would be cool to make some weapons that were very destructive so I made the Disable Beam and the Destroy Beam.  Hope you like the new version.  Questions...Comments...Suggestions...Bugs...Beta Testers...CeRD@mac.com.

1439.title: 3D Shield 105
1439.author: Anonymous
1439.description:
The 3-D Shield Bubbles plug-in adds a 3-D looking shield glow to all EV:N 1.0.5 ships.
Should be compatible with most plug-ins (at least those which don't change shäns).
Alexander Salokat : a.salokat@web.de

1628.title: FakeID.sit
1628.author: Anonymous
1628.description: This is a temporary plug-in to provide false IDs for purchase which will clear your record with the Federation, the Auroran Empire, and the Polaris. This plug-in will almost certainly NOT work with other plug-ins that has outfits or missions. I haven't tried to make it compatible because the False ID outfit mod will be fixed in 1.0.1, and this workaround won't be necessary anymore.  JohnnyAndrews

1737.title: Kestrel
1737.author: Anonymous
1737.description: This is the Kestrel "Fix" plugin. Even though what it fixes isn't actually a bug, I think that for 50 million credits the Kestrel had better be dang good. And when you have a crazy decked out Raven, it's not. The Kestrel is now faster, turns better, has more shields, more crew, a better recharge rate... the works. So if you really want to use a vintage ship but don't want to be flying around in a piece of crap, download this plugin. Plugin by Mr. Guru.

1171.title: 1Million
1171.author: Anonymous
1171.description: This plugin was created by Mr. Guru. All you have to do is go into a mission BBS, accept ths, and then land on the same planet for an easy one million credits. Can be used infinite times.

1301.title: QuickStartV1.0.1
1301.author: Anonymous
1301.description: This is my first plug-in for public release. It allows a new pilot to fly a Mod E Starbridge with 700 million credits in the bank. The Sigma missions are completed, giving access to the Sigma ships and the hypergates. This plug is not meant as a cheat plug however it could be used as one.
