I made this plug because I was frustrated with having to spend an hour or two making money. You can now jump into your favorite story line more easily. The Read Me contains important installation information.

1647.title: ForeverSigma 0.0.1a1.sit
1647.author: Anonymous
1647.description:
SigmaForever is a plug-in for ATMOS/Ambrosia's epic space action adventure/RPG game, EV Nova. It let's players get the Sigma and Universal shipping mission strings even after starting one of the six major mission strings. First public alpha, and may become the final version. It's not my fault if it somehow (and ulikely) screws up your game! Use at your own risk!
by admiraldennis (admiraldennis@mac.com)

1648.title: ForeverSigma 0.0.1a2.sit
1648.author: Anonymous
1648.description:
ForeverSigma is a plug-in by admiraldennis for ATMOS/Ambrosia's epic space action/RPG game, EV Nova. It let's players get the Sigma and Universal shipping
mission strings even after starting one of the six major mission
strings. Version 0.0.1a2 Fixes bug where you could get the first Universal or Sigma mission ever if you had already gotten it. http://admiraldennis.dhs.org/evn/

1671.title: GefjonFix 2.0.2.sit
1671.author: Anonymous
1671.description: This plug-in makes the opal trade route in the Gefjon system harder by adding more pirates and putting a larger gap in between the planets. For those people who want more challenge :). Version 2 adds another pirate station. Version 2.0.2 adds compatibility with Përs of the Webboard (1.0.0alpha6.1) This plug-in is known to clash with Planet Killer Deluxe. By : a z d a r a : (patrick) Version: 2.0.2.

1716.title: Hyperioid Upgrade
1716.author: Anonymous
1716.description: I am currently developing a hyperioid string and just finish a weapon glow.  It looks cool so I thought that I'd submit it.  it gives the hyperioid a bluish light instead of yellow.  Very cool.  Made by Stephen.  sec222@mac.com

1744.title: KestrelShield v1.sit
1744.author: Anonymous
1744.description:
This simple plugin add a shield glow around the Kestrel. That's all. The Kestrel stats aren't modified at all (not a cheat plug :).

FT'e

1805.title: Mod Pers Ships1.0.sit
1805.author: Anonymous
1805.description: There is an anomaly that occurs when you capture përs (character) ships which have more weapons than free mass. You get to keep the extra weapons, but can't sell them to recoup their space - the ship reverts to its normal variant. This plugin for EV Nova 1.0.2 fixes the problem: now if you can manage to capture Iuso's Raven, Arando's Arachnid, Techarakh's Cruiser or Flannigan's 'bridge, you keep the extra mass. Also adds a Nil'kimas Manta Bay to spice things up, but guess how you've got to get it... by Blue Dog, blue.dog@macunlimited.net

1813.title: More baysv1.0.sit
1813.author: Anonymous
1813.description: v1.0 This plug adds four docks for Starbridges. Don't worry, though - it's not a cheat - they are extremely heavy and expensive, which offsets the power of having two Starbridges at your beck and call. Compatible with Plug Pack v15. By Scott "Admiral Slathkill II" Wilson.

1887.title: plugcollectionv1
1887.author: Anonymous
1887.description:
This plugin has resources from many plugins, unified in one plug to eliminate compabillity problems. So,  everything except the esthar system isn't really my work. I just made all that resources work together, creating the largest non-tc plug for evn, i think.
For closer information read the readme or mail me.
NOTE: i realized some problems with my zip app, so all my prior releases didn't work. 
so don't download these plugs: dimensional gates, sellescorts, evmagmanova and evomagmanova.
sorry.
sellescorts and dimensional gates plugins are obsolete because there are newer plugs doing the same, but if there is demand i'll upload working versions of ev/evonovamagma again. 
robert_menzen@yahoo.de

1888.title: PlugInPakAR.W.Plugs1.0.7
1888.author: Anonymous
1888.description:
6 Plugs Version 1.0.7 Plug-in Pak A (Shuttle class D) (Viper Assault class) (Extra/cannonsTurretsCiv)-/(ThunderheadBay2)(DisabledATMOS/Ships)(Uprated Leviathan/Bays this in his a 20,000 ton Leviathan with 10,000 ton cargo can do sigma missions his Thunderhead bays for ship protection, and is well Heavly armed Version 15,000,000 credits.
well thats it enjoy. From Robert one click on plug now get info comments. DisabledATMOS/Ships is rated at (10) on a 1-10 scale.

1897.title: Polaris Mining1.0.sit
1897.author: Anonymous
1897.description: Ever been after a Polaris ship, but you didn't have the cash for it? Well, with this plugin, you can easily make a lot of money without leaving Polaris space. It changes one Polaris system to make it perfect for asteroid mining. Includes both Mac and Windows versions. Created by froggy (e-mail me at rlivblum@comcast.net).

1947.title: RebelCruiser.sit
1947.author: Anonymous
1947.description:
Just a quick plug I threw together to test out my graphics for the Rebel Cruiser (of EV classic fame) Excuse the cheesy descriptions, I wasn't feeling very creative when I wrote it up. E-mail me with comments/suggestions/bug reports at odin@eclipse.recongamer.com.
-Odin

1950.title: RebelSideMissionsFix1.0.sit
1950.author: Anonymous
1950.description: This plugin fixes the cron resource for the two Rebel offshoot missions, "Steal Hypergate Codes" and "Test Rebel Cloaking Device."  The amount of time before these missions become available has been reduced so you don't have to wait FOREVER.  It also fixes the missions themselves so they are now available on both Rebel planets instead of Neo New York (I don't even know where that is).  This makes it easier to get these missions which make the Rebel storyline more interesting.

2022.title: ShipUpgrade.sit
2022.author: Anonymous
2022.description: This large plug-in adds many ship upgrades to the game. When I first played Nova, I liked the different subclasses, but was unhappy that I couldn't actually upgrade my ship to them. This plug fixes that, adding outfits that can upgrade 40 different classes of ships to different subclasses, including the Mod Starbridge E, Heavy Weapons Pirate Carrier, Armed Varinat Leviathan. All Outfits have full descriptions and pictures, and five can bought as regular ships. Thoughts, and new ideas to jonesml45@mac.com. Also included is a plug that sorts out strange Polaris subclasses, availble when a pilot completes Cloak/Tunnel Organ missions. All have full names indicating what outfits they have.

1349.title: superheavy guns plug
1349.author: Anonymous
1349.description: This is my first plug, it allows you to buy two new guns, they are huge, at almost any stellar. And no, this isn't meant to be a cheat. Note: made with EVNEW windows only, mac will have to convert. Any questions, complaints, etc. my email is: crazyeyes24@sbcglobal.net ENJOY!

1203.title: crybaby
1203.author: Anonymous
1203.description: Sick of having all those ships trying to scan you?  Hate having to worry if you are going to have that illegal cargo traced back to you, resulting in a loss of that money making mission?  This little baby's for you.  The Crybaby will keep those Fed Vipers off your tail, provided they weren't all that angry to begin with.  Drop it, activate it, and watch whatever government's ships go crazy trying to blow it up.  It's also just fun to watch.  This is a Windows .rez plug, sorry Macs.  Questions, comments? A date?  pkrug539@dotnet.com.

1194.title: Blackhole Weaponry and More
1194.author: Anonymous
1194.description:
BLACKHOLE Weaponry and More!!!  If you have ever wanted to have a destructive wormhole at your disposal, then this IS your plug-in.  This is my first plugin I've ever submitted, so don't expect perfect results.  This plug-in adds 4 new weapons that can be bought at almost any planet, they are: Blackhole Torpedo, Methane Particle Cannon, Smart Nuke, and Diablo Beam.  The Blackhole appears for 4-6 seconds normally and does the damage a blackhole should do.  The Methane Particle Cannon and the Smart Nuke are sort of cheap, but they're perfect for Planetary Dominations and for people who like demolition effects.  The Diablo Beam is a red beam that disables all enemy ships it touches.  Have fun with this awesome plug-in that will give you days of pleasure.  For best results,use with Liscense to Kill which is found at this website: http://www.ambrosiasw.com/cgi-bin/vftp/dl-redirect.pl/Licence_to_Kill.sit?path=evn/cheatsfile=Licence_to_Kill.sit
Created by Chronodrago, helped by WonderBoy.  Contact me at: peiceofcruds@yahoo.com

1699.title: Heraan Destruction Suite
1699.author: Anonymous
1699.description: This is a rather complicated plugin for the person who doesn't know a lot about the EVN story, that will allow you to destroy the Heraan through several missions. For Federation players. For Aurorian haters. For Macintosh users only. Contact me at ben.kurtovic@verison.net. Yes, that's my name.

1620.title: EVWarpedT1
1620.author: Anonymous
1620.description: This is the first teaser to the upcoming expansion, Escape Velocity: Warped! The expansion will include: 100 new integrated systems, 7 new governments, 40 planets, an appropiate amount of ships, and lots of fun! This teaser includes: 1 government, 3 dosen systems, and a dozen planets. This includes alot of empty systems, because they are occupied by different governments and they were nit included in this teaser. Made by: MastaE

1279.title: PaintShop with HGA
1279.author: Anonymous
1279.description: PaintShop allows you to buy 15 different paint jobs for your ship at PaintShop in the PaintShopPros system. Enjoy all the pretty colours! You can also buy an HGAL, Hypergate Access License. You can reach all the main hypergates from HG-PaintShop  in the PaintShopPros system. Have fun! -X'arnor

1839.title: NewWar
1839.author: Anonymous
1839.description: HoboWear is embarrassed to present (and with worse luck in the names dept.): New War (Italy vs Greece). This Plug alters a few systems, adds two new governments, a new trade junk, two new planets and helps make the galaxy feel just a little bit more full. Read me included, including e-mail address for feedback.

3435.title: Banhammer
3435.author: ZN35
3435.description:
Adds the Banhammer - a secondary weapon that when fired at a target, will destroy all ships in the system besides self. (and also a disable-only version for those missions where you have to board the enemies)
And adds bh shields to give you invincibility..... just because....

1351.title: SuperRebelDestroyer
1351.author: Anonymous
1351.description: This is A Plug-in That makes one of my favorite ships invincable.  I made minor :) adjustmants on the Rebel Destroyer.  It has tons of cargo space and loads of free mass.  Also I gave it 100 Anaconda's for you to play with.  I found this usefull for dominating planets.  There is a max of 64 ships in a system at a time so if you take out 64 anacondas then you demand tribute towards a planet the planet only sends out 1 or 2 ships to fight you off, instead of an entire battle fleet.  So thats my Little add in.  Also the ship is a planetary ship so enemy ships cant even harm you.  A cool little invincible ship I like'd to make.

1877.title: PirateLightning.sit
1877.author: Anonymous
1877.description: This plug adds a new pirate ship to the game, the Pirate Lightning. It is moderately powerful, not like a cheat or anything. Think of it as an upgraded Wild Geese Lightning. This is not a cheat, just a new ship for those people who thought the lightning should be better than it is in the game.

1963.title: Reset Missions
1963.author: Anonymous
1963.description: Reset Missions 1.0.6 By KagatoAC: This is an update to my original Pilot Reset plug. It allows you to reset your pilot at the completion of a String (when you land at S7eyvn) so you can go out and do another string with the same pilot as many times as you like. There are a couple of new outfits as well, graphics for the Combat Drone were  provided by ArcAngelCounterstrike

1297.title: PolyconQuickstart.sit
1297.author: Anonymous
1297.description:
Polycon Quickstart is a little Cheat Plugin for the Polycon TC
It add a new chär which is starting with 750M Credits
Plugin by the French Team (made by Blood_Falcon)
http://membres.lycos.fr/thebigberta/

1632.title: federationkiller.sit
1632.author: Anonymous
1632.description: Federation Killer is a small add on that creates a new system right outside Sol. Here you can just shoot away at tons of Feds. I must warn you, you'd better have a powerful ship if you want to survive! I'm going to try to make them with other ships from other governments like Polaris as well. I testested this with EVNova version 1.0.7. Contact me at stephen_donahue@mac.com for updates or to complain about something, or to report bugs!

1710.title: Hyper-gates.sit
1710.author: Anonymous
1710.description: This plug-in reactivates all the dead hypergates and changes the hypergate links.  I realize a plug for this already exists, but this one has a different gate-link layout and it also adds a gate in the Sol system which the other one didn't (the intro to the game says there was a gate in Sol but it was destroyed).  By Nibbs

1860.title: Outfits enabler
1860.author: Anonymous
1860.description:
By STraven.This plugin allow you to buy some outfits and a ship which, normally, are unavalaible for purchase. Their prices, avalaibility, and mass arn't changed, so don't expect a cheat plug.
This is my first plug, but it's fully tested and operationnal.
Created for Nova 1.0.4. Compatibility with other version is possible, but not guranteed.

1814.title: More Junk
1814.author: Anonymous
1814.description: This MAC PLUG-IN adds a few more junk to the game. It adds Illegal drugs (my last plugs added Illegal drugs too) and adds Toxic-Bio Micro Organisms. You can buy and sell them on trade centres. The only plug-ins that i know to make are only these, about junk but they are very coolio. Try it and except more junk plugs soon. If you have some ideas for more stuff for the trade centres, email me klaudio187@hotmail.com. I'm conting on you!

2118.title: Thundervalk
2118.author: Anonymous
2118.description: Due to someone going to the boards and asking for it, I, Zapp, have taken the Thundervalk out of the SAE plugin, as it is without changing a thing. Comments? Suggestions? Lawsuits at this breaking copyright laws? Email me at zapp27@hotmail.com.

2114.title: TheGrinchians
2114.author: Anonymous
2114.description: The original Escape Velocity plugin 'The Grinchians' has made its way to the Nova engine. Masterfully crafted by the original author, it has been converted with great care, and should be bug-free. Features devastating firepower, awesome warships and combat-intensive storylines. Ported by Consul Bob for Guy's EV port, and released on November the 7th, 2007.

1995.title: SAE 2of2.sit
1995.author: Anonymous
1995.description: Nova + Star Wars = SAE  Smugglers, Pirates and more! Enjoy (PC AND MAC! .sit with .bin compression) This is part 2 of 2. You must have all parts to play! The long awaited EV:Nova plug: Star Wars: Smuggler's Alliance Expansion is here! Bringing you stunning graphics with over a dozen new ships, planets and outfits. Come get the action here in this large EV:Nova Plug by ELS. If you have ever wanted to fly an x-wing or b-wing. This is your chance! With over 14 new ships, the SAE plug is loaded with excitement. New v1.2 brings you a few new missions and puts you in front of the Chiss race. Copyright 2003-2004 Eternal Light Studios. For support go to: http://www.eternallightstudios.com/ELSForums  [email deleted at author's request]

1363.title: Useful hangers.sit
1363.author: Anonymous
1363.description: This useful cheat plugin allows you to buy raven, krypt, wraith (adult), rebel dragon, manticore and thunderforge hangers for 1 credit and for 0 credits you can have up to 25 of each type. This is my first plug.

3196.title: Weapons & Outfits Fix
3196.author: Anonymous
3196.description:
This plug-in modifies many of Nova's outfits and weapons to better create a realistic environment and situation which players would find themselves in.  Everything from adjusting the firing rate of turrets to reflect the numbers of guns they have on them, outfits and weapons in the jurisdiction of governments and their ships, weapon types, weapon effects on ships, to outfit effects and prices have been altered to reflect their pictures, descriptions and prices.  This is all in an effort to make the game more consistent with its RP style of gaming.  It's in .bin format, so windows users will have to convert the file.

Questions, comments, advice or ideas, please contact my email: dposluch@gmail.com

3258.title: Start in Sol
3258.author: X'arnor
3258.description: This plug-in gives you the option to start a new pilot in the Sol system instead of in the other three systems. This is really convenient for me because whenever I start a new pilot I just jump straight to Sol anyway. To my knowledge, no one has made a plug-in like this before. Enjoy :)

1994.title: SAE 1of2.sit
1994.author: Anonymous
1994.description: Nova + Star Wars = SAE  Smugglers, Pirates and more! Enjoy (PC AND MAC! .sit with .bin compression) Note: This is part 1 of 2. You must have both parts to play! The long awaited EV:Nova plug: Star Wars: Smuggler's Alliance Expansion is here! Bringing you stunning graphics with over a dozen new ships, planets and outfits. Come get the action here in this large EV:Nova Plug by ELS. If you have ever wanted to fly a x-wing or b-wing. This is your chance! With over 14 new ships, the SAE plug is loaded with excitement. New v1.2 brings you a few new missions and puts you in front of the Chiss race. Copyright 2003-2004 Eternal Light Studios. For support go to: http://www.eternallightstudios.com/ELSForums [email deleted at author's request]

1283.title: Pirate Hunter
1283.author: Anonymous
1283.description: Pirate hunter is a super ship that is to powerful for the EVN game it can take out enrire fleets easly it has unlimited range and give game invincible ships a hard time and has been known to temp disable them using the 50 winter tempests powered by 720 solar panels and a few reactors. From Robert E-mail Robert9198@aol.com

1645.title: Fixes.sit
1645.author: Anonymous
1645.description:
Version 1.0.3 - 4/7/02

If you load this plugin you do not need any other Fix plugins.  It contains all of the Fixes posted on the add-ons page to date.  The I version of the Fixes plug gives the Raven Inertia.

It fixes the following:

 Polaris Paed't Bug 
 Polaris Capture Vell-os Bug 
 Vell-os Outfit availability 
 Rebel Cloaking Device Mission Bug 
 Kestrel Capture Bug 
 Destroy Raven Bug
 Rebel Angry Planets Bug
 Raven Inertialess Problem

By Jericon

1642.title: Fix Drop Bears.sit
1642.author: Anonymous
1642.description: This plug-in should eliminate drop bear attacks from happening at all.  I made this plug-in a) because drop bear attacks are annoying and there's no way to get rid of them, and b) because i believe there is some sort of bug associated with the drop bear attacks

1691.title: Hbomb.sit
1691.author: Anonymous
1691.description: A super Weapon to dominate planets... You can buy in any federation shop and for Free.  To use, select H and a target, now press the 2º weapon system and Kaboom...

1302.title: Raven Bay
1302.author: Anonymous
1302.description: For those REALLY bad cheaters only.  This adds a new free outfit to the game-the raven bay.  The 14 raven limit is more to keep the computer from crashing than to make it fair.  Email any questions or comments to sec222@mac.com .

3267.title: Swirl Warship
3267.author: StarBound
3267.description: This is a small, sparingly-tested plug-in. It adds one new ship, the Swirl Light Warship, complete with new graphics and 2 new weapons. The engine graphic looks pretty messy [ sorry ); ] but overall it's pretty cool. It is a balanced plug and it is actually a little weaker than most warships, but at least it's not a cheat. By StarBound (my first [submitted] plug-in). Made for Macintosh computers.

3198.title: Death Star! (Win)
3198.author: TheBondMan
3198.description: My first plug. It adds the Death Star as a ship (priced at 2M) to all planets with a tech level of 3 and up and is complete with all graphics and descriptions. Included also is the classic Death Star Destruction Beam that destroys all ships instantly, which is available to buy for any ship in the outfitter priced 1M. [Win Version]

1369.title: WINstartwithanyship2
1369.author: Anonymous
1369.description: NOW FOR WINDOWS! Made by the same guy who made the first Startwithanyship, and the original mac SWAS. This new version is bigger, badder and a MUST HAVE. Features Include: [-] 200+ NOVA Ships Variants. That's 150 more than the original! [-] 5 Million Credits in the beginning, as opposed to the 2 Million in the previous version! [-] Start off With a "Frightening" Combat Rating! [-] Variant names as seen on NPC's. Simply choose the ship you want when creating a new file under "Background" and Go! Then, when you're done, REMOVE THE PLUG. It's that easy. Any Questions? Contact me at my new e-mail bassman2k4@yahoo.com

1197.title: CashMoney
1197.author: Anonymous
1197.description: For you Windows users that have been trying all these plug-ins to get credits and haven't had luck! Yes, that's right, the first plug-in for Windows that will give you credits for a mission (that I have found). All you have to do is pop it in the plug-ins folder, select the mission "blood money", go to the red arrow to pick up the cargo, then go back to the system you came from and land. You get something around 11M credits. I know it says you only get 15,000 at the mission computer but trust me, you get 11M when the mission is complete. Any comments you can Email me at Natewillard@hotmail.com and try to have the subject EV related cause I get a lot of junk mail. Thanks, and you're welcome.

1202.title: CRAZY
1202.author: Anonymous
1202.description: This is my first plug.  It increases the amount of hellhounds you can buy.  Other 'insignificant' changes include modifying the way the fed turrets fire, the light/medium blaster, the FPC's and the incredible mining blaster.  Word of advice: Stay well away from anything with hellhounds and mining blasters...

1209.title: Disablo Beam 2
1209.author: Anonymous
1209.description:
The new and improved Disablo Beam is now avalable.  It seemed that the origanal caused problems, messed up the torpedos, caused people to grow extra limbs(Disablo Radiation).

So if you have a problem with the new Disablo Beam 2.0 blame the Russians by emailing me at chillin_mickey@yahoo.com

1221.title: Fast Start
1221.author: Anonymous
1221.description: This is my first plugin, (released to public). All it does  is let you start off with a raven and 900 million credits.  I do not know if it is compatible with other plugins. Sorry, no windows version!

1230.title: Good Starts v1.0
1230.author: Anonymous
1230.description: This is a simple plugin, giving you a choice of 7 characters to play with, the standard game, a trader character, two combat characters, or three cheater starts.  This is for those of us who consider "quick starts" to be starting with 50k credits and a Starbridge, not 100 billion credits and an Unrelenting.  Note that this plugin will not work on Windows versions 1.0.7 and below because of a problem with chär resources.  It is not compatible with other plugins that add chär resources. Mispeled1@yahoo.com

1282.title: Pirate Hunter
1282.author: Anonymous
1282.description: Pirate Hunter Is piloting a souped up thunderforge with a lot of weapons.  Too many exstras to list. Almost invincable (hard ship to fight :)).  Trade in is over 1,000,000,000 and have over 1,000,000,000 credits in bank. Have fun :).

1284.title: Pirate Hunter II folder
1284.author: Anonymous
1284.description: Hi This is my second Pirate Hunter pilot file. This ship can take on the Captain Hector Starbridge it can not win, nor can Captain Hector destroy Pirate Hunter II. This pilot file comes with pilotlog.txt, and pictures of it fighting the Captain Hector ship, using 50 Winter Tempests and other weapons. This pilot file may work on EV Nova 1.0.5. It has more armor, missiles, better shields than, Pirate Hunter, it also has a little over 2,500,000.00 million credits in the bank. Some of the Weapons this ship has can give the game invincible ships a real hard time From Robert e-mail Robert00002@aol.com

1289.title: PluginFunding
1289.author: Anonymous
1289.description:
Got a brand new plugin to test out, but all your pilots are either dirt poor or can't access your missions? Don't like the idea of working 8 hours through the game to get to the point where you can test it out? This plugin offers plugin testing pilots grants of 9,999,999 credits to buy equipment. Specially designed with the fledgling plugin designer in mind!
Remember: it is not a "cheat", it is a "plugin testing enhancement device". -Mike Lemmer

1309.title: Reloads Plug-in
1309.author: Anonymous
1309.description: I am uploading this Plug-in for friend. It has outfits regular and the Shield Recharger  Overdrive stuff like that. It can be used with EVN versions 1.0.0 through 1.0.5. My E-mail is RobertPhoenix978@aol.com This plug cannot put more than two light blasters on a shuttle.

1327.title: SP-evadepiracy.sit
1327.author: Anonymous
1327.description: If you've ever been stuck in a mission because Pirates or Marauders are attacking you, this plugin's for you. Whilst the plugin is active, all pirate ships are disabled, allowing you to reach your destination easier. This is not intended as a cheat plugin, although it can be used as one. created by SaaciPlank.

1340.title: SuperCheats
1340.author: Anonymous
1340.description: This is my set of cheats.  It comes with SuperMoney (new version that works) and SuperShips.  SuperShips makes the Kestral buyable anywhere for cheep.  It also adds the Ultra Starbridge.  SuperMoney makes a mission availible in the mission computer that gets you a LOT of $$$$.  Questions, comments: CeRD@mac.com.

1342.title: SuperCheats2.1
1342.author: Anonymous
1342.description: The real update to SuperCheats...this plugin (now just one plugin) fixes several bugs, now allows you to buy the kestral anywhere, and also now adds the Ultra Manta (works now).  For those of you who don't know along with these other things metioned above this plugin adds the Ultra Starbridge and the mission SuperMoney.  Enjoy!  Questions...Comments...Advice?  CeRD@mac.com

1343.title: SuperCheats2.2
1343.author: Anonymous
1343.description: Well ladies and gentlemen...i finally got this thing figured out.  Everything this thing is suposed to do it does...it has a very profitable mission, makes the kestral availible, and makes 2 ultraships availible.  If you want me to add a new ultraship to this plug (any kind of ship only really strong) just send me the name of the ship you want.  My email is CeRD@mac.com (took me lang enough to get this simple plug right eh?)

1345.title: SuperCheats2.4
1345.author: Anonymous
1345.description: This is a very cool new version of SuperCheats.  It addes 2 ships from the original EV.  I also felt that this plug needed some originality so I modeled and added a Borg Cube to the list of ships by request.  If you want to add a ship to this plug-in please email me the ship you want...CeRD@mac.com.  I hope you enjoy this new version of SuperCheats.

1376.title: Ally and Enemy Chart
1376.author: Anonymous
1376.description: This is an Excel Spreadsheet with all of the Classes, Allies and Enemies listed.  This makes things a bit easier when trying to set up your new gvt.  You can find me at http://evnova.ontheweb.com.

1383.title: Boolean.sit
1383.author: Anonymous
1383.description: This file was made to explain some of the confusing parts of the EVN Bible.  Comments and Suggestions as well as corrections should be posted in the forums.  Do not e-mail me.

1391.title: EV Nova Bible.sit
1391.author: Anonymous
1391.description: This is an HTML version of the EV Nova Bible. It features a table of contents, internal links to resources, and easily readable text. Included are links for iCab, Internet Explorer, and Netscape, but the files can be dragged to any browser for viewing. By Bacchus Freeware/Publishing (John 'Talos' Krauss) version 1.0. Distributed with permission from andrew. Questions, suggestions, and comments should be emailed to talos@bacchusfreeware.com.

1392.title: EV Nova Documentation
1392.author: Anonymous
1392.description: This Stuffit archive has the EV Nova documentation and Nova Preambles, all in PDF format.  These are all included with the full release version of the game -- they are available here separately merely for those who wish to download the documentation alone.

1401.title: EVN Plugin Helper
1401.author: Anonymous
1401.description:
This is a list which shows the ID number of all weapons and ships from an unmodified version of EV:Nova. I Have found it very useful when making plugins. E-Mail me At     Sephiroth_Nova@hotmail.com
-Lord Tekk

1406.title: EVNovaPreambleseBook
1406.author: Anonymous
1406.description:
Escape Velocity Preambles Palm Reader eBook

This is a Palm Reader (should work in either the free or Pro version) eBook version of the Escape Velocity Nova Preambles. The Palm Reader is available for the PalmOS, PocketPC, Mac, and Windows OSes from: http://www.palmdigitalmedia.com. Please send any comments or suggestions to: joelsanda@mac.com / http://homepage.mac.com/joelsanda.

1410.title: modtypandmodvallist
1410.author: Anonymous
1410.description: This is a list wich contains a lot of numbers of mod types and their modval. its specially for those which are programming outfit (not weapon) plug-ins with the missioncomputer 2.2 . if you detect any faults please contact me at FabianFroehlich@gmx.de .

1411.title: NCBGuidev100
1411.author: Anonymous
1411.description: This text file tells you which mission bits are used by the default campaign of EV:N and which ones aren't. Extremely useful for choosing mission bits to use for your own plugins without interfering with the ones already used. -by Mike Lemmer (mikelemmer@hotmail.com)

1419.title: ResUsedList v1.0.6.txt
1419.author: Anonymous
1419.description:
A complete list of all resources IDs used by the standard scenario of EV:Nova v1.0.6 . Text format.
(Nova Control Bits - bööm - chär - cicn - cölr - crön - csüm - dësc - düde - flët - govt - ïntf - mïsn - nëbu - öops - öutf - përs - PICT - ppat - ränk - rle8 - rleD - roïd - shän - snd  - spïn - spöb - STR - syst - ttab - usro - vers - wëap)
Created by STraven.

1435.title: 102VellosOutfitFix.sit
1435.author: Anonymous
1435.description: This fixes a problem in EV:N 1.0.2 where some outfits, such as missile launchers, would be purchasable on non-Federation planets even if you were flying a Vell-os ship.  Created by Beamup.  Comments, bug reports, etc. should be sent to stclark@kualumni.org.  Version 1.0.0, released Oct. 2 2002

1474.title: arrow desc fix.bin
1474.author: Anonymous
1474.description: This incredibly simple plug-in addresses a very minor issue that I'm sure almost nobody cares about. Someone noticed a typo in the description for the Vell-os Arrow (it has an extra "the"). This plug-in adresses that issue, removing the extra "the". Yeah, I don't see why you'd want it unless you're a perfectionist like me, but just in case. This will work on both Mac and Windows. Windows users, just expand the .zip and drop the .bin on the converter. By Brian "orcaloverbri9" Norwood, who, as you can see, has no life. Email me at orcaloverbri9@spymac.com.

1482.title: aurorankiller.sit
1482.author: Anonymous
1482.description: This is the third of the "killer" Plug-ins for NOVA. Here you are put up against many Auroran ships. Are you capable of standing up against a giant fleet? I advise you to be expecting the worst if you want to use this. Note: They will only attack you if you attack tham or if you are an enemy. Contact me at stephen_donahue@mac.com to report bugs or if you want to ask any questions. Enjoy! This was tested on EVNOVA version 1.0.7.

1485.title: Balance.sit
1485.author: Anonymous
1485.description:
Has Nova become too easy for you, even in "Strict Play" mode?  Do you obliterate every Capital ship in sight with your Class A Starbridge?  Are you looking for more of a challenge with a larger reward?  Then Balance may be just what you are looking for.  Balance beefs up most ships (especially Capital ships) and prices them accordingly.  It enhances weapon speed and accuracy (especially missiles), and modifies various government parameters (reward/penalty, skill multiplier and others).  Balance is recommended for the seasoned player whose skill level is high and who may be getting a tad bored.

Note:  Both the Mac version and PC .rez files are included.

1488.title: Balances Additions v2.sit
1488.author: Anonymous
1488.description: Hello, this is my first released mod for EVN. This will balance out blaster power and add two new outfits, the Superheavy Blaster turret and a good generation unit. The prices aren't low and the ton space required isn't low either, so in my opinion it's not cheating. The Fed Destroyer also now has a max of 4 turrets and the Fed Carrier disables at 10%. This version makes the Fusion Pulse Battery shots faster but have less reach. You can send any comments to me (Jason) at jwillie194@netscape.net.

1499.title: BetterPirateFix1.0
1499.author: Anonymous
1499.description: After finding that the other Pirate Fix solved the crash at Rebel II, but made many other problems, I created this. The only drawback I can find is that Tomak doesn't really outfit your ship with the Ion Dissipator but you still have access to it in the outfitter on Rebel II. Version 1.0. White Fire

1505.title: BlasterBalance.sit
1505.author: Anonymous
1505.description: If you're like me, you find the fed blasters are all but useless, compared to certain other weapons. ) This plug makes them weigh a little less, and do a bit more damage, with a slightly longer range.

1509.title: Cant Buy
1509.author: Anonymous
1509.description: This is more of a developers plug.  Prevents the user from buying any outfits in the regular game if bit 9997 is set.  This will be useful if you have a plug that adds organic ships to the game that can't mount regular weapons.  Made by Stephen.  Email me at sec222@mac.com.

1518.title: Cheaper Missiles 1.0
1518.author: Anonymous
1518.description:
This little plugin makes all of the missiles/rockets in Nova cheaper!
I didn't make them much cheaper, but now you can at least afford to fire them at your foes.

1520.title: ChooseThread
1520.author: Anonymous
1520.description:
With this plugin installed, you can choose which thread you want to follow, and only that thread will be offered to your pilot. Choosing "none" should allow normal gameplay.

Superficially tested (sorry -- there's only one of me) let me know how it works for you.

1525.title: classic warning
1525.author: Anonymous
1525.description: Classic Warning allows you to use EV and EVO's warning animation instead of Nova's. Why you would want to, I don't know, as I prefer EVN's, but hey, I'm just providing options here. Done by EVula.

1558.title: Desc Fixer
1558.author: Anonymous
1558.description: The solution to 99% of the typos you will encounter in Escape Velocity: Nova! Dësc Fixer fixes typos, grammatical errors, or other problems in over 60 of EV Nova's dësc resources. NB: I have not fully tested this plug-in with EVN 1.0.6. I've spent hours in ResEdit making sure my plug-in (which was started back in the days of EVN 1.0) doesn't overlap fixes in later EVN releases or create other problems, but I can't be sure I didn't miss something. Please report problems to william@route26.com

1561.title: DisabledPluginsFolders.sit
1561.author: Anonymous
1561.description: You will have noticed that in any of the EV series, a disabled plugins folder is never supplied, here i have created some icons which will help you distinguish between the plugins folder and the disabled plugins folder. Use it for almost any EVN folder you wish to create as all the icons stay with the theme of EVN

1568.title: DragonsTeeth.sit
1568.author: Anonymous
1568.description: Dragon's Teeth is a small plugin I designed to test out the submunition capabilities of EVN. I can't guarantee that this plug plays well with others, but I tried to use RIDs others probably wouldn't use. Brought to you by Clone Software, Enjoy.

1569.title: Drones .sit
1569.author: Anonymous
1569.description:
Drones v1

This just adds a few new weapons and the ships for the ones that are bays. It's probably incompatible with other plugins. It is actually somewhat balanced. Questions and comments to bjlhct  at yahoo dot com. Do whatever you want with it, as long as I get credit somewhere.

1578.title: Escape Pod inertailess
1578.author: Anonymous
1578.description: Escape Pod inertialess version is a plugin created by me, KarTaniK, that will alow you, the player, to control your escape pod once its ejected.  this plug comes in two version, the other being Freeflight.  just read the document enclosed with the plug for details and you'll be controlling where you land in no time.  have fun, and if you have any questions, you can contact me at kartanik@yahoo.com

1579.title: Escape Pod Ship
1579.author: Anonymous
1579.description: This is a plug that lets you buy an escape pod as a ship.  It is a planet type ship meaning it can only be hit by planet's weapons.  It is very weak and cheap (15,000 credits) .  Email me at sec222@mac.com for questions and comments.

1597.title: EVCShields.sit
1597.author: Anonymous
1597.description: Shield "bubbles" for EV Classic, taken from the factory ship graphics.  Colored for govts (red = rebel, blue = confed, gray = everything else).  Very good looking, esp. on large (48x48+) ships.  EVO and EVN Shields to come soon (maybe tomorrow).  If there are any bugs, email highmotu@cox.net (I've tested it fairly well).  Also comments and suggestions are welcome.  NOTE:  This includes the "Red Escort Carrier" fix from EV Novarized by Michael Judkins.  Mac tested ONLY.

1602.title: EVN3DGrafix1.0
1602.author: Anonymous
1602.description: This is my first attempt to create a plug-in.  Basically, all the plug-in really does is replace the default "red target" graphics with ones in full color.  I took the Shipyard graphics, removed the background gradient, rotated, and scaled it down to size.  Contact Trystan Creed with suggestions, comments, etc. (trystan.creed@verizon.net).  Version 1.0. Released October, 13 2003.

1608.title: EVNBank 1-0-0a1.sit
1608.author: Anonymous
1608.description:
This plugin allows people to deposit credits in a bank safely away from pirates.
You can DEPOSIT: Go to the outfitters and buy a Bank x million outfit.
Or WITHDRAW: Go to the Mission BBS and accept a mission saying Withdraw x million.     By  patrick -- (: a z d a r a :)  Version 1.0.0a1.
This plug-in is NOT complete and is being posted for testing purposes. e-mail bug reports/suggestions to e-mail address in the "Readme.txt" file.

1612.title: EVNovaStarbridgeOSXIcon.sit
1612.author: Anonymous
1612.description: As others have said before, the default EV Nova icon is a bit too boxy to look good in the dock. Other EV Nova icons I found didn't quite have the particular look I was after, so I knocked up my own. There's not all that much between this one and and some others out there, let's be honest, but I prefer it for what it's worth. Heck, maybe you will too, and it's only a teeny weeny download. Might go try some other ships now... Starbridge image tweaked about a bit by Adam Wilde (HenryBurton).

1614.title: EVO-EVN Fixes Patch
1614.author: Anonymous
1614.description: EV0-EVN Fixes Patch 1.0.0 is designed to "correct" minor little things in the EVO total conversion for EVN..  Basically, it modifies a few missions, ships, govts, outfits, and weapons.  As an added bonus for EVO fans, it also adds weapon exits to most ships, as well as particle effects for most weapons.  Also in there are a couple very minor new secrets.. look for yourself. )  Mac version only.  Please report any errors to: lthr@post.com

1635.title: FedRavenFix.sit
1635.author: Anonymous
1635.description:
Are you playing the Fed story line, and have accepted the mission to "Destroy the Polaris Raven", but the Raven never shows up? Or do you know that you will encounter this problem soon? Fear not! This plug fixes everything :-)
Mail me at jmvenstad@mac.com if there is anything.
- Josse

1638.title: Firestorm 1.0.0
1638.author: Anonymous
1638.description: This plug-in adds a new weapon to Nova. Beware! It is extremely dangerous and should only be used in the most dire of circumstances... Unless, that is, you have a fast ship... Made by P-Psycho. Enjoy! E-mail any questions or comments to parrypmp@earthlink.net.

1639.title: Firestorm 1.0.5
1639.author: Anonymous
1639.description: This is an update of my Firestorm plugin. It adds one new weapon to EVN which is very powerful, but very dangerous, as well. Use it wisely, or you may find yourself dead, or worse...

1670.title: GefjonFix 1-1-0b1.sit
1670.author: Anonymous
1670.description: This plug-in makes the opal trade route in the Gefjon system harder by adding more pirates and putting a larger gap in between the planets. For those people who want more challenge :). This plug-in is known to clash with Planet Killer Deluxe.   By  patrick  (: a z d a r a :)

1681.title: Grav. Boom
1681.author: Anonymous
1681.description:
This small plug adds a green/cyan FPC bööm for the Gravimetric Missile. Made with NovaTools and Photoshop. Mac version only.
e-mail:rodger@sutherland-studios.com.au

1682.title: GraviticWeapons.sit
1682.author: Anonymous
1682.description:
This plugin introduces two new weapons. The Hypermine and Antimine. The Hypermine is a stationary bomb which gravitationally attracts ships. The antimine repels them. The Hypermine will pin any ship to a point, making them vunerable to your attacks. The Antimine produces an impassable barrier to all but your ship. Use with caution, they both severly confuse the computer AI.
Created by: Quantum Transcendence

1712.title: HypergateAccess
1712.author: Anonymous
1712.description: Purchase the "Hypergate Access" item as an outfit for your ship, and you will gain immediate access to the Hypergate system. Sell the item, and you will lose access to the Hypergate system. -JB

1762.title: LibertyCenter101
1762.author: Anonymous
1762.description:

For those who don't know, Liberty Center adds a new ship, an Enhanced Kestrel, which fixes some problems and upgrades some weapons. It also adds a new powerful weapon called the Positron Torpedo, which can take on capital ships with ease.

1771.title: LWD
1771.author: Anonymous
1771.description:
This is a plugin I made about a year ago and my testers finally got back to me, so here it is.  It adds three new missions and a new ship, simple huh?
Well I thought I might as well let others play it (I think its pretty good for an eleven year old)
-Starbridge42

1778.title: Maelstrom1.1.sit

1785.title: MarkV v1.0b.sit

By Tazian

1786.title: MassAdditions.sit

1809.author: Anonymous
1809.description: The mod starbridge is an excellent combat vessel. It has a total of 77 tons of weapon space, good shields and armor, and two mean looking guns on the sides. This plug changes the inherrant AI to type 3, so that you can use it to get the Auroran offshoot missions, some of which require a non-cargo ship. Comments/Questions to Azratax@aznt.com or AIM Azratax

I have been working on other peoples plug-ins plus my own and this is the first time in a while I am abile to upload one. From Robert W.my e-mail is Robert00002@aol.com This plug took two weeks to make and test.

1836.title: NewGovernmentv1.sit
1836.author: Anonymous

Perhaps there also appear a new nebula and four different missions.
From Space Junkie.

1842.title: NoMoreDrain
1842.author: Anonymous
1842.description: This is a simple plug-in that fixes the annoying fuel drain issue with the Vell-os weapons. Vell-os weapons drain fuel even when they're not being fired, which becomes noticable if you switch from a Vell-os ship to a normal ship without inherent fuel generation. This plug-in stops the constant fuel drain.

1850.title: Novicons

1850.description: Here are some icons for your desktop based on Nova ships. Addons Moderator Note: Yes, this isn't a plugin, but I didn't know where else to put it. shrug

This would effect 3 kinds of fighter bays, as well as certain nifty gadgets that you receive as rewards in the story lines.

These plugins should be compatible with anything that doesn't alter the pre-existing EVN version 1.0.0 ship resources. Created by EVula (www.evula.com).

1929.title: Psyonic trading engine

This is a beta version of a windows plugin that I made... I do not know how to compress the file for windows... her eis the UNSTUFFED version of it... I would like someone to help me beta test this. I would be happy of I got some feedback as to wheather this works.

1948.title: RebellionVell-osFix F.sit
1948.author: Anonymous
1948.description: This plug-in allows Merrol or any other Rebellion planet to be bribed. This will help people in these mission strings that are locked out of a vital planet. Created by Squall.

1954.title: ReCycle
1954.author: Anonymous
1954.description: Okay, what this plugin does is make a mission in the BBS, named "Restart".  Once accepted, most of your money will be taken away, and you will be given a new ship, a modified Heavy Shuttle.  I did this so that you pretty much wouldn't "start" the game with a kestrel or an Unrelenting.  If the demand is high, I could make it so that you don't lose your ship, or your money, or both, but then it would probably be considered a cheater plug.  Upon Restarting, you should be able to go to a bar and get missions again.  You will keep any Ranks that you had previously, so if in your first game you had the hypergate codes, you'll keep them after restarting your missions.

1958.title: RegenPlugR.W.
1958.author: Anonymous
1958.description: Hi, this my fuel Regen plug you can put it in the plug-ins folder when your got no power and stuck in a system, I wanted to make the plug fair charge rate is 120 1/4 of a solar panel for most ships so if you got the time you can save your pilot file and you can get a solar panel for faster charge. This is not a cheat plug, not at charge rate 120. Plug is for 1.0.7. Robert00002@aol.com If you use caps lock it will charge 2 times faster.

1965.title: Reset Missions v10pub
1965.author: Anonymous
1965.description: The latest Update to Reset Missions including some mission changes and Side strings reset ability to reset or not reset them.

1966.title: Reset Missions v9

1966.description: Reset Missions v9 this is the latest update to my plug hopefully with most of the bugs fixed and all the bits cleared.. please remove all previous versions and read the Readme!!

1971.title: ReturnToS7evyn.sit
1971.author: Anonymous
1971.description: This plug-in does what it sounds like. It allows you to return to the S7evyn system that you get to when you beat the game. If you havent beat the game, it makes the system visible and still allows you to get there. Instructions: Go to Kania and go through the hypergate. You will see a link to S7evyn. When you get there, there is a hypergate that you can use to get back.

This plug-in is meant to be humorous, although the ships and weapons aren't half bad. [email hidden by request of author]

1984.title: RewardShipsV2.0.sit
1984.author: Anonymous
1984.description: This plugin adds one new "reward" ship for each of the six mission strings as well as four other "ships" that are available at the end of any string. All are found on the ATMOS planet at the end of the string. This is for people who want something new and different to go conquor the galaxy in after a mission string. This is version 2.0.  This version adds one new "reward" outfit as well as fixes bugs.  This plug now works with 1.0.1.  It is not compatable with any other plugins that modify the existing EVN ships or adds new ones. It is compatable with fixes and new targets. Version 2.0 released on 6/11/02. E-mail MacDevil at AGS848@AOL.com with comments!

1991.title: RR.sit

2026.title: ShipvariantsInteri
2026.author: Anonymous
2026.description: This is a plug that makes all Ship Variant ships interialless. All i did was make them interialless and nothing else. Have fun. And if you don't know what interialless is, it makes all ships just stop instead of making the ship turn first.

Please e-mail me with questions or comments.

2043.description: Slayer is a plug that adds a ship for each string at the bonus planet.  I did not make any of the ships so powerful that they can kill everything without worry, but they are somewhat well armed.  This version of Slayer fixes the bugs and adds descriptions for all the ships and the weapon.  Please e-mail me, StormyNight, with questions or comments at JoeyHiii@aol.com.

2045.title: SmallChangesPlug 1.O.O
2045.author: Anonymous
2045.description: Basically all this pugin does is add one pers, one govt, and changes the icons you see around ships and stellars when you select them. The download counter doesn't work because there is a space in the file name a good reason why people should read the instructions and NOT put them there, eh? )

2052.title: SP-FriendlyAurorans.sit
2052.author: Anonymous
2052.description: This Plugin Is one in the series of Plugins by Saaci Plank, that makes certain races less hostile. They no longer randomly attack you when you enter their system. If they are causing you problems, then this is the perfect plugin series. This particular plugin prevents Aurorans suddenly turning hostile and attacking out of their own free will. The Governments affected are: Aurorans, and all houses of Aurora. Download the others in the series, but don't use them all at once, it could be considered cheating.

2061.title: SP-SigmaAndSaaciPlank.sit

2066.title: SpaceJunkiesOutfitenab.sit

2070.title: SpeederUpper1.0.0.sit

2071.title: SpeederUpper1.0.1.sit

2071.description: This is a very simple plugin that I made because I was so bored always holding the (default) j button for hyper-jumping from system to system. Well this plugin takes care of it because with just one jump you can travel for 25 systems instead of just one. And fixed a huge bug.

2111.title: TheChallenge.sea

2121.title: Tracker Blaster

1981.description: This plugin is for Starfleet Adventures. It lets you reverse your engines if your ship is capable of reversing engines. It will work on a mac. Made by Nil'kimas. Contact me at daprice@mac.com.

1528.title: CloakHunter
1528.author: Anonymous
1528.description:
In October of 2003, I found a way for a guided weapon in Nova to track down cloaked ships. This plug-in was created for the benefit of plug-in developers who want to make use of this allowing them to both see how the resources are set up to do it, and to see it in operation in Nova. It takes advantage of how a weapon's "Submunitions fire at nearest target" flag functions. It should be noted that this type of weapon will be able to turn instantly to always face its target, instead of curving as most guided weapons will. If you play it, you'll be able to buy a "Hunter Carrier" at any outfitter. If you then go to the Sol system, you'll find it full of pirate gövt wraiths. I've set the missile and the Wraith (adult) ships so that two hits should finish them. Just start shooting. Currently for Mac.
Eugene-Chin@excite.com

1331.title: Start As Polaris
1331.author: Anonymous
1331.description: From the same guy who brought you Start As An Auroran, brings you Start As A Polaris. This simply starts you off with a Manta, 50,000 and hypergate codes. Any questions,  comments, bug reports, or more death threats, please contact alexcavalier42@yahoo.com. By: A-Dawg. Thanks!

1701.title: HGsolAndJourneysEnd.sit
1701.author: Anonymous
1701.description: This add-ons creates the Sol Hypergate and the Journey's End Hypergate. It also regenerate the Rigel HG. In the Folder you find the EV-Nova HG Map!  by magicroot (nicky@nosrelo.it)

2072.title: Spinning Weapons
2072.author: Anonymous
2072.description: Another plugin created by the JoshTigerheart's department of utterly useless plugs.  What this plug does is make every non-beam non-fighter weapon in the game spin around endlessly.  Yes!  Now you can watch them spin and spin until you pass out from becoming dizzy.  Past visual effects, this plug does nothing.  Should be compatible with most other plugs due to its absurd simplicity.  Send questions/comments/bug reports/mindless rambling to:  TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com.  This plug was made with EVNew so therefore is in Windows format.  Mac users must convert it to run.

1211.title: Dragon H-K eval
1211.author: Anonymous
1211.description:
Dragon Hunter/Killer v0.1

Preliminary release of the Dragon H/K plugin. This plugin adds a new ship, the Dragon Hunter/Killer, to the game. The Dragin H/K is a significantly more lethal version of the Polaris Dragon, packing 2 CPLs, a cloaking device and a pair of mantas, as well as some other outfits. Tread carefully though the AI has them too. This release does not include descriptions. A later version will have descriptions and more balances and refinements, but feel free to enjoy this fully-functional plugin today. Due to an overwhelming number of stupid emails from people wo failed to read the readme in my other plugins, you will need to READ IT before you can access the plugin.  Plugin for WINDOWS by Cunjo MobiusM1@gmail.com

1299.description: Poof's Cargo Run is a plug-in that adds one mission. This mission is available at random Mission BBS all around Federation space. The mission is obviously a cargo run which has you bring some cargo to some random place in Fed space and when you return you get 250,000 credits. This plug-in was submitted by Poofy107. For Mac PC users will need a converter. This is my first plug. Send Comments/Feedback/Bug Reports to thedorkcheese@yahoo.com

~The Dork Cheese

1307.title: RebelStarbridgeClassCBay
1307.author: Anonymous
1307.description:
This is my first plug-in, something I made cause I got bored of having Rebel Viper's mince at my enemies.  The new Rebel Starbridge Class C Bay can hold 2 Rebel Starbridges and only weighs 70 tons with a price tag of 5 Million.  You get the bay when you are able to get the other rebel bays in the REBEL STORYLINE.

This is an alpha plug, but it works fine with 500 other plugs and it does what is expected.  I may soon add Rebel Thunderhead Bays, Modify the Federation Bays so that they weigh less and they can hold more fighters, and the Nil'kimas Manta bay.  But not yet.

Even though its in an hqx, its available for windows only so convert it.

Email me at volvov@gmail.com, and I'm dthsqd in the EVNova.net forums.

1178.title: Alien Specialty Pack
1178.author: Anonymous
1178.description: I think this is the last idea not used for a plug in (maybe not, I'm not sure) but it works!  Ever notice you can't board an alien ship and any time you use a plug where you can get one you can't put human technology on it??? Well this plug fixes that problem!  You can now board/capture/buy/put human technology on wraiths, krypt pods, and hyperoids! And the two wraith planets are now landable!  Thats where you get all this cool stuff(but its not cheap).  by zapp, email me at mbelins1@hotmail.com, for WINDOWS only.

Now you can get two types of wraith cannons, two types of Polaron Torp tubes and two types of Multi-Torp tubes.  Now you have a choice between fire by cloak weapons and not fire by cloak weapons, since each have their advantages/disadvantages.  Plug-in made by dthsqd.  Email me at volvov@gmail.com.

1252.description: This is a plugin that makes it so if you want to have warship levitathan you cna buy an upgrade that costs ten million to give you 4000 tons of weapon space and 20 guns and turrets for 3500 tons of cargo space requires the first sigma mission. Made by da bill email at noobeverlasting@hotmail.com( not an origanal idea their is another plug that makes it so you can buy a levitathan warship but this is different)also first plug but try it isn't a mega cheat but works.  Hint you have to use shear firepower to keep from dying from weak shield strength

1366.author: Anonymous
1366.description: This plug-in is very useful during gameplay. It makes warships and other ships able to be hit by point defense systems, i.e. Storm Chaingun. This plug-in also makes it so you after you have completed the Vell-os string, you can buy and rename your Javelin without getting a weaker ship. 1714.title: HyperGatePass1.0
1714.author: Anonymous
1714.description:
HyperGate Pass Version 1.0 Released 27/05/2005 by ZX99 - ASH

This is a Plug-In for EVNova v1.0.6 for Windows.
To use with MacNova you will need to convert the .rez file.
I have not tested this on MacNova, I do not know if it works with MacNova.
The .zip should contain HyperGatePassv1.0.rez and ReadMev1.0.rtf
HyperGatePass creates 4 new outfits:
4 Day HyperGate Pass, 30 Day HyperGate Pass, 1 Year HyperGate Pass, Lifetime HyperGate Pass

Each Pass grants access to the HyperGate System for the amount of time it says in the description.
After that time, the Pass is removed and access is canceled. You will need to purchase the Pass again.
A message is displayed when the pass Expires, however it is easy to miss.
The Lifetime pass lasts forever, it does not expire, and is therefore very expensive.
Any questions, comments, concerns, or bugs please email AndrewASheridan@gmail.com with EVNOVA in the subject.

1627.title: extra weapons and upgrades

1627.description: This is my first plug-in, which adds 6 new weapons: anti-fighter defence system, energy missle system, force blaster, ionization blaster, medium-heavy blaster, and the medium-heavy blaster turret. This plug-in also adds 3 new outfits: the anti-matter propulsion system, heavy armor, and a ship addition.  This is not meant to be a cheat plug-in.  This plug-in was created by phyco with power.  If you have comments or suggestions about this plug-in, email me at phyco_with_power@yahoo.com .  Hope you enjoy this plug-in.

PSOCringe@comcast.net, be sure to put "Nova" in the subject or i will just delete it. Also, include the name of the plugin you are referring to if a specific plugin is involved. This will simplify matters for me greatly. Thanks!

1856.description: The Old Plug-ins References plug-in clears some of the problems with opening a pilot that had some added outfits and/or weapons, but the plug-in is no longer present. Just a set of empty outf and weap resources in the normally empty areas, it effectively erases the problem of that white dialog about missing plug-ins. Made with EVNEW and WinNova 1.0.6 Works with other versions, although it may interfere with plug-ins as long as it's in the plug-ins folder with them. Mac users need the plug-in converter. 2273.title: ViewRLE
2273.author: Anonymous
2273.description: ViewRLE is a simple application that allows you to view the rlë8 and rlëD resources of a file, such as the ships, weapons and planets of EV Nova. It is simple enough to be used by the average Nova player, and is useful for the plug-in developer/artist as a fast way to check the rlës and how they will combine in-game (for instance, the ship with its running lights and engine glow). ViewRLE is completely free of charge, and its source code is public for everyone to see and tinker with. You're encouraged to redistribute it with its source code to whoever you want.  This 1.0.1 version has been recompiled as a Universal binary, with a few bug fixes along the way no new feature to speak of.  ViewRLE only works on Macs (OS9 and OSX native, Universal), sorry for Windows users. You can contact me as Zacha Pedro on the boards, or with the email found in the ReadMe. OS9 users should make sure they have the latest Stuffit Expander for their system (7.0.3) in order to unstuff the sitx archive.

1538.description: The Teaser Sub-Department of Josh Tigerheart's Department of Total Conversions brings you a teaser for Colosseum TC.  No, this doesn't mean its even close to being ready for beta, let alone release.  Instead, this means I've decided to give you a very small (and I do mean small) taste of what Colosseum will be like.  Keep in mind while playing it that most of the TC, not including what hasn't been developed in it, is absent.  Also, you'll need Absolute Minimum to play this plug, see the readme for details.  Finally, this is released as is.  There will be no future updates to this teaser, and all bugs, if any, present in it will not be fixed for a 1.1 Teaser.  Questions, comments, want to tell me how to color my name in Redline?  Send an email to the address in the readme.

2003.title: Secondary CPL

Made by Pearce, you can contact me here : bob.styxrun@laposte.net

2136.title: useful plug pack
2136.author: Anonymous
2136.description: This plug pack is a single .rez file made by Alphakiller that makes three basic changes to the game.  1)it adds a space station right next to earth that can change your paint job to one of any 14 colors. 2)adds a new outfit that makes you inertialess for a cost of 500000 credits, 10 tons of mass space, and a constant fuel drain. 3)it changes the missiles and projectiles to primary weapons, so they will fire when space bar is pressed.  The last one is the one i find most useful so i dont have to worry about changing secondarys in the middle of a fleet battle, and ships with multiple types of missiles against you no longer have the advantage, for you can do the same thing...   for windows users, email me at freerandomemail@yahoo.com for comments.  This is NOT a cheat, but puts balance to the game, and adds to the gaming experience.
