1180.title: All Weaons and Outfits
1180.author: Anonymous
1180.description: This plug-in allows you to buy ANY weapon or outfit you want at almost any outfitter, as long as you have the credits. Some of the Federation technology requires a Navy Clearance thing, so it would be a good idea to use this with my License to Life plug-in. Hope you enjoy it, made by X'arnor, feedback is appreciated.

1942.title: RandomFireWeapon
1942.author: Anonymous
1942.description: This is an interesting effect in EV: Nova that causes a weapon to fire random weapon animations that were used in the system, so it would fire railgun blasts, FPC pulses, lasers, missiles, rockets, you name it.  Mainly a joke, released with encouragment from multiple people on the EV Developers Board.  It should be compatible with nearly all plugins, as it uses the highest possible ID's, as well as being rather small.  Both mac and windows versions are included in this package, so no need to convert anything.  Have fun!

3193.title: Ultra-Space
3193.author: Pyrobot
3193.description:
My second plug-in submitted. Also works with the latest Plug pack. This is another cheat. Good for people who want to outfut that modE starbridge with 500 guns... Or want to carry 30K tons of goods, without escorts. Probably the worst cheat you could ever really have, as you can turn any ship into an ultra. This does more than space, but you'll have to look at it to find out. MAC plug. So you'll have to download a converter if you use a PC. Neener neeener...

--Pyrobot.

Quespertarian@yahoo.com E-mail me about suggestions and bugs. (There shouldn't be any.)

3206.title: bigboynovaoveride.zip
3206.author: NUthaniel
3206.description: This is a plug in for nova override it has some cool ships, weapons, and outfits.

3229.title: More Bays
3229.author: Admiral Slathkill II
3229.description: More bays adds docks for several medium ships (Starbridge, Mod Starbridge, Rebel Starbridge, Pirate Starbridge, Fed Patrol Boat, RAGE Gunboat, Striker and Abomination), as well as modifying selected AI ships to use them. Although a couple of light warships at your beck and call is highly desirable, the cost and weight is considerable.

3240.title: Death Beam
3240.author: killerman
3240.description: Hi this is my first plugin and I don't know if it's good or not but, go ahead and ask if you want it with smaller amount of damage or anything else. Anyway its name is Death Beam and, well, the name says it all. Oh and one more thing, it is first (not secondary) weapon and guided beam so use it carefully ;)

3252.title: The Diamond Devastator
3252.author: Matthew Todd
3252.description: This is a plug which adds one ship: the Diamond Devastator. It kicks butt and is strong, but not invincible. It has a strong beam, which uses a lot of energy, and not to much shields but a whole lotta recharge. Just fly out of a battle and go back in seconds later! A lot of fun! It's pretty balanced with all the energy requirements (not to mention the price). Have fun! Oh yeah, do not go into the outfitters. Really. It takes away your weapon.

3269.title: The Hourglass
3269.author: StarBound
3269.description: This plug-in adds a 10,000,000 credit ship, the hourglass (it's not actually worth that much). This time, the graphics are far superior to the old version, fixed the old engine thing. Plug-in by StarBound.

3338.title: Satori for EVN
3338.author: skylark
3338.description: Greetings and aloha to you all.

3344.title: EVO Weapons
3344.author: Spartan Jai
3344.description: So I was playing the port for EVO, and decided it didn't have weapons. So I added some. Plug contains Six new weapons. Mac and PC files included. Contact me with bugs, comments, and threats on my life at ajosiahw@gmail.com

3365.title: Buyable Ships (For EVC Port)
3365.author: PsyckoSama
3365.description: This plug-in is for the EV Classic Mod port to EV Nova. It simply makes ships the player is normally restricted from using available to both buy and hire.

3390.title: Purple Destroyer
3390.author: Michael Llenos
3390.description:
This is a cheap, but powerful, ship that can take on most threats.  It has my Holiday Torpedoes in it too.

--Just to make sure you guys got it, I\'m downloading it again.

3395.title: Legal Pirate Bays
3395.author: AC
3395.description: I always found it unfair that I'd get scanned and blacklisted for having Pirate bays, when NPCs don't get hassled. This very simple plugin makes the Pirate Viper and T-Head bays "legal".

3402.title: EVO MAGMA: Nova v1.0 (Mac/Windows)
3402.author: CapnRobinson
3402.description: Orignally released by meowx in 2000, EVO: MAGMA is a complete overhaul for the sounds and graphics for EV Override, giving the game a darker, grittier feel. Now this great plug-in has been ported to EV Nova, featuring all new ship, weapon, outfit, interface, and planet graphics, as well as new sounds and music! Ported to EV Override for Nova by CapnRobinson. (www.andrewtc.com)

1868.title: Path of the Wraith.sit
1868.author: Anonymous
1868.description: This plug-in adds a new Wraith storyline, where you start out as a little-known wraith child and work your way up to being an elite wraith warrior. Programmed by Jackal.

1264.title: Money Maker
1264.author: Anonymous
1264.description:
This is my first publicly released plugin. Money Maker is a cheat that makes you 10 million credits! All you have to do is drag it into your plugins folder, start Nova, wait at the Mission BBS until it appears, then take the cargo wherever it needs to be taken! It is is a really good way to skip through the money making process and right into the game. If you have any comments, critizisms or death threats please feel free to contact AlexCavalier42@yahoo.com, Thanks

By: A-Dawg

1729.title: Interialess
1729.author: Anonymous
1729.description: This plug-in makes all the ships (And I mean all) interialess (You know, when they stop they dont turn.) This is my first ever plug I have ever released to the public.  Any bugs? Report them to me. Email: zeus89@earthlink.net  AIM SN: Thundergod1989

3260.title: The DarthKev Plug
3260.author: DarthKev & Kronos
3260.description: Hello EVN Community. This is the _final_ version of The DarthKev Plug, this time with help from a newcomer, Kronos! The two of us have been working on my first TC, Heroes of the Stars, or HOTS for short. It has not been well advertised, so you may not have heard of it.

1173.title: 2 mill
1173.author: Anonymous
1173.description:
2 mill mission EVN:EVO tc

My first plugin. This plug is for the EVN EVO total conversion for pc but that may change.
It will allow you to access a mission that will give you 2 mill credits just take off and land after you accept the mission. If you have any comments or praise or need to report a bug email me at gibsland17@hotmail.com

1176.title: Alien
1176.author: Anonymous
1176.description: My invincible shuttle is now a pilot you can use.  You can dominate planets, have 32000 darts, all of the vellos, polaris, pirate, rebel, and Fed. weapons to your disposal. Have fun and if you have any problems, email me at sniper78239@yahoo.com

2004.title: Secondaryion.sea
2004.author: Anonymous
2004.description:
This is a simple little plug-in designed to change the Ionic Particle Cannon (aka Crown of Thorns) into a secondary weapon, allowing the use of rail-guns and other long-range weapons without wasting energy. 
-by Quantum Transcendence

1179.title: All strings.sit
1179.author: Anonymous
1179.description:
This will let you buy any outfit, once you have earned it of course, for as you may have gathered from the name, it lets you play all the strings in Nova with one pilot. Not only does it allow this, but it also lets you choose which storyline you want to do next (it uses the starting conditions of the starterpack plug). This plug was created by Raven, if you have any questions, comments, bugs etc. e-mail me at ravelnze@yahoo.com.au

PS:Make sure to read the read-me!

1174.title: 50M Credits Cheat
1174.author: Anonymous
1174.description: A plugin for all of those cheaters out there who are tired of those plugins that make you work for your insane amounts of cash. Designed to be as quick and efficient as possible. Developed in Macintosh plugin format, conversion will be required for Windows users. By Consul Bob. Updated so as to resolve a small bug.

1359.title: ulta add on
1359.author: Anonymous
1359.description:
Thank you for downloading Ulta Add On
brought to you by Kristii (missy. Kiki)
and the studios of Missy Factory

this plug in contains 13 new outfits and a new money mission XD.

1. universe map 2. nova cloak 3. gov bribe 4.mini robot marines 5.anti ionzer 6. ulta armor 7.repiar system 8. repiar cells.

paints

1 gold plateing (colour: gold) 2.saphire plateing (colour:blue)
3. pimp paint(my bro forced me to name it that) (colour: pink)
4. space camo (colour: black/pirate)5. luna paint (colour: light blue-ish)

and a new mission for 100k credits on earth accept in mision bbs take off and land back on earth!! thats it a quick 110k right

bugs, thanks, turtles, death threats, wooternet@yahoo.com

AND THANK YOU!!

3257.title: M1-A1 Tank
3257.author: X'arnor
3257.description:
This plugin adds a new ship to the game: the M1-A1 Tank. It has poor shields but massive amounts of armor. It can hold 8 guns and 5 turrets, and has 150 tons of cargo space and 500 tons of free mass. Its default outfits are 2 heavy blaster turrets and 1 super heavy blaster. It costs 10 million credits, but for some reason the trade-in value is only 2.5 million or around there, so sorry about that. I don't know how well this plugin will work with other plugins that add ships.

Anyways, just so you know, I don't have much experience with making ships for EVN, so this may have some bugs. If you find any, be sure to email me. Hope you enjoy the M1-A1 Tank!

3261.title: Scrapped Firefly Ship
3261.author: Gee
3261.description:
This is a fail add-on that I tried to make to incorporate the FireFly ship from Serenity and From the tv series FireFly.

It's in .rez format and needs just minor things... well it needs a proper spin image and a decent go over to get it right.

Please download and fix as you see fit and I hope that it gets better.

1438.title: 3-D Sh Bu
1438.author: Anonymous
1438.description: This Plug-in is basically the exact same thing as Alexander Solokat's 3-D shield bubble's 3.0, and was in fact the base for this modification. This plug-in changes the shield colors for the Rebellion, Vellosian, and Auroran ships. Lack of polaris is explained in the Read Me. Guaranteed Compatability. Tell me what you think! PSOCringe@comcast.net, be sure to put "Nova" and the name fo the plug-in the e-mail refers to in the subject or I will just delete it.

3191.title: Super_Power_SciFi_Weapons.zip
3191.author: Demosthenes
3191.description: This little plug-in I have made is some super sci-fi weapons from sci-fi shows that i watch in my spare time.

1773.title: M2-TheAnnalsofBlake2.sit
1773.author: Anonymous
1773.description:
My first plugin ever.  This is a teaser, of what I plan to bring to the EVN
 universe, right now only weapons, I'm still learning how to do some of the
 rest.  questions, comments, or concerns email me at
 www.sniperz555@hotmail.com,  The Marathon Universe brought to you by [UESC]
 Hrothgar

1876.title: PirateFix1.0.2.sit
1876.author: Anonymous
1876.description: This plugin fixes the crash issue in the Pirate string at the point where you receive the Ion Dissipator in 1.0.2.  Enjoy!  Created by MacDevil.  Initial release 9/9/02.

1492.title: Battlestar Galactica v1.2
1492.author: Anonymous
1492.description: A new and improved version of the Battlestar Galactica plug (based off the old TV series), this one is WAY more difficult.  The Cylons have overran the Polaris, stealing their technology and making bio-engineered ships, gaining the advantage over the Colonials.  Colonial Viper Mk1's can no longer take Raiders and Elite Raiders down with ease.  I'm thinking of making a storyline in version1.3 or 1.4, expect a new one near the end of summer when I learn how to use a graphic engine to make the graphics for the ships.  Email me at mbelins1@hotmail.com  by zapp

3231.title: Concrete Jungle
3231.author: SpiderDuckie
3231.description:
After a long wait, the Concrete Jungle, formerly known as Trigger Universe, plug-in is finally starting to look finished! This is a beta version of just a small portion of the missions, weapons, and ships that are added.

I WOULD ADVISE USING ONLY THIS PLUG-IN AT A TIME, OTHERWISE A CRASH COULD OCCUR.
The purpose of this plug-in is to reincorporate the United Earth government into Escape Velocity Nova. Join the United Earth as they work to rebuild their empire as well as destroy the corrupt Federation and Bureau of Internal Investigation.

Please e-mail me at SpiderDuckie@gmail if you have any suggestions or corrections that need to be made. Thank you for beta-testing this plug-in!

1833.title: NewBalance 1 0
1833.author: Anonymous
1833.description: This is my (first) attempt to fix some of the major problems in ship's systems.  I modestly improved blaster performance and accuracy while downgrading the velocity, range and accuracy of fusion pulse cannon (turrets etc.), giving them some disadvantages to compensate for their high damage/mass ratio.  It also makes them match their description better.  I improved reactor performance substantially.  In the original, reactors were only slightly more efficient than the same mass of solar cells and certainly not worth the price.  I also added a light cannon turret and point defense versions of the light blaster and light cannon turret.  These changes are for balance, not to make the game easy or you invincible.  My idea of balance is when it becomes hard to choose because there is not one ultimate best choice for everything.

1902.title: PolarisFix101
1902.author: Anonymous
1902.description: For use with EV:Nova version 1.0.1. This patch fixes a problem with the initial Polaris mission which can affect it's availability. (Technical info: It corrects an improperly formed AvailBits expression.) - Slagblah

1985.title: RewardShipsV3.0.sit
1985.author: Anonymous
1985.description: This is the third and final version of Reward Ships.  It adds some new ships and outfits.  It also fixes a few bugs and changes a few other things.  Enjoy.  Made by MacDevil  Send questions and comments to AGS848@AOL.com.

2081.title: Stargate Atlantis Plugins
2081.author: Anonymous
2081.description: This plugin gives you the chance to buy technology left behind by the Ancients! (from the Stargate series).  It could be considered a cheat but used sparingly it is not, as some (not all) of the prices are very high. This is v1.0(August 8th 2006) and another is coming out soon. Any questions, comments, bug reports and the like can go to engelhartfamily@frontiernet.net  The names Mephistopheles II.

1367.title: Weightless and Cosltess Wepaons and Outfits
1367.author: Anonymous
1367.description: This cheat makes every weapon and outfit in the game weigh 0 tons and cost 0 credits. It also allows you to buy 32,000 of any weapon or outfit. I would have made it higher, but that's as high as it goes. Some of the technology made available by this plug-in requires a special Navy Clearance, so you might want to use this with my License to Life plug-in. Oh and last thing, I also made it so that you can sell certain outfits such as the Port and Polish that you can't normally sell, because if you buy too many, your ship will be way too fast and you won't be able to land. Made by X'arnor. You can email me any bugs or plug-in request to bladeboy295 at yahoo dot com. Enjoy all those weapons and outfits!

2007.title: Semiteaser
2007.author: Anonymous
2007.description: My first plug is a pre-teaser for an expansion of plugpack v 18. Plug adds half of a new line of ships (none of the merchant ones, only military) based on SSC shipyards corvette. Hope you enjoy! Compatible with plugpack. Also comes with free cheat ship. By Oryhara.

2152.title: VellosWeaponsBETA
2152.author: Anonymous
2152.description: This plugin is still in beta. Anyone who uses it does not have to send feedback, but it would be greatly appreciated. Just as it says, this adds some new weapons along the vell-os string. Please refer to the read me, and please keep in mind, as this is a beta, if your computer either a. Explodes in your face or B. Mutates into a living being bent on your destruction, it is no responsibility of mine and is your risk. [address removed at author's request. There's an error with this plug that they asked me to correct, but I can't (I don't have file level access). The first Vell-os weapons is incorrect. There is a REL8 missing.]

1959.title: Reign of the Voinians
1959.author: Anonymous
1959.description: Disillusioned by the United Earths irresponsible method of government and incompetent military, you see no other choice but to join the other side, the right side, that of the Voinian Empire. Having been abandoned by the Voinians after aiding in their destruction of Verril Prime, you are unwilling to accept that this terrible war is close to over, and return to the very heart of the Empire, to try and re-gain their trust. Over the course of 20 missions, you will re-enter the shadowy world of the distant, savage aliens, as you draw nearer to the first conquests, a devastating series of attacks against the United Earth border. Will you and your allies be successful? It all depends on your skill, your talents in combat. After all, the Empire has entrusted you with their greatest offensive movement in their long history: The Great Conquests... For the Override conversion of EV:Nova and for Mac, so Windows users will need to convert it. More information can be found in the included read me file. For bug reports and comments send a mail to hitchhiker@freq245.de By Bombcat

1493.title: Battlestar GalacticaV1.3.1
1493.author: Anonymous
1493.description: This is another work from Zapp, please feel free to try it out. It does not have a storyline added, YET, though I will add one in the future. This is being put out for beta purposes, so if you notice ANY bugs, email me at zapp27@hotmail.com. Oh yeah, this is the Battlestar GalacticaV1.3.1 plug, and if your using Windows you must have EVN1.0.9 because of the char-resource fix.

1352.title: SURVIVAL
1352.author: Anonymous
1352.description:
this is a mac plug. it contains the survival package (escape pod, auto eject, IFF decoder and afterburner
it cost a little cheaper and takes up a little less space

comments, bugs or threats mail me at Halvorasa@hotmail.com

be sure to put NOVA in the mail name or i will delete it..

(feel free to edit the plug if you wont to)

2175.title: Wraithii Plugs
2175.author: Anonymous
2175.description: My first plug. This adds two new weapons. The wraithii wave, and smart wraithii. Smart Wraithii follow your targeted ship and continually attack it in a kamikaze form. And then theres the Wraithii Wave, simply just a large amount of devistating wraithii.The smart wraithii only hurt the target. Use the low priced and mass free CHEAT version, or the original version, made so you have to get money and have mass. Have Fun!

1244.title: InvisibleMan
1244.author: Anonymous
1244.description: This plugin allows you to accept a mission that prevents you from getting a major mission string. This makes it easy to build up cash and get a good reputation and ship. When you want to start a string just abort the mission. It's that easy! By Cosmic_Nusiance.

3377.title: Rezilla
3377.author: Bernard Desgraupes
3377.description: ResEdit may be gone, denying many a Mac user from editing and creating plug-ins, but there is Rezilla. Rezilla is a resource editor for OS X that is fully capable of editing escape velocity plug-ins. The latest version can be downloaded from SourceForge.

1360.title: Ultimate cargo drone
1360.author: Anonymous
1360.description: Ever want to have a cargo drone that is fast, anuverable, and deadly? This is it. Presenting the Ultimate Cargo Drone...outclass Polaris ships with a wimpy looking hunk of junk. Also able to carry 10000 tons of cargo among other things. made by DREDD

1593.title: EVC Descs
1593.author: Anonymous
1593.description: JoshTigerheart's Department of Useful Plugs brings something for the EVC TC:  EVC Descs.  Ever thought that the planet descriptions on EVC were a little short?  Bland?  Simple?  Uninteresting?  EVC Descs changes that.  Almost all of the planet descriptions have been altered, added to, or totally rewritten.  Most are serious, though few are humorous.  The new descriptions stay true to the information contains in the originals.  Also, the best part:  it is 100% compatible with rEVisted!  Questions?  Comments?  Free money?  Send them to TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com.  Plug is in Windows .rez format, so Mac users need a convertor.

3194.title: Super Power SciFi Weapons V2.0
3194.author: Demosthenes
3194.description: Version 2 of Super_Power_SciFi_Weapons adds better PICT, a new weapon, and fixes the photon torpedo and Phaser

3209.title: Disablo Beam
3209.author: Iosephulus
3209.description:
This plug-in set has two files. One of which is a cheat, the other is a version for those who want to play the game without cheating. This is a beam that will stretch all of the way across a space system just to disable its' target. Don't let anyone else get in the way otherwise they will block the beam. The beam is invisible and will ionize anyone it hits with red. This beam is so great you can even fire it while cloaked! It is free mass-wise and price-wise in the cheater version but it costs 250,000 CR and 15 tons with the valid version. The hardest part of using this beam is finding where to get it, which is revealed in the cheater version. Otherwise, you'll have to find it yourself. By Iosephulus. Of course, if you try this on certain NPCs like the ATMOS and Ambrosia ones, this *might* not work (they are if not invincible, virtually invincible).

Made for Windows. If you're unfortunate enough to have a Mac (JK, Both platforms are good) then you'll have to convert. Sorry. If you'd like, you can open it up and check it out in EVNEW or something.
Resources used:
DESC 3384, 3385
OUTF 512, 513
PICT 6384, 6385
SND 233 (Overwrites "Summer Bloom" with a duplicate copy)
WEAP 256

1238.title: Hunter
1238.author: Anonymous
1238.description: Fed carrier pilot file destroys krypt pods faster than a krypt pod ship trade in value 661.80M credits, 48.48M credits in bank to many outfits to list. From Robert e mail Robert9198@aol.com

1511.title: Capn Hector
1511.author: Anonymous
1511.description:
This a simplae plug-in for registered users. It adds Cap'n Hector back in. Enjoy.

Any complaints, bugs etc, email me at bigmac_software@yahoo.co.nz

yomcat
Pro-New Zealand Lobbysit from EV-Nova.net

1298.title: PolyconStartWithAnyShip
1298.author: Anonymous
1298.description:
This Polycon EV plugin allows you to choose any ship (including varients) when creating a new pilotfile.
Plugin by solaris150 (chrisb_developer@hotmail.com).

1280.title: pH-Ultradrive 1.1.sit
1280.author: Anonymous
1280.description: This is the latest and hopefully final version. This plug in should be compatible with most other plugs now, including All Items Available. What does it do? It adds a 4 million credit item called "Ultradrive" that makes your ship really, really, REALLY fast. It increases turning ratio and speeds well beyond 1000. But the thing is, you don't have to speed up all the way, so it's actually pretty decent. Great for huge, slow, capital ships like the Polaris Raven.

1709.title: Hyper-Etheric Engine 1.0
1709.author: Anonymous
1709.description: The Hyper Etheric Engine plug-in adds one outfit, the Hyper Etheric Engine.  It allows players not in the Polaris storyline a chance to use a multi-jump engine (although is is purposely not as effective or inexpensive as the Polaris version).

1802.title: MissionStringSelector.sit
1802.author: Anonymous
1802.description: Finally, a plugin that allows you to choose which mission thread you want to pay at the beginning of the game. Your mission thread will be easily accessed, and you will start with a Starbridge, with enough cargo space to do the missions. No more cruising round the universe to find one mission, it could take only one hyperspace jump.

1926.title: Propector
1926.author: Anonymous
1926.description: A quick character file that adds the ability to start as a Prospector. You get an asteroid miner with a scant 5,000 credits.

2033.title: SigmaStation.sit
2033.author: Anonymous
2033.description: This plug-in adds a station to the game, along with some missions. Version 1.0. Created by Robby Blum e-mail me at rlivblum@comcast.net with comments, etc.

1316.title: S-Cheat
1316.author: Anonymous
1316.description: This is my first plugin to be published.  It is a major cheat in that you can buy 20 of nearly all the weapons in the game.  Also for those of you who hate the immortal/invincible ATMOS characters they have become "mortal".  You have to be pretty rich in the first place to buy all of them therefore if you start a new pilot you will have more than enough credits to do whatever you want.  This plugin is also made on EVNEW (PC) so MAC users have to convert it.  Just in case you didn't read it the first time: this is a major cheat plugin.  Another warning before you download this: You will be really bored by the end of this game even if you capture every planet/spacestation.  -Yho2002  (Contact me on yho2002@hotmail.com MSN Messenger or e-mail).

2001.title: Scatter Weapons
2001.author: Anonymous
2001.description: From Josh Tigerheart's Department of Utterly Useless Plugs comes this new useless piece of junk:  Scatter Weapons!  Now, instead of shots going where you or the A.I. intends them to, they instead shoot off in random directions!  Guided weapons will still lock on, so you do not need to worry there.  Great for a few laughs, though I wouldn't recommend trying to play the game seriously like this.  Email me at TwilightPhoenix@fastermail.com should you have anything useless or useful to say. The plug is made with EVNew, so therefore is in WinEVN format. Mac users will need a converter.

1305.title: RebelCheater
1305.author: Anonymous
1305.description:
NEW VERSION
RebelCheater ver.999 windows version
All weapons free and no mass!
Added RebeL Frigate from Starwars(TM) and the SAE plugin.
Adds super Solar panels, super Ion dissapator, super map! super Marines and has increased the number of reactors you can have, I have not made this plugin so you can be god, Ive made this plugin to utilise all the weapons and best Starships to try and emulate what god would have done. All thanks goes to Dave Arthur, Matt Burch, The ATMOS team, SAE team, and all the other cheat plugins that came b4 me! For reporting of Bugs and technical Diffculties email me @ katcan@ptusnet.com.au BUG NOTE: do not buy items multiple times. Buy them one at a time. This is a bug in the editor I used not in the plugin itself.

1586.title: EV Enhancer 1.0.1.sit
1586.author: Anonymous
1586.description: EV Enhancer is a plug-in for the EV Classic total conversion for Nova. It adds EV Nova engine features such as gun exit ports, low-visibility systems, map colours, missile trails, etc. It also adds lots of extra outfits (such as long range scanners, reactors, and hand-weapon upgrades) and a few ships (such as an Argosy variant and drones). It makes the Tractor Beam work more like it did in the original game. The Lethean, Cydonian, and Pirate governments paint their ships differently from each other. The plug-in also adds missions for Centauri Spacelines. The EV Enhancer plug-in also fixes bugs with several outfits and missions. Coming versions will add pictures for missions, and missions and ships for the aliens. Works on a mac, so PC users will have to convert it. Contact me at daprice@mac.com. This plug does not require previous versions of EV Enhancer to be installed. If you already have a previous version of EVE, you must delete it when installing this version.

1239.title: Hvy Msl Anaconda
1239.author: Anonymous
1239.description: The Heavy Missile Variant Anaconda, upgradeable from the Light Missile Variant and available in the Earth shipyard when the other Fed ships are available, is armed with an astounding array of deadly missiles, rendering even capital ships' weaponry mostly useless. This is probably a cheat, thoough some of the stats are evened out to be more realistic (speed, cost...). Made, thouroughly tested, and zipped on Windows. Mac users will need the plug-in converter, of course. You can e-mail the author, MoveZig, at speedybug256@gmail.com.

2087.title: StarWarsMap 1.0zip
2087.author: Anonymous
2087.description:
A little plugin I made for Star Wars TC plug developers. It is a near complete map of the Star Wars galaxy. There are 313 systems, all told. All of the systems are very close to being in correct position, but the map is a little squished. THERE ARE ONLY SYSTEMS IN THIS PLUG. I created the plug on a mac, but have included an untested .rez file as well. Enjoy! 
mdupea@gmail.com

1222.title: Flak
1222.author: Anonymous

1268.author: Anonymous
1268.description: This is a Char resource which allows you to start at Earth with a few of the surrounding systems explored, 50 million credits, a Terrapin (from doing the Gefjon run), and the sigma intro mission completed (and Barry won't bug you when you land). 1713.title: HypergateAccessCard.sit
1713.author: Anonymous
1713.description: This little card can be purchased anywhere and grants the bearer access to the hypergate system. To use this plug-in, simply place the file "Hypergate Access card" in the "Nova Plug-ins" folder located in the "EV Nova 1.0.0" folder.

2172.title: WorldOfTheWraith-1.0.2.sit
2172.author: Anonymous
2172.description:

This plugin contains previously unavailable ships and one entirely new one, three new systems, containing three new planets and stations, tons of new outfits and weapons, new graphics, a cambrian cruiser space station... new flëts, düdes, and përs, including guest appearances from the plugin guild who alpha tested this plugin. Thanks to the many beta testers from the webboards. this plugin was made seperately from Path of the Wraith. Neither are rip-offs, they are just different view of the Wraith life. Download them both, as they are both excellant plugins. bug reports and comments to bug_reports_and_comments@saaciplank.co.uk 
VERSION-1.02: - This version is the correct version this time. Last time I uploaded the wrong one! This has been retested by the way and many more fixes were made in the end too.

1585.title: EV Enhancer.sit
1585.author: Anonymous
1585.description: EV Enhancer is a plug-in for the EV Classic total conversion for Nova. It adds EV Nova engine features such as gun exit ports, low-visibility systems, map colours, missile trails, etc. It also adds lots of extra outfits (such as long range scanners, reactors, and hand-weapon upgrades) and a few ships (such as an Argosy variant). It makes the Tractor Beam work more like it did in the original game. The Lethean, Cydonian, and Pirate governments paint their ships differently from each other. The plug-in also adds missions for Centauri Spacelines. The EV Enhancer plug-in also fixes bugs with several outfits and missions. Coming versions will add pictures for missions, and missions and ships for the aliens. Works on a mac. Contact me at daprice@mac.com.

It adds stunning graphics (NOT MINE, made by Mindfrelled, deserves HUGE amounts of credit(s) for it) and custom sound. It also makes all ship blasts way more damaging.

Questions can be mailed to 'Johan_stq@hotmail.com'

From Douglas Nohg, Inc. problems, bugs? e-mail dougy_n@hotmail.com

Send comments and questions to tsteenburg@wesleyan.edu

1464.title: AntiCheat11.sit
1464.author: Anonymous
1464.description: This is not a cheat! I made this plugin to teach my cheating step-brother a lesson, and you can use it, too. Just download it, decompress it, and replace your friend's/relative's/enemy's favorite cheating plugin with it. Then change its name to whatever the cheat plugin was called, and make sure you're watching when the person tries to cheat the next time. Sit back, relax, and don't snicker too loudly before they fall into the trap. Be warned, though: this plugin will send any pilot files it affects on a rather large detour, and could kill them. It's a moral thing, don't ya know. Talk to me at dbrauer@hfx.andara.com

Hello, and thank you for downloading Increased Ships 1.0. This doubles, sometimes triples the  of ships that are in each system.
(Mac version, PC isn't possable for me yet.)

IMPORTANT

THIS IS NOT A PLUG-IN. To install this, do the following:

1. Remove Nova Data 2 from your Nova Files folder. Put this away somewhere safe

2. Put Nova Data 2 from the file that you just downloaded into you Nova Files folder

3. Boot up Nova, and enjoy! You don't need to restart your pilot.

I made this because I was dissatisfied with the amount of ships in some systems (SOL, Wolf359). This file also adds a cool blue color to 2 systems.

Have fun and enjoy,

-The Elite     (NoFear_MonkeyMan@hotmail.com) Email me anytime!

-The EVN Webboard!

1270.title: NewItemsTwo

1270.description: New Items V.2 Sorry about the last plug, the weapon didnt work so I fixed that. This is my first plug. It adds 14 new items and one new all powerful weapon. It's all free so it is considered a big cheat. FOR WINDOWS ONLY! I dont know how to make it Mac [pipeline says: "Mac users, use a plug converter."]. No readme, but for the More Mass 1000 be careful and check your cargo space and see how many of them you need. 10 of them doesn't mean that it gives you the most cargo space, so I use 7-9 of 'em to see what's the best. Send all complaints, bug reports, comments and others to gb2kjr@netscape.net

1522.title: Chrome Valk Fix 106
1522.author: Anonymous
1522.description: The "Chrome Valk Fix" plug-in fixes a problem that many have reported in EV Nova. Apparently, the Starbridge Upgrade (otherwise known as the Chrome Valk upgrade) never showed up. This plug-in fixes the bits that appear when you buy a class A-C Starbridge so the upgrade now appears. If your pilot has a Starbridge and you use the plug-in, you may have to re-buy the Starbridge for it to work. Also works with captured ships. Tested on WinNova 1.0.6  it works. plug-in version 1.0. Made by MoveZig. E-mail at speedybug256@gmail.com.

1686.title: GuideBook
1686.author: Anonymous
1686.description:
It places the The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy in the outfitting shops.

Coments/Insults to lifeissweet@hotmail.com

1751.title: Krypt Expansion 3.0
1751.author: Anonymous
1751.description: Krypt Expansion 3.0 is just an update version of Krypt Expansion 2.0. Some descriptions have been edited and grammar errors have been corrected. As stated before this is a remake of Krypt Expansion in my Planet Expansions plugin. This version has better descriptions, the numbers of Krypt pods are reduced and traders have been added to systems, and the hyperlinks are no longer confusing. If you have questions/comments/bugs/complaints please contact me at deathshot@neo.rr.com - Made by Gremlin360

1371.title: Zalien Access
1371.author: Anonymous
1371.description: Zalien Access enables you to buy any Wraith, Krypt, Vell-os, and Hyperoid outfits, ships, weapons, and a Wraith Child Bay that I made, on Earth. Do not use with my _Polaris_Alpha_ plugin. This one was made first but is being uploaded later, so it could cause trouble if these are used together. Windows, Mac will have to convert. -X'arnor

1212.title: Earth Outfitter plug
1212.author: Anonymous
1212.description: A while ago, I was asked to make a plug-in that made all outfits available on Earth, and have no mass, but still have cost. So that's what I did. All outfits in the game, whether they are treated as outfits, or are more surprising (the Krypt Mind Attack for instance) should be available at Earth, and some on other planets (but it doesn't always go well there). You might notice a few other bonuses too. This is the first version, and it required  me to modify each outfit in the game, so there might be a few problems. If you find any, please report them to the email address in the ReadMe. Plug by Sponge Tom.

1776.title: Macintosh Missle Balances
1776.author: Anonymous
1776.description:
Missile Balances V1.0

Don't you hate how missiles are so expensive compared for what most of them do for you?  Well, this plugin helps that situation!  This plugin slightly lowers the price for most ammo types, and makes every missile except the EMP Torpedos weigh nothing!  The EMP Torpedos dont do much damage to armor, so I sugnifintally lowered the price.  This plugin doesn't make the missiles dirt cheap, but it does make them affordable.  This is the Macintosh version of this plug-in.

1494.title: Battlestar GalacticaV1.3
1494.author: Anonymous
1494.description: Yes, Battlestar GalacticaV1.3 is here, with a storyline.  I won't say anything except there's a major plot twist at the end... You'll never see it coming.  I hope you are eagerly awaiting V1.4, with the ships/weapons graphics, which should come out in summer or fall at the latest.  If you like this one, please tell me so because I've also (among other things) tried to equalize the Cylon and Colonial ships.  Email me at mbelins1@hotmail.com  by zapp

1205.title: DeathStarLaser
1205.author: Anonymous
1205.description: This is another cheat by Sponge Tom. It lets you get the Death Star Laser outfit. Although it can't destroy planets (couldn't get that to work, but if I do, an update is sure to follow) it will destroy any non-plug-in related ship (and most plug-ships, i.e. the Battlestar from the Battlestar Galactica plug, which had 15,000 shields and 20,000 armor). beware, as it causes lag when firing. it will penetrate ships on the other side of the target, and will hit a ship from across the system. works best at long range, using auto-pilot to aim, as your ship will be hard to control while firing (cuz of the lag, in case you forgot). also note that you cant fire any other weapons while firing the death star beam (you wouldn't need to anyway).

3197.title: Death Star! (Mac)
3197.author: TheBondMan
3197.description: My first plug. It adds the Death Star as a ship (priced at 2M) to all planets with a tech level of 3 and up and is complete with all graphics and descriptions. Included also is the classic Death Star Destruction Beam that destroys all ships instantly, which is available to buy for any ship in the outfitter priced 1M. [Mac Version]

1310.title: ReloadsMaxed
1310.author: Anonymous
1310.description: Reloads Maxed is a maxed Version of reloads plug and not the same, you can only get the max amount ammo allowed, Reloads Maxed plug you got to pay for the ammo so you don't have click the mouse 20,000 times for 20,000 IR Missiles you can get up to four jammers ea for extra protection, a nice plug for custom ships you can get an extra light blaster or make a ship to do any string. (Robert) This plug is 10 times better that the reloads plug.

2028.title: Sigma 9000
2028.author: Anonymous
2028.description:
A new, built from scratch ship. It's the Sigma 9000 Blockade Runner from Old Earth. This sleek metallic baby has what it takes to outrun those Pirate and Federation scanners. Also packs enough firepower to hold its own.

Enjoy!

2116.title: Thunderhead Enhancer
2116.author: Anonymous
2116.description: This plug makes the T-head lance a turret, gives it more range and makes it 2X stronger.  Also, you are able to launch 2 T-head fighters at once, for a total of 6 fighters.  v 1.0 By: phoenix9000

3448.title: christmas cannon
3448.author: mercury software
3448.description: this plug adds a beam weapon called the christmas cannon it should kill most ships in one hit.

This is just a PDF file containing useful tips for Nova newbies. 
Version 1.0
Starlight Development
eMail: starlight_dev@mac.com

1623.title: Explorer Plug.sit
1623.author: Anonymous
1623.description: This plug adds the Old Earth Explorer, a ship dating from the years of the IDA Frigate. It has long range capabilities with 4 solar panels. It only has weapon space for a single turret.  send comments to orion7792@netscape.net

1782.title: MarineMissile
1782.author: Anonymous
1782.description:
The marine missile fires an escape pod full of marines towards an enemy ship. The marines board the ship, and disable it, and fly the ship towards you. If the ship is bigger however, the system fails, and you get pulled towards the ship. After this, the marines will help you take over the ship, and also increase the chances of capturing the ship. This weapon is such technology, you must start a new pilot file to use it. Don't worry though. You can simply start off, and when you have the money and weapon space, you can fire this at your ideal ship...
plugin created by saaci plank, and tested by the plugin guild

2272.title: thememaker2.sit
2272.author: Anonymous
2272.description: A Small editor for Nova that allows you to edit the theme and apperance of nova. Comes with a built in Status bar, Main Menu, and title screen viewer, and a sample theme from polycon EV.

1328.title: Spun Carbon plug-in
1328.author: Anonymous
1328.description:
Spun Carbon is a very expensive upgrade where ship engineers replace part of your ship (or rebuild it entirely) with spun carbon, a high strength, low mass material that gives improved stability and reduced overall mass.  The result is a ship that accelerates faster, has a higher top speed, improved fuel consumption, increased armour (due to the higher strength material) AND because of the increased stability and lower mass it also increases the available weapons mass.
v.1.01                      Les        ...         danbywiske@hotmail.com

1184.title: AllTheCashYouNeed
1184.author: Anonymous
1184.description: Another cheat by Sponge Tom (yes, i've been rapidly uploading a lot). this gets you the most money Mission Computer will let me give you (i would've given you more). anyway, you just put the plug in the nova plug ins folder, go to any mission BBS, accept the Lotsofcash mission (has a really weird description). take off and land. you will be in huge debt. take off and land again and you'll be rich. once again, cheat by Sponge Tom.

3328.title: Rebel Yell Line 1 Fix2

Sure, there aren't any ships from Halo, but watch for that soon a.k.a. a few months... Anyway this pack includes everything from cannons to nukes. It's pretty cool. Just one file. Made on a Mac. PC .rez file included. Make sure you read the ReadMe...

This plug-in adds a hypergate to Sol that connects to important systems all over the ev nova universe. It adds a new system with a hypergate that connects to S7evyn. It also makes the flower of spring and the thunderhead lance more powerful. Not bad for an 11 year old.

One Auroran Crusier variant and one Fed Destroyer variant holds these weapons. This version fixes a shock artillery bug. You can send any comments to me at jwillie194@netscape.net.

This plug works for EVN but is originally made for the EVO mod of Nova. Any questions, comments, or requests should go to sas_enfield@yahoo.co.uk

Originals

by David Evans

This plug adds 4 ships 4 weapons 1 government and two systems to EVN. The four ships are ships from EV and the weapons are beams. The two systems are near Kania. Feb. 18, 2003

Feel free to email me with CONSTRUCTIVE advice, or praise works too, at Faithful.Christian@Verizon.net, or AIM screen name FaithNChrist89

2051.title: SP-FriendlyAliens.sit
2051.author: Anonymous
2051.description: This Plugin Is one in the series of Plugins by Saaci Plank, that makes certain races less hostile. They no longer randomly attack you when you enter their system. If they are causing you problems, then this is the perfect plugin series. This particular plugin prevents Aliens suddenly turning hostile and attacking out of their own free will. The Governments affected are: Wraith, hyperoid, Krypt and Vell-os. Download the others in the series, but don't use them all at once, it could be considered cheating.

2053.author: Anonymous
2053.description: This Plugin Is one in the series of Plugins by Saaci Plank, that makes certain races less hostile. They no longer randomly attack you when you enter their system. If they are causing you problems, then this is the perfect plugin series. This particular plugin prevents Polaris suddenly turning hostile and attacking out of their own free will. This is useful in the beureu missions, etc. The governments affected are: Polaris, the other people who live with the polaris, the Mu'hari, and thats it. Download the others in the series, but don't use them all at once, it could be considered cheating.

DOWNLOAD, AS IT IS WORTH IT! plugins created by Saaci Plank

2101.author: Anonymous
2101.description: I thought it was a little strange that at the end of the Vell-os string, when you have enough power to single handedly destroy the world, you didn't have enough power to recharge a Dart without landing and paying for it. This plug increases the recharge rates of the Dart and Arrow after you've become a T0 and beaten the string.

1551.title: Darts

1551.description: My first Plug-in. Please send your questions and comments to Spammer.24.7@gmail.com with EV Nova as the subject. Sorry for any bugs or glitches it worked for me. Might crash if you buy the darts with alt-B.

,comments: metalridely@hotmail.com ~Shade(Omar)

Contact me at : cross.gareth@gmail.com

2274.title: ViewRLE 1.0.0
2274.author: Anonymous
2274.description: ViewRLE is a simple application that allows you to view the rlë8 and rlëD resources of a file, such as the ships, weapons and planets of EV Nova. It is simple enough to be used by the average Nova player, and is useful for the plug-in developer/artist as a fast way to check the rlës and how they will combine in-game (for instance, the ship with its running lights and engine glow). ViewRLE is completely free of charge, and its source code is public for everyone to see and tinker with. You're encouraged to redistribute it with its source code to whoever you want.  ViewRLE only works on Macs (OS9 and OSX native), sorry for Windows users. You can contact me as Zacha Pedro on the boards, or with the email found in the ReadMe. OS9 users should make sure they have the latest Stuffit Expander in order to unstuff the sitx archive.

1350.title: SuperModifcation

Made for WINDOWS by Olaf Greyshoulders. Contact me at junkworld2223334@yahoo.com

Alexander Salokat: a.salokat@web.de (Mention "Ambrosia" in your mail or it will be filtered out!)

1354.title: The Elite Nova Plug-In
1354.author: Anonymous
1354.description:
This plug-in I have made enhances the EVN Univers to its fullest potential. I have configured it so that you can buy some of the most powerful starships in the universe at any shipyard, and for some they are almost free. I have also made a few of the ships completely indistructable like the polaris scarab, arachnid, and the raven. I have also made it so that you can purchase many of the polaris outfits for just 1 credit each and as many of them as you want. I have also allowed it so that when you start a new game, you are already in control of all of the planets.  There are also some other little tweaks I have in store.

This is version 1.00, the release date is 4/21/03.
                                                  Contributed by,
                                                                 Dan Muir

1247.title: Krazy Wraith.sit
1247.author: Anonymous
1247.description: This is a plugin that I don't understand why no one else has made. It gives you, in my opinion, the coolest ship there is in the game - the Wraith. However, it has 10000 cargo and weapon space, can use 10000 guns and turrets, etc. It's also a planetary type ship, which means that the only things that can hit you are guns on planets and stations. This causes enemy ships to merely circle around you when they want to kill you. In short, this is the equivalent of the Escape Pod plugin for old EV games. It's unkillable and kicks butt.

2168.title: Windows Missle Balances

2168.description:
Missile Balances V1.0

This plugin slightly lowers the price for most ammo types, and makes every missile except the EMP Torpedos weigh nothing!  The EMP Torpedos dont do much damage to armor, so I sugnifintally lowered the price.  This plugin doesn't make the missiles dirt cheap, but it does make them affordable.  This is the Windows version of this plug-in.

2059.title: SP-newthunderforge.sit

2059.description: This plugin adds my very own thunderforge that I upgraded in the game, and transferred into the plugin. It has solar lances, thunderhead lances, tons more weapons, amazing shield and armour capacity and recharge for both, and it works with all my other plugins up to date. This plug-in adds a new ship to EV Nova: The Teapot. It's completely indestructible, and it can carry unlimited weapons and outfits, as well as unlimited cargo. It's the first time I've ever made a ship for EVN, so you'll have to excuse the minor quirks here and there, but overall it's pretty good, and it works smoothly enough.

Also, if you want to make some big money in only a few seconds, go to a shipyard, buy the Teapot (it costs 0 credits), and then sell it. Its trade-in value is 355.51 million credits. Do this as many times as desired for maximum credits.

So, I hope you enjoy the Teapot! :D

3346.title: Modified Zephyr
3346.author: Chance Helmuth
3346.description: This is my second or third plugin, so it might be a little buggy. If so, contact me at the email in the readme file. Modified Zephyr just replaces the original Zephyr model with that of the Fed Scout Ship. The reason for this was because the big black panel or whatever it is on the front of the Zephyr always bothered me. The ship is exactly the same otherwise.

1226.title: Get Mod Starbridge E Folde
1226.author: Anonymous
1226.description:
So, you've tried to get it from the Wild Geese, or the Rebels, but every time you
do, you are left with a dirty concience or a bad Reputation?
Well now with this plug you can buy the Mod Starbridge Class E for only Five Credits on any planet with a shipyard!
Thats right! Perfect for the aspiring trader, or blooming Auroran Warrior!
Plugin By: SoySauce

3249.title: Useless Missions
3249.author: Neil
3249.description: No ships, just a few useless missions. Includes smuggling, student protests, porn, and of course, monkeys.

1356.title: TradeBooster1.0.0
1356.author: Anonymous
1356.description: Ever tried doing a trading run with 6 Cambrians or Leviathans? Fed up of waiting ages while you hold down the Buy button? Trade Booster is an applescript which makes possible huge trading runs by buying and selling junks much faster than the game normally allows. Now you can make a profit of up to 9 million creds every run, without all the waiting! Mac only, requires an alternative applescript editor (see readme)

1423.title: Ship preferences guide
1423.author: Anonymous
1423.description: Can't find the perfect ship for you? Well, then this guide is for YOU! This guide is to help find the ship and escort fleet you prefer for your style of combat and making money. This is the Windows Version of the guide.  Questions, Comments, Insults, Feedback, and Death threats should e-mail JPNyden@att.net

1967.title: ResetPilot101
1967.author: Anonymous
1967.description:
A new set of Reset missions for version 1.0.1 of EV Nova this version clears mission bits and aborts silent missions once you get to S7eyvn (a Cheater and Legit player version included in package)

By KagatoAC with help from many people on the weboard (You know who you are)

1191.title: Better Start
1191.author: Anonymous
1191.description: Better Restart allows you to start in a Heavy Shuttle with 100,000 credits. The intro has been changed to just a text box but still is great to read. If there are any problems contact me at deathshot@neo.rr.com Made by - Gremlin360, chronodrago, and JacaByte.

1931.title: Pyrogenesis
1931.author: Anonymous
1931.description:
Well here you go folks my first submited plugin.  Well its all about Pyrogenesis, the blaster compony whos blasters are as rambling as me and as horrible as Family Guy(the show on fox and if an "administrator" is look at this, than he can't stop the right to free speach!).  Well I guess if your reading this than he didn't stop me. Ok back to the plugin,    it adds a new system, a new ship, and a new weapon.  And this is just the begining muhahaha!  Right back to the plugin,  if I have any spelng errors or anything you what to talk with me about, Email me @ philipcreamer4@yahoo.com. 
Obviously, by Philip Creamer IV

3305.title: SuperShield 2.0
3305.author: Anonymous
3305.description: A cheat that will let you buy up to 1000 of the fed and polaris shield upgrades for free with no mass. If you buy enough, you will be indestructible!

3309.title: Fed.Fleet and Green Torpedo
3309.author: Michael Llenos
3309.description: Wanted a collage with a Green Torpedo?  Now your shuttle can be a flying fortress!

1872.title: Pilot File Ruiner
1872.author: Anonymous
1872.description:
Did your friend get that Manticore before you did? Did he become Ory'hara while you were still trying to find the Muhari homeworld? Want a way to put him in his place, to destroy that newfound ego of his? Then just slip this nifty plugin into his Plugins folder, rename it into something less conspicuous, and laugh as he loses his best pilot file! There's even pink paint to add to your amusement! Made by buggerplugger at yahoo dot com. File is in .REZ format, Mac users will need to convert. 

Final note: DO NOT load your most treasured pilot with this plugin! It WILL ruin it! If I find any ways to "escape" the death and depression given by this plug you'll be sure I'll fix it. Enjoy! (Hahaha...)

1680.title: GPhenomenon.sit
1680.author: Anonymous
1680.description: An unforseen phenomenon has disrupted trade in the Gaefon system. The Gefjon system, famous for its "Opal-run", has been declared to be under investigation by the Federation Science faculty. Traders still wanting to presue the famous "Opal-run" has been told ot enter at their own risk...

1775.title: Macintosh Jammer Balances
1775.author: Anonymous
1775.description:
Version 1.0 Jamming Balances

Don't you just hate how your expensive missles keep missing the target?  That is form the target ship's jammers!  The jammers' very high jamming percentages are very high for their price.  Basicly all this plug-in does is slightly lower the jamming capabilities of all the jammers.  This makes it worth your money buying those expensive missles and not having them completely missing the target 99.9% of the time.  This is the macintosh version of this plugin.

1904.title: PolarisFixReal.sit
1904.author: Anonymous
1904.description: Fixes the Capture Vell-os mission for real. The way it works is it removes the ship that you're supposed to observe (seems like a bug, because the object isn't to observe the ship, but the mission is set up that way) so that all you have to do is go to earth and back. The other polaris fix plugin solves this by moving the ships to earth, but mine actually removes the ship entirely. Warning: this is untested, as I can't figure out how to actually test it. I've never had the problem where I can't finish the mission, so I don't know if the plugin really fixes it, but it looks like it should. If there's a problem with the plugin, email me at kevin@sb.org

2006.title: sellescorts
2006.author: Anonymous
2006.description:
this litte plug will enable you to sell your escorts in mac evnova classic/override
has been tested only with override, but schould work with classic as well.
robert_menzen@yahoo.de

1533.title: COLOREDIONCANNONS
1533.author: Anonymous
1533.description:
Here you all are, the COLORED ION CANNONS PACK! what it does is makes 9 new colored ion cannons(9 new colors + the already existing blue one = 10!) that are fired by the 2nd trigger. everything else about the ion cannon was left untouched. WARNING::::::FOR MACS ONLY::::::WARNING
If you want me to add a color or to complain, please email me at lweaver1@austin.rr.com

3291.title: Collage of an EVN Fleet
3291.author: Michael Llenos
3291.description: What an EVN fleet may look like in actuality.  Except for the white background I tried to make this collage as realistic as possible.  I hope others try to imitate this collage and make their own collages, and better ones at that!

3293.title: EVNFleet Collage
3293.author: Michael Llenos
3293.description: An updated version of EV Nova Fleet Collage.  I've tried to make the ships more exact in size to one another when compared with 1.0.

2185.title: Changer
2185.author: Anonymous
2185.description: This is for pepole who are to scared to edit their Data files directly.  This version is for Nova Data 4.  Made by Mind Bender SW Dudeman20us@yahoo.com

1430.title: TipsforNova.cwk
1430.author: Anonymous
1430.description:
This is a tips file for newbys it contains a really really good way to make alot of money. A good way to start the game and my favourite mission strings!!!

Version 1.0.0 Release Date 7/4/02.

By Trunks(my web board user name).

3225.title: Gefjon Run
3225.author: Equalizer
3225.description: As requested on the forums, here it is: this plug simply returns the Gefjon run to the game, but with a twist. The Gefjon system is now loaded with pirates of all kinds and the planets have been moved even further apart. Have fun and send comments to firesupport42@gmail.com

3342.title: ULGC Rebel Viper
3342.author: Spartan Jai
3342.description: This plugin contains a new ship and four new outfits. The new ship is an Upgraded Light Gunboat Class Viper. How is it upgraded? Well, let's just say it's sort of a cheat more than a plug. Anyway, includes a bay for the ULGC Viper w/viper (can be purchased in shipyard also). Also includes heavy blasters, and a new beam.

3300.title: EVN Federation Fleet Collage
3300.author: Michael Llenos
3300.description: I believe this collage to be the best for a Desktop Background so far.  Enjoy this bitmap!

1291.title: podpeople
1291.author: Anonymous
1291.description: This is a wicked alpha plug. No missions or anything all it truly does is let you zip about in a modified Escape Pod! Buy virtually anywhere, upgrade to your heart's content! Our revolutionary new PocketUniverse technology has allowed us to create a ship that's easy to pilot (no training needed!), cheap to maintain (fits in a bathtub!), cheap to power (its tiny mass allows your fuel to last longer!), yet has deeper holds than any Heavy Shuttle, AND hardpoints for up to THREE guns! It's so smooth, so zippy, it's like learning to fly all over again!

1418.title: PaintOutfitTutorial.sit
1418.author: Anonymous
1418.description: This is a tutorial on how to make a plugin file for evn that adds a paint outfit. It requires Res Edit with Nova Tools and Mac OS 9. Please Send comments to corun@mac.com Release 1.

1420.title: RiggsFSG1.0.sit
1420.author: Anonymous
1420.description: The main feature of this guide is a list of all ports in Federation space, along with the facilities available and goods traded. There is also basic advice on ships, outfits, and how to get started in EVN.

1516.title: Char PirateRaider.sit
1516.author: Anonymous
1516.description:
This plugin takes advantage of Nova's new char resource.  When you make a new pilot file, it gives you a choice to be a pirate raider instead of a normal trade.  The pirate raider gets a modified ship that has no cargo and is maxed out with the most possible weapons that are decently good for taking out pirate ships and then looting them ( or capturing them ), this should give advanced players a more fun way to start out than just hauling cargo.

Made by -SL-

1652.title: Freighter Fix
1652.author: Anonymous
1652.description: Maybe it is just me, but I found all of those bulk freighter missions with cargo loads larger than any ship available rather annoying since they were impossible to do.  This plug merely slightly increases the cargo holds of the Pegasus and Leviathan so that these missions can be done without problem.

1774.title: MacFixes
1774.author: Anonymous
1774.description: MacFixes v.1.2. This plug does several fixes at once, it re-adds the gefjon run, makes the fpc weapons stronger, lets you buy more of some outfits where it is logical. It also adds two outfits. Made by bmac, bmac@gmx.ch

2098.title: SupplyAndDemand.sit
2098.author: Anonymous
2098.description: A fix for the "problem" of Bio-Weapon runs. This plugin creates a simple state of supply and demand in the bio-weapon trade, hence the name. After buying your first shipment of weapons, you have 30 days until the trade closes down. After a 65 day cooling period, bio-weapons once again become available for trade. By Restorer.

1939.title: Raider plug
1939.author: Anonymous
1939.description: All this plug does is make a new system and government, you start as a pirate in the new system with the rank of raider, this is for all you pirates! comments, suggestions, bugs, glitches, or anything else email me at mbelins1@hotmail.com, in the subjest bar to zach about plug.  By zapp, WINDOWS ONLY, and in the Gravy empire and start as rebels plugs theres a typo in the email address this ones the right one.

1796.title: Mining Beam 3.0
1796.author: Anonymous
1796.description:
Mining beam 3.0 is here! This plug-in is perfect for those who don't have the time to mine! This beam will destroy any asteroid it comes in contact with! This is the PC version of the copy.
Questions, Comments, Feedback, and death threats should go to JPNyden@att.net

1315.title: Rhedynfre Industries
1315.author: Anonymous
1315.description: Heres a bunch of stuff from a new company on the planet Farndon. This plug-in adds a system connected to Sol and has a few plug-ins. My first plug-in to be posted. More stuff to work in conjuction with this one should follow in the next few weeks. Bug reports, thank yous and the like please send to soccercam@telus.net (please put EVN in the title otherwise youll get counted as spam and deleted as soon as I check my mail. Anywho, have fun!

3292.title: Purchasable Cargo Drone
3292.author: PacMan
3292.description: This tiny plug-in allows you to purchase a Cargo Drone, and see how far you can get with it. I had to make this plug-in, as it seems it's not allowed to board an existing Cargo Drone. Hint: Before you buy one, complete the first Sigma mission.

3447.title: Absolute Minimum Mac OS X
3447.author: Thinslayer
3447.description: Credit for the original goes to David \"Artanis\" Arthur from EVula. This is the Macintosh version of Absolute Minimum.
